## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1070">gx_accordion_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1070">gx_accordion_menu_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1071">Crear un menú acordeón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1071">Create an accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1072">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_create(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style ,
    USHORT accordion_menu_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1073">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1074">Este servicio crea un menú acordeón tal y como se especifica, y asocia el menú acordeón al widget primario proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1074">This service creates an accordion menu as specified and attaches the accordion menu to the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1075">Un menú acordeón es el widget de pantalla de menús que se expanden y contraen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1075">An accordion menu is anexpanding/collapsing menu display widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1076">Acepta todos los tipos de widget como elementos de menú secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1076">It accepts all types of widget as its child menu items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1077">Los menús acordeón se pueden anidar, lo que significa que se pueden crear varios niveles de profundidad de menús.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1077">Accordion menus can be nested, meaning several levels of menu depth can be created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1078">Para insertar un elemento secundario en un widget de elemento de menú, se recomienda usar el widget de tipo GX_MENU como elemento de menú primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1078">To insert a child item into a menu item widget, it’s recommended touse GX_MENU type widget as a parent menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1079">Sugerencias para crear un menú acordeón de nivel único:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1079">Tips for creating a single level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1080">Cree un menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1080">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1081">Asocie widgets de tipo GX_MENU al menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1081">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1082">Asocie widgets secundarios al tipo primario GX_MENU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1082">Attach child widgets to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1083">El tipo de elemento secundario puede ser cualquier tipo de widget GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1083">The child item type can be any GUIX widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1084">Sugerencias para crear un menú acordeón de varios niveles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1084">Tips for creating multi level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1085">Cree un menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1085">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1086">Asocie widgets de tipo GX_MENU al menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1086">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1087">Asocie un widget de tipo GX_ACCORDION_MENU al tipo primario GX_MENU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1087">Attach GX_ACCORDION_MENU type widget to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span>

4.  <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1088">Asocie elementos de menú al tipo primario GX_ACCORDION_MENU como se describe en creación del menú acordeón de un solo nivel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1088">Attach menu items to the GX_ACCORDION_MENU type parent as described in the single level accordion menu creation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1089">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1089">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1090">**accordion**: puntero al bloque de control del menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1090">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1091">**name**: nombre del menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1091">**name** Name of the accordion menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1092">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1092">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1093">**style**: estilo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1093">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1094">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1094">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1095">**accordion_menu_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1095">**accordion_menu_id** Application-defined ID of the accordion menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1096">**size**: tamaño del menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1096">**size** Size of the accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1097">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1097">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del menú acordeón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1099">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1099">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1101">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1101">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1102">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1102">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1103">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1103">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1104">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1104">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1105">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1105">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ACCORDION_MENU my_accordion;
GX_MENU menu_1;
GX_MENU item_1;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

status = gx_accordion_menu_create(&my_accordion, “my_accordion”,
                                  parent, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_ACCORDION_ID, &size);

gx_menu_create(&menu_1, “menu_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_MENU_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_TYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_menu_create(&item_1, “item_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_ITEM_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_text_offset_set(&item_1, 30, 0);

gx_menu_insert(&menu_1, &item_1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the accordion menu was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1106">demo_guix_widget_types de la aplicación de demostración, que se proporciona como parte de la instalación de GUIX Studio, ofrece un ejemplo completo del uso del widget de menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1106">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the accordion menu widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1117">gx_accordion_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1117">gx_accordion_menu_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1118">Dibujar menú acordeón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1118">Draw accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1119">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1119">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_accordion_menu_draw(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1120">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1120">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1121">Este servicio dibuja el menú acordeón especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1121">This service draws the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1122">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a este servicio internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de menú acordeón personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1122">This service is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom accordion menu widgets.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1140">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1140">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1141">Procesar evento de menú acordeón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1141">Process accordion menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1142">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1142">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_event_process(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1143">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1143">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1144">Este servicio procesa un evento para el menú acordeón especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1144">This service processes an event for the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1145">Cualquier función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de menú acordeón debe llamar a este servicio como controlador de eventos predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1145">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom accordion menu event processing functions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1146">Este servicio controla los eventos GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN y GX_EVENT_PEN_UP para expandir o contraer un elemento de menú.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1146">This service handles GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN and GX_EVENT_PEN_UP events to expand/collaps a menu item.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1147">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1148">**accordion**: puntero al bloque de control del menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1148">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1149">**event_ptr**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1149">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1150">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1150">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1151">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto del evento de menú acordeón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1151">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1152">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1152">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1153">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1153">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1154">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1154">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1155">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1155">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1156">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1156">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic accordion menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_accordion_event_process( 
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default accordion menu
            event processing */
        status =
        gx_accordion_menu_event_process(accordion, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1170">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1170">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1171">Este servicio coloca los elementos de menú para el menú acordeón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1171">This service positions the menu items for the accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1172">Normalmente, se llama a esta función internamente cuando el menú acordeón se vuelve visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1172">This function is normally called internally when the accordion menu is becoming visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1173">Si quiere insertar o quitar elementos en un menú acordeón, o cambiar los estilos de expansión del elemento secundario, se debe llamar a esta función para cambiar la posición de los elementos secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1173">If you want to insert/remove items to/from an accordion menu, or change the expand styles of the child item, this function should be called to reposition the child items.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_animation_canvas_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1193">gx_animation_canvas_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1193">gx_animation_canvas_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1194">Proporcionar memoria de lienzo a un controlador de animación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1194">Provide canvas memory to an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1195">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1195">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_canvas_define(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1196">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1196">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1197">Este servicio proporciona un lienzo de memoria a un controlador de animación que se usa para implementar la secuencia de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1197">This service provides a memory canvas to an animation controller used to implement the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1198">Este lienzo proporcionado debe ser lo suficientemente grande como para contener el widget de destino de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1198">This provided canvas should be large enough to hold the animation target widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1199">Cuando se define un lienzo de animación, el widget de destino se dibuja una vez en este lienzo de animación y el efecto deslizante o de atenuación de la pantalla se logra modificando el desplazamiento del lienzo o el valor alfa del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1199">When an animation canvas is defined, the target widget is drawn once to this animation canvas, and the screen slide or fade effect is accomplished by modifying the canvas offset and/or canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1200">Cuando se proporciona compatibilidad de hardware con varios niveles de gráficos, la definición de un lienzo de animación que está enlazado a un nivel de superposición de gráficos de hardware puede mejorar ***considerablemente*** el rendimiento de las animaciones de deslizamiento y atenuación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1200">When hardware support for multiple graphics layers is provided, defining an animation canvas that is bound to a hardware graphics overlay layer can ***greatly*** improve the performance of slide and fade animations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1201">El administrador de animaciones requiere un lienzo de animación para ejecutar los tipos de animación de atenuación y aparición gradual si se ejecuta con una profundidad de color inferior a 16 bpp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1201">The animation manager does require an animation canvas to execute fade-in and fade-out animation types if running at color depth less than 16 bpp.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1202">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1203">**animation**: puntero a un bloque de control de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1203">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1204">**canvas**: lienzo de memoria usado para implementar la animación de traslación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1204">**canvas** Memory canvas used to implement the translation animation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1205">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1205">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1206">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definición correcta del lienzo de animación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1206">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully defined animation canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1207">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) Estado de animación no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1207">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1208">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) El bloque de memoria proporcionado no es lo suficientemente grande como para crear el lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1208">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) The provided memory block is not large enough to create the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1210">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1210">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1211">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1211">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1212">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1212">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_CANVAS animation_canvas;
GX_ROOT_WINDOW animation_root;
/* Create animation canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_create(
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas control block. */
        “animation_canvas”, /* Name of canvas. */
        display, /* Display control block. */
        GX_ANIMATION_MANAGED, /* Type of canvas. */
        width, /* Width of canvas. */
        height, /* Height of canvas. */
        memory_area, /* Memory area of canvas. */
        memory_size /* Size of canvas memory. */
        );
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Create the root window for the canvas. */
    status = gx_window_root_create(
        &animation_root, /* Root window control block. */
        “animation_root”, /* Name of root window. */
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas of the root window. */ GX_STYLE_NONE, /* Style of the window. */
        GX_ID_NONE, /* Root window ID. */
        &root_size /* Window size. */
        );
}
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Define canvas for the animation. */
    status = gx_animation_canvas_define(&animation,
                &animation_canvas);
}
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new canvas was successfully set to the animation manager. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1221">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1221">gx_animation_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1222">Crear un controlador de animación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1222">Create an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1223">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_create(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1224">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1225">Este servicio crea un controlador de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1225">This service creates an animation controller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1226">El controlador se inicializa en el estado inactivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1226">The controller is initialized to the idle state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1227">No se puede iniciar una animación a menos que esté en estado inactivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1227">One cannot start an animation unless it is in the IDLE state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1228">El puntero de bloque de control GX_ANIMATION se puede obtener mediante gx_system_animation_get() o puede ser un bloque de control definido estáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1228">The GX_ANIMATION control block pointer may be obtained using gx_system_animation_get(), or it may be a statically defined control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1229">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1229">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1230">**animation**: puntero a un bloque de control de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1230">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1231">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1231">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del controlador de animación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created animation controller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1233">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El bloque de control ya se ha inicializado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1233">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Control block already initialized</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1235">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1235">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1236">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1236">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1237">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1237">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* Allocate an animaton control from system pool */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

/* Initialize the control block */

if (animation)
{
    status = gx_animation_create(&animation);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new animation controller was successfully created and initialized. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1248">gx_animation_drag_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1248">gx_animation_drag_disable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1249">Deshabilitar enlace de animación de arrastre de pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1249">Disable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1250">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1250">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_disable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1251">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1251">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1252">Este servicio quita el procedimiento de enlace de animación de arrastre de pantalla de la función de proceso de eventos predeterminada del widget y detiene la secuencia de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1252">This service removes the screen drag animation hook procedure from the widget’s default event process function and stops the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1253">El procedimiento de enlace de animación de arrastre de pantalla controla los eventos de una animación de arrastre de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1253">The screen drag animation hook procedure handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1254">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1255">**animation**: puntero a un bloque de control de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1255">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1256">**widget**: puntero al bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1256">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1257">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1259">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1259">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1260">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1260">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1261">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1261">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1262">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1262">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1263">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1263">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;

/* Disable screen drag animation of “animation_parent”. */
status = gx_animation_drag_disable(&animation, animation_parent);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen drag hook has been removed
    from the event process of “animation_parent”. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1273">gx_animation_drag_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1273">gx_animation_drag_enable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1274">Habilitar enlace de animación de arrastre de pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1274">Enable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1275">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1275">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_enable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation,
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1276">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1276">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1277">Este servicio establece la función de proceso de eventos de animación de arrastre de pantalla definida internamente como un procedimiento de enlace de la función de proceso de eventos predeterminada de un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1277">This service sets the internally defined screen drag animation event process function as a hook procedure of a widget’s default event process function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1278">La función de proceso de eventos de animación de arrastre de pantalla controla los eventos de una animación de arrastre de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1278">The screen drag animation event process function handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1279">El procedimiento de enlace de arrastre de pantalla se convierte en el controlador predeterminado para los eventos de entrada de lápiz enviados al widget de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1279">The screen drag hook procedure becomes the default handler for pen input events sent to the target widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1280">La función de procesamiento de eventos del widget original se llama en un modo de cadena margarita después de comprobar los tipos de evento de entrada de arrastre de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1280">The original widget event processing function is called in a daisy-chain fashion after checking for screen drag input event types.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1281">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1281">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1282">**animation**: puntero a un bloque de control de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1282">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1283">**widget**: puntero al bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1283">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1284">**info**: información de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1284">**info** Animation information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1285">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1285">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1286">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1286">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1287">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Estado de animación no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1287">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1288">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1288">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1289">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1289">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1290">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) No se proporciona la lista de diapositivas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1290">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Slide screen list is not provided</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1291">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1291">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1292">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1292">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1293">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1293">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_ANIMATION_INFO info;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;
GX_WIDGET *screen_list[] = {
    screen_1,
    screen_2,
    screen_3,
    GX_NULL
}

memset(&info, 0, sizeof(GX_ANIMATION_INFO);
info.gx_animation_parent = animation_parent;

/* If GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP is set, the screen list will wrap itself. */
info.gx_animation_style = GX_ANIMATION_SCREEN_DRAG |
                          GX_ANIMATION_HORIZONTAL |
                          GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP;
info.gx_animation_frame_interval = 1;
info.gx_animation_slide_screen_list = screen_list;

status = gx_animation_drag_enable(&animation, animation_parent,
                                  info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen slide animinatin event
    process function has been set as a hook procedure of
    “animation_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_landing_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1303">gx_animation_landing_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1303">gx_animation_landing_speed_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1304">Establecer la velocidad de aterrizaje para la animación de arrastre de pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1304">Set landing speed for screen drag animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1305">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1305">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_landing_speed_set(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    USHORT shift_per_step);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1306">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1306">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1307">Este servicio establece la velocidad de aterrizaje de la animación de arrastre de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1307">This service sets the landing speed for screen drag animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1308">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1309">**animation**: puntero a un bloque de control de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1309">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1310">**shift_per_step**: distancia de desplazamiento de cada paso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1310">**shift_per_step** Shift distance for each step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1311">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1311">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1312">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1312">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1313">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Parámetro no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1313">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1314">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1315">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1315">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1316">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1316">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set landing speed of “my_animation” to 20. */
status = gx_animation_landing_peed_set(&my_animation, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the landing speed is successfully set to 20. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1326">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1326">gx_animation_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1327">Iniciar una animación controlada por temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1327">Start a timer-driven animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1328">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1328">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_start(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *params);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1329">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1329">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1330">Este servicio inicia una secuencia de animación mediante una instancia de animación creada anteriormente y un nuevo conjunto de parámetros de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1330">This service initiates an animation sequence using a previously created animation instance and a new set of animation parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1331">Esta función realiza una copia local de los parámetros, lo que significa que no es necesario definir estáticamente la estructura de parámetros.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1331">This function makes a local copy of the parameters, meaning the parameter structure does not need to be statically defined.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1332">La aplicación puede definir estáticamente la estructura de control GX_ANIMATION, o bien se puede obtener mediante la API gx_system_animation_get().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1332">The GX_ANIMATION control structure can be statically defined by the application, or it can be obtained using the gx_system_animation_get() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1333">La estructura GX_ANIMATION_INFO define los parámetros de la animación que se va a ejecutar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1333">The GX_ANIMATION_INFO structure defines the parameters of the animation to be executed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1334">Para obtener una descripción completa de esta estructura y el significado de cada campo, consulte la sección del componente de animación GUIX en el capítulo 3 de este manual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1334">For a complete description of this structure and the meaning of each field, refer to the GUIX Animation Component section in Chapter 3 of this manual.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1335">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1336">**animation**: puntero a un bloque de control de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1336">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1337">**params**: puntero a la estructura de parámetros.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1337">**params** Pointer to parameter structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1338">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1340">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Parámetro no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1340">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid parameter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Destino de animación no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid animation target</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1343">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Estado de animación no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1343">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1344">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo de animación no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1344">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid animation canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1345">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1345">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1346">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1346">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1347">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1347">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION_INFO params;
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* obtain an animation control block pointer */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);
if (animation)
{
    /* define a slide down and to the right */
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_x = 0;
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_y = 0;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_x = 100;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_y = 200;
    params.gx_animation_style= GX_ANIMATION_TRANSLATE;
    params.gx_animation_target = &my_window;
    params.gx_animation_parent = root_window;
    params.gx_animation_start_alpha = 255;
    params.gx_animation_end_alpha = 255;

    params.gx_animation_delay_before = 0;
    params.gx_animation_steps = 10;
    params.gx_animation_tick_rate = 2;

    status = gx_animation_start(&animation, &params);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation is initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1357">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1357">gx_animation_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1358">Detener una animación activa controlada por temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1358">Stop an active timer-driven animation</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_stop(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1360">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1360">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1361">Detenga una animación iniciada previamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1361">Stop a previously started animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1362">Si se asignó el puntero de bloque de control de animación mediante gx_system_animation_get, la aplicación puede volver a usar el bloque de control o devolverlo al grupo del sistema mediante gx_system_animation_free().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1362">If the animation control block pointer was allocated using gx_system_animation_get, the application can re-use the control block or return it to the system pool using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1367">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1367">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1368">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Estado de controlador no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1368">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid controller status</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_count_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1380">gx_binres_language_count_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1380">gx_binres_language_count_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1381">Devolver el número de idiomas presentes en los datos de recursos binarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1381">Return the number of languages present in binary resource data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1382">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1382">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_count_get(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_VALUE *returned_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1383">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1383">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1384">Este servicio analiza un encabezado de datos de recursos binarios para devolver el número de idiomas incluidos en los datos binarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1384">This service parses a binary resource data header to return the number of languages contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1385">Esto resulta útil para las aplicaciones que deben mostrar una lista de selección al usuario ya que le permite seleccionar entre varios idiomas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1385">This is useful for applications that must display a selection list to the user allowing the user to select from a choice of languages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1386">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1386">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1387">**root_address**: dirección de datos de recursos binarios en memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1387">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1388">**return_count**: ubicación para almacenar el recuento de idiomas devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1388">**return_count** Location to store returned language count</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1389">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1389">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1390">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1390">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1391">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Recurso binario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1391">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1392">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1392">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1393">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1394">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1394">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1395">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1395">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE language_count = 0;

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE    *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_count_get(root_address,
    &language_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1396">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1396">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1397">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1397">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_info_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1398">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1398">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1399">Cargar información de la tabla de idiomas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1399">Load language table information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1400">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_info_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_LANGUAGE_HEDAER *put_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1401">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1402">Este servicio analiza un blob de datos de recursos binarios para rellenar una matriz de estructuras de GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER, que informa a la aplicación de los nombres de idioma y del tamaño de la tabla de cadenas de cada idioma contenido en los datos binarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1402">This service parses a binary resource data blob to populate an array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures, informing the application of the language names and string table size of each language contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1403">La aplicación debe llamar primero a gx_binres_language_count_get() para determinar el número de idiomas incluidos en los datos binarios, y asegurarse de que el puntero put_info pasado a esta función apunta a una matriz de estructuras GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER de language_count.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1403">The application should first call gx_binres_language_count_get() to determine the number of languages within the binary data, and insure that the put_info pointer passed to this function points to an array of language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1404">La aplicación usa este servicio para determinar en tiempo de ejecución el contenido de un fragmento de datos de recursos binarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1404">This service is used by application to determine at runtime the content of a binary resource data chunk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1405">La estructura GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER se define de la siguiente manera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1405">The GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structure is defined as:</span></span>

```c
typedef struct GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_STRUCT{
    USHORT gx_language_header_magic_number;
    USHORT gx_language_header_index;
    UCHAR gx_language_header_name[GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_NAME_SIZE];
    ULONG  gx_language_header_data_size;
} GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER;
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1406">El campo *magic_number* se usa para la validación interna del formato de datos de recursos binarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1406">The *magic_number* field is used for internal validation of the binary resource data format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1407">El campo *header_index* indica el orden en el que los idiomas están definidos en los datos binarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1407">The *header_index* field indicates the order in which the languages are defined in the binary data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1408">El campo *header_name* contiene el nombre del idioma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1408">The *header_name* field contains the language name.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1409">El campo *header_data_size* contiene el tamaño de los datos de la tabla de cadenas de idiomas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1409">The *header_data_size* field contains the data size of the language string table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1410">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1410">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1411">**root_address**: dirección de datos de recursos binarios en memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1411">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1412">**put_info**: puntero a una matriz de estructuras GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1412">**put_info** Pointer to array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1413">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1413">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1415">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Recurso binario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1415">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1417">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1417">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_table_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1422">gx_binres_language_table_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1422">gx_binres_language_table_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1423">Cargar recurso de tabla de idiomas (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1423">Load language table resource (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1424">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1424">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_table_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_UBYTE **returned_language_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1425">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1425">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1426">Esta API en desuso permite a las aplicaciones cargar datos de la tabla de cadenas desde archivos de datos de recursos binarios anteriores a la versión 5.6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1426">This deprecated API allows applications to load string table data from older (prior to release 5.6) binary resource data files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1427">Las nuevas aplicaciones deben usar gx_binres_language_table_load_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1427">New applications should use gx_binres_language_table_load_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1428">Este servicio crea una estructura de tabla de idiomas que contiene punteros a los recursos de la tabla, las estructuras de datos generadas apuntan a los datos de recursos "en contexto", no copian los datos de recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1428">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1429">Los datos de recursos se deben colocar en una ubicación de memoria de acceso general y la dirección base de esta ubicación de memoria se pasa a esta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1429">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1430">Este servicio requiere un bloque de memoria asignado en tiempo de ejecución de tamaño suficiente para contener la estructura de la tabla de idiomas y, por lo tanto, se debe invocar la API gx_system_memory_allocator_set una vez antes de que se solicite este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1430">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1431">La tabla de idiomas devuelta define una o varias tablas de cadenas, cada una de las cuales contiene punteros a recursos de cadena en la memoria de datos de recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1431">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1432">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1433">**root_address**: dirección de datos de recursos binarios en memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1433">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1434">**returned_language_table**: puntero a la tabla de idiomas cargada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1434">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1435">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1437">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Recurso binario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1437">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1439">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) No se ha definido la función de asignador o de liberación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1439">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1440">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1441">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1442">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1442">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_UBYTE ***language_table = GX_NULL;

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_table_load(root_address,
                                        &language_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

## <a name="gx_binres_language_table_load_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1445">gx_binres_language_table_load_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1445">gx_binres_language_table_load_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1446">Cargar recurso de tabla de idiomas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1446">Load language table resource</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1447">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1447">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_STRING **returned_language_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1448">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1448">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1449">Este servicio crea una estructura de tabla de idiomas que contiene punteros a los recursos de la tabla, las estructuras de datos generadas apuntan a los datos de recursos "en contexto", no copian los datos de recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1449">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1450">Los datos de recursos se deben colocar en una ubicación de memoria de acceso general y la dirección base de esta ubicación de memoria se pasa a esta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1450">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1451">Este servicio requiere un bloque de memoria asignado en tiempo de ejecución de tamaño suficiente para contener la estructura de la tabla de idiomas y, por lo tanto, se debe invocar la API gx_system_memory_allocator_set una vez antes de que se solicite este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1451">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1452">La tabla de idiomas devuelta define una o varias tablas de cadenas, cada una de las cuales contiene punteros a recursos de cadena en la memoria de datos de recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1452">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1453">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1453">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1454">**root_address**: dirección de datos de recursos binarios en memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1454">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1455">**returned_language_table**: puntero a la tabla de idiomas cargada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1455">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1456">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1456">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1458">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Recurso binario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1458">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1460">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) No se ha definido la función de asignador o de liberación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1460">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1461">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1461">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING **language_table = GX_NULL;
```

## <a name="gx_binres_theme_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1466">gx_binres_theme_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1466">gx_binres_theme_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1467">Cargar recurso de tema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1467">Load theme resource</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1468">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1468">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_theme_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    INT theme_id, GX_THEME **returned_theme);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1469">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1469">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1470">Este servicio crea una estructura GX_THEME que contiene punteros a las tablas de recursos para el tema solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1470">This service builds up a GX_THEME structure containing pointers to the resource tables for the requested theme.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1471">Las estructuras de datos generadas apuntan a los datos de recursos "en contexto", no copian los datos de recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1471">The generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1472">Por lo tanto, los datos de recursos se deben colocar en una ubicación de memoria de acceso general y la dirección base de esta ubicación de memoria se pasa a esta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1472">So the resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1473">Este servicio requiere un bloque de memoria asignado en tiempo de ejecución de tamaño suficiente para contener la estructura de la tabla de temas y, por lo tanto, se debe invocar la API gx_system_memory_allocator_set una vez antes de que se solicite este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1473">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the theme table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1474">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1474">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1475">**root_address**: dirección de datos de recursos binarios en memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1475">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1476">**theme_id**: el identificador del tema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1476">**theme_id** The identifier of the theme</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1477">**returned_theme**: puntero al tema cargado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1477">**returned_theme** Pointer to loaded theme</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1478">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1480">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Recurso binario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1480">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Id. de tema no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid theme ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1483">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) No se ha definido la función de asignador o de liberación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1483">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1484">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1485">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1485">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1486">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1486">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *theme = GX_NULL;
GX_UBYTE *root_address = 0x60000000;
INT theme_id = 0;

status = gx_binres_theme_load(root_address, theme_id, &theme);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the theme was successfully loaded. */
```

## <a name="gx_brush_default"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1489">gx_brush_default</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1489">gx_brush_default</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1490">Establecer el pincel predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1490">Set the default brush</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1491">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1491">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_brush_default(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1492">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1492">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1493">Este servicio establece el pincel para el contexto actual en el valor predeterminado del sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1493">This service sets the brush for the current context to the system default value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1494">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1494">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1495">**brush**: puntero al bloque de control del pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1495">**brush** Pointer to brush control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1496">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1496">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1497">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definición correcta del pincel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1497">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful brush definition</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1498">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de pincel no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1498">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid brush pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1499">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1499">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1500">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1500">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1501">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1501">Example</span></span>

```C
/*Reset the brush to its default value. */
status = gx_brush_default(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush was successfully reset to its default value. */

```

## <a name="gx_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1504">gx_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1504">gx_brush_define</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1505">Definir pincel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1505">Define brush</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1506">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1506">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_brush_define(
    GX_BRUSH *brush, 
    GX_COLOR line_color, 
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1507">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1507">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1508">Este servicio define un pincel con el color de línea, el color de relleno y el estilo especificados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1508">This service defines a brush with the specified line color, fill color and style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1509">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1509">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1510">**brush**: puntero al bloque de control del pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1510">**brush** Pointer to brush control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1511">**line_color**: color de la línea del pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1511">**line_color** Color of brush line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1512">El **apéndice A** contiene los colores predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1512">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1513">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1513">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1514">**fill_color**: color del relleno del pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1514">**fill_color** Color of brush fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1515">El **apéndice A** contiene los colores predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1515">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1516">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1516">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1517">**style**: estilo del pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1517">**style** Brush style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1518">En el **apéndice D** se describen los estilos de pincel admitidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1518">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1519">Los estilos de pincel se pueden combinar en una variable mediante la operación OR bit a bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1519">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1520">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definición correcta del pincel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful brush definition</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1522">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de pincel no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1522">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid brush pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1523">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1523">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1524">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1524">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1525">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1525">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a brush. */
status = gx_brush_define(&my_brush, GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                         GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush was successfully created. */
```
