## <a name="gx_button_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1528">gx_button_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1528">gx_button_background_draw</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1529">Dibujar fondo de botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1529">Draw button background</span></span>

###<a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1530">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_background_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1531">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1532">Este servicio dibuja el fondo del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1532">This service draws the button background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1533">Normalmente, la función gx_button_draw llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudar a escribir funciones de dibujo personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1533">This function is normally called internally by the gx_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1534">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1534">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1535">**button**: puntero a un bloque de control de botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1535">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1536">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1536">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1537">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1537">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1538">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1538">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1539">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1539">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1540">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1540">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Draw button background. */
    gx_button_background_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1555">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1555">gx_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1556">Botón Crear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1556">Create button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1557">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1557">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_create(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1558">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1558">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1559">Este servicio crea un botón tal y como se especifica, y asocia el botón al widget primario proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1559">This service creates a button as specified and associates the button with the supplied parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1560">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1560">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1561">**button**: puntero a un bloque de control de botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1561">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1562">**name**: nombre lógico del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1562">**name** Logical name of button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1563">**parent**: puntero al widget primario del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1563">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1564">**style**: estilo de botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1564">**style** Button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1565">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1565">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1566">**button_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1566">**button_id** Application-defined ID of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1567">**size**: tamaño del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1567">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1568">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1570">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1570">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1571">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1571">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1572">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1572">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1573">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1573">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1574">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1574">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1575">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1575">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1576">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1576">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BUTTON my_top_button;

/* Create a stop button. */
status = gx_button_create(&my_stop_button, "my stop button",
                            &my_parent_window,
                            GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE,
                            MY_STOP_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the stop button was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_button_deselect"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1591">gx_button_deselect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1591">gx_button_deselect</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1592">Anular selección de botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1592">Deselect button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1593">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1593">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_deselect(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_BOOL gen_event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1594">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1594">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1595">Este servicio anula la selección del botón especificado y genera un evento de señal en función de los estilos de botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1595">This service deselects the specified button and generate a signal event depending on button styles.</span></span>


| <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1596">Estilo de botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1596">Button Style</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1597">Señal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1597">Signal</span></span>                     |
|---------------------------|----------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1598">Ninguno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1598">None</span></span>                      | <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1599">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1599">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1600">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1600">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span></span>  | <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1601">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1601">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1602">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1602">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1603">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1603">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span></span>     |



### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1604">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1604">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1605">**button**: puntero a un bloque de control de botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1605">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1606">**gen_event**: si es GX_TRUE, el botón generará un evento GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT o GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET según el estilo del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1606">**gen_event** If GX_TRUE, the button will generate a GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT, or GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET event depending on the button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1607">Si GX_FALSE, el botón no generará ningún evento de nivel superior aunque lo haría normalmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1607">If GX_FALSE, the button will not generate any higher level event even if it would normally do so.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1630">gx_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1630">gx_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1631">Dibujar botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1631">Draw button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1632">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1632">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1633">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1633">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1634">Este servicio dibuja el botón especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1634">This service draws the specified button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1635">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de botón personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1635">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1636">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1637">**button**: puntero a un bloque de control de botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1637">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1638">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1638">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1639">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1639">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1640">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1640">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1641">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1641">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1642">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1642">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom button draw function. */
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default button draw. */
    gx_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1657">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1657">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1658">Procesar evento de botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1658">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1659">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1660">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1661">Este servicio procesa un evento para el botón especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1661">This service processes an event for the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1662">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1662">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1663">**button**: puntero a un bloque de control de botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1663">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1664">**event_ptr**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1664">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1665">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1666">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto de evento de botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1666">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1668">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1668">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1669">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1669">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1670">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1670">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1671">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1671">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1723">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1723">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1724">Establecer el valor de combinación alfa para el lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1724">Set alpha-blend value for canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1725">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_alpha_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1726">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1727">Este servicio establece el valor de combinación alfa para el lienzo especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1727">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1728">Los valores alfa del lienzo pueden oscilar entre 0 (transparente) y 255 (totalmente opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1728">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1729">La combinación de lienzos de superposición requiere la compatibilidad de la capa de gráficos de hardware o la compatibilidad del software a través de la creación de un lienzo compuesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1729">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1730">La compatibilidad de hardware para la combinación de lienzos se habilita mediante la invocación de la API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() antes de establecer el valor alfa del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1730">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1731">Cuando un lienzo se enlaza a una capa de gráficos de hardware, al llamar a la API gx_canvas_alpha_set(), se invoca directamente los servicios de combinación de capas de gráficos de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1731">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1732">Para usar la compatibilidad de software con la combinación de lienzos, la aplicación debe crear un lienzo con estilo GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE, en el que todos los demás lienzos administrados se componen antes de la pantalla final.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1732">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1733">La compatibilidad de software para la combinación de lienzos solo se proporciona cuando se ejecuta con un controlador de pantalla de una profundidad de color de 16 bpp o superior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1733">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1734">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1735">**canvas**: puntero al bloque de control del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1735">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1736">**alpha**: valor de combinación alfa, intervalo desde 0 (transparente) hasta 255 (opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1736">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1737">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1737">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1738">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de valor de combinación alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1738">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1739">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1739">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1741">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Lienzo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1741">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1742">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1743">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1743">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1744">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1744">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1754">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1754">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1755">Dibujar arco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1755">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1756">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1757">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1758">Este servicio dibuja un arco de circunferencia en el lienzo con el pincel actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1758">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1759">El arco de circunferencia se recorta en la región no válida del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1759">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1760">Este servicio requiere la definición de GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1760">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1761">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1762">**xcenter**: posición X del centro del arco de la circunferencia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1762">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1763">**ycenter**: posición Y del centro del arco de la circunferencia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1763">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1764">**r**: radio del arco de la circunferencia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1764">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1765">**start_angle**: ángulo inicial del arco de la circunferencia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1765">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1766">**end_angle**: ángulo final del arco de la circunferencia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1766">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1767">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1767">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1768">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto del arco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1768">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1769">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1769">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1770">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1770">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1771">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo abierto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1771">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1772">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1772">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1773">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1773">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1774">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1774">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_arc_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1787">gx_canvas_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1787">gx_canvas_block_move</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1788">Mover bloque de píxeles del lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1788">Move block of canvas pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1789">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1789">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_block_move(GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    GX_VALUE x_shift, GX_VALUE y_shift, GX_RECTANGLE *dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1790">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1790">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1791">Este servicio mueve un bloque de datos de píxeles del lienzo en la dirección especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1791">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1792">GUIX usa este servicio internamente para realizar un desplazamiento rápido, pero también lo puede usar el software de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1792">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1793">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1793">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1794">**block**: coordenadas del área que se va a mover.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1794">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1795">**x_shift**: número de píxeles que se van a desplazar en el eje X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1795">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1796">**x_shift**: número de píxeles que se van a desplazar en el eje Y.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1796">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1797">**dirty**: si el movimiento del bloque se realiza correctamente, esta función devuelve la parte del rectángulo de origen que todavía tiene modificaciones al autor de la llamada en este parámetro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1797">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1798">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1798">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1799">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Movimiento de bloque correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1799">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1800">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) No se pudo mover el bloque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1800">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1803">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1803">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1804">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1804">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1805">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1805">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1818">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1818">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1819">Dibujar círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1819">Draw circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1820">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1820">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_circle_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1821">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1821">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1822">Este servicio dibuja un círculo en el lienzo con el pincel actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1822">This service draws a circle on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1823">El círculo se recorta en la región no válida del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1823">The circle is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1824">Este servicio requiere la definición de GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1824">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1825">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1825">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1826">**xcenter**: coordenada X del centro del círculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1826">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the circle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1827">**ycenter**: coordenada Y del centro del círculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1827">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1828">**r**: radio del círculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1828">**r** Radius of the circle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1829">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1829">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1830">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto de círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1830">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1831">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1831">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1832">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Radio de círculo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1832">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1833">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo abierto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1833">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1834">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1834">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1835">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1835">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1836">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1836">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Draw a circle of radius 10 centered at (100, 100). */
status = gx_canvas_circle_draw(100, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circle has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1849">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1849">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1850">Crear lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1850">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1851">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1852">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1853">Este servicio crea el lienzo con las propiedades especificadas y la memoria asociada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1853">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1854">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1854">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1855">**canvas**: puntero al bloque de control del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1855">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1856">**name**: nombre lógico del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1856">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1857">**display**: puntero a la pantalla creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1857">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1858">**type**: tipo de lienzo. Entre los tipos de se incluyen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1858">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1859">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** lienzo de memoria que se usa para dibujar fuera de la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1859">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1860">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** lienzo que se vacía automáticamente en la pantalla activa, ya sea como parte del proceso de creación compuesto o como parte de la operación de alternancia de búfer para arquitecturas de un solo lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1860">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1861">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** esta marca se puede usar para activar y desactivar un lienzo, sin perder el contenido del dibujo que contiene.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1861">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1862">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** reservado para uso futuro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1862">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1863">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** la aplicación usa esta marca al configurar un sistema de varios lienzos que compondrá varios lienzos administrados en el lienzo compuesto, y este se conduce al búfer de fotogramas del hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1863">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1864">**width**: ancho en píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1864">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1865">**height**: altura en píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1865">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1866">**memory_area**: área de memoria del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1866">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1867">Este valor puede ser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1867">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1868">**GX_NULL** en el momento de la creación del lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1868">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1869">**e** inicializarse posteriormente mediante gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1869">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1870">**memory_size**: tamaño del área de memoria en bytes, o 0 si la memoria del lienzo se definirá después de crear el lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1870">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1871">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1871">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1874">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1874">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1875">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1875">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1876">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Tamaño de bloque de control de lienzo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1876">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1877">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Tipo de lienzo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1877">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1878">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1878">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1879">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1879">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1880">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1880">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1885">gx_canvas_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1885">gx_canvas_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1886">Eliminar lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1886">Delete canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1887">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1887">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1888">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1889">Este servicio elimina el lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1889">This service deletes the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1890">El lienzo se quita de la lista interna de lienzos vinculados mantenida por GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1890">The canvas is removed from the internal linked list of canvas maintained by GUIX.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1893">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1893">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1897">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1897">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1898">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1898">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1899">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1899">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1908">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1908">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1909">Completar dibujo de lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1909">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1910">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1910">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1911">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1911">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1912">Este servicio permite que GUIX sepa que el dibujo de la aplicación en el lienzo especificado se ha completado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1912">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1913">La aplicación puede usar este servicio para forzar el dibujo inmediato en un lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1913">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1914">Esto vacía el lienzo en el búfer de fotogramas visible o desencadena una operación de alternancia de depurador, en función de la arquitectura de la memoria del sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1914">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1915">Solo la aplicación debe llamar a este servicio para cerrar una secuencia de dibujo iniciada con gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1915">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1916">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1916">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1917">**canvas**: puntero al bloque de control del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1917">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1918">**flush**: si **_GX_TRUE_**, los cambios de lienzo se vacían en la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1918">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1919">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1920">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Finalización correcta del dibujo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1920">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1922">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1922">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1923">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1923">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1932">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1932">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1933">Iniciar dibujo de lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1933">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1934">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1934">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1935">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1936">Este servicio inicia el dibujo en el lienzo especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1936">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1937">Se llama a este servicio internamente como parte de la operación de dibujo aplazada realizada automáticamente por GUIX cuando es necesario actualizar un lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1937">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1938">Sin embargo, se permite que la aplicación omita el algoritmo de dibujo diferido de GUIX y que realice dibujos inmediatos y directos en un lienzo llamando en primer lugar a gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, luego a las funciones de dibujo deseadas y, por último, a gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1938">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1939">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1940">**canvas**: puntero al bloque de control del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1940">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1941">**who**: puntero al bloque de control del widget del autor de la llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1941">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1942">Este parámetro se usa para inicializar el recorte de dibujo y los parámetros de vista para operaciones de dibujo posteriores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1942">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1943">**dirty_area**: área en la que se va a dibujar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1943">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1944">El autor de la llamada pasa este parámetro para indicar el área en la que el autor de la llamada quiere recortar todas las operaciones de dibujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1944">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1945">Normalmente, es el área marcada anteriormente como con modificaciones, pero el autor de la llamada es libre de expandir o contraer el área de recorte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1945">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1946">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Iniciación correcta del dibujo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1948">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Se superó el número máximo de anidamientos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1948">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1949">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No hay ninguna ventanilla para el autor de la llamada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1949">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1950">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1950">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1951">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1951">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1952">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1952">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1953">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1953">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1954">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1954">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1955">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1955">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1960">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1960">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1962">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1962">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1963">Dibujar elipse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1963">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1964">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1964">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1965">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1965">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1966">Este servicio dibuja una elipse en el lienzo con el pincel actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1966">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1967">La elipse se recorta en la región no válida del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1967">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1968">Este servicio requiere la definición de GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1968">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1969">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1969">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1970">**xcenter**: coordenada X del centro de la elipse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1970">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1971">**ycenter**: coordenada Y del centro de la elipse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1971">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1972">**a**: longitud del eje semiprincipal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1972">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1973">**b**: longitud del eje semisecundario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1973">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1974">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto de círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1977">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1977">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo abierto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1979">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1979">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1980">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1980">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1981">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1981">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1994">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1994">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1995">Enlazar lienzo a capa de gráficos de hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1995">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1996">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1996">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-1997">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1997">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-1998">Este servicio enlaza un lienzo de dibujo de GUIX a una capa de gráficos de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1998">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-1999">Este servicio solo es necesario para los dispositivos de hardware que admiten varias capas de gráficos de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-1999">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2000">Al enlazar un lienzo a una capa de gráficos de hardware, se implementan directamente las API gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set() y gx_canvas_offset_set() mediante los servicios de controlador de pantalla de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2000">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2001">Si el controlador de pantalla de hardware no admite varias capas de gráficos, este servicio no podrá devolver GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2001">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2002">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2003">**canvas**: lienzo que se va a implementar en el hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2003">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2004">**layer**: capa de gráficos de hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2004">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2005">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Enlace correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2007">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) El servicio de capa de pantalla no está definido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2007">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Punteros no válidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2009">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2009">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2010">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2010">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2011">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) No compatible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2011">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2012">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2012">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2013">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2013">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2014">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2014">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Binds the canvas to the hardware graphics layer 1. */
status = gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(&my_canvas, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drawing canvas is bound to the
    hardware graphics. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2018">gx_canvas_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2018">gx_canvas_hide</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2019">Ocultar un lienzo, hacer que sea invisible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2019">Hide a canvas, making it invisible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2020">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2021">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2021">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2022">Este servicio oculta un lienzo de GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2022">This service hides a GUIX canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2023">Si el lienzo se ha enlazado a una capa de gráficos de hardware mediante gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), este servicio se implementa mediante la compatibilidad de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2023">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), this service is implemented using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2024">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2024">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2025">**canvas**: el lienzo que se va a ocultar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2025">**canvas** canvas to be hidden</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2026">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2027">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ocultación correcta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2027">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2028">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2028">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2029">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Punteros no válidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2029">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2030">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2030">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2031">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2032">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2033">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2033">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make my_canvas invisible. */
status = gx_canvas_hide(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas has been hidden. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_line_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2043">gx_canvas_line_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2043">gx_canvas_line_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2044">Dibujar línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2044">Draw line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2045">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2045">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_line_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_VALUE x_end, 
    GX_VALUE y_end);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2046">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2046">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2047">Este servicio dibuja una línea en el lienzo con el pincel actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2047">This service draws a line on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2048">La línea se recorta en la región no válida del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2048">The line is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2049">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2050">**x_start**: posición X de inicio de la línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2050">**x_start** Starting x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2051">**y_end**: posición Y de inicio de la línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2051">**y_end** Starting y-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2052">**x_start**: posición X de fin de la línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2052">**x_start** Ending x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2053">**y_end**: posición Y de fin de la línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2053">**y_end** Ending y-position of the line</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2054">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2054">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2055">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto de la línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2055">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2056">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2056">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2057">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2057">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2058">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo abierto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2058">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2059">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Ancho de pincel no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2059">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Invalid brush width</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2060">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2060">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2061">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2061">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2062">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2062">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw line on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_line_draw(0, 1, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2076">Definir memoria del lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2076">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2077">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2077">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2078">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2078">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2079">Este servicio se puede usar para asignar la dirección de memoria del lienzo una vez que este se haya creado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2079">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2080">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2080">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2081">**canvas**: puntero al lienzo creado previamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2081">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2082">**memory**: dirección de memoria del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2082">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2083">**memsize**: tamaño del bloque de memoria del lienzo en bytes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2083">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2084">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2084">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2085">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Asignación correcta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2085">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Bloque de control no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2088">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2088">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2089">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2089">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2090">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2090">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2095">Definir la imagen del cursor del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2095">Define the mouse cursor image</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2096">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_define(GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2097">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2098">Este servicio define la información del mouse para el lienzo especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2098">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2099">Este servicio requiere la definición de GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2099">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2100">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2100">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2101">**canvas**: puntero al bloque de control del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2101">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2102">**info**: puntero a la información del cursor del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2102">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2103">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2103">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2104">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2104">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la información del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2108">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2108">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2109">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2109">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2110">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2110">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```
