## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2114">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2114">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2115">Desactivar el cursor del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2115">Turn off the mouse cursor</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2116">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2116">Prototype</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2118">Este servicio oculta el cursor del mouse en el lienzo especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2118">This service makes the mouse cursor hidden from the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2119">Este servicio requiere la definición de GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2119">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2133">gx_canvas_mouse_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2133">gx_canvas_mouse_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2134">Activar el cursor del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2134">Turn on the mouse cursor</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2135">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2135">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2136">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2136">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2137">Este servicio hace que el cursor del mouse esté visible en el lienzo especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2137">This service makes the mouse cursor visible for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2138">Este servicio requiere la definición de GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2138">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2139">Se debe invocar la API gx_canvas_mouse_define para definir la imagen del cursor del mouse antes de solicitar este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2139">The gx_canvas_mouse_define API should be invoked to define the mouse cursor image before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2140">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2140">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2141">**canvas**: puntero al bloque de control del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2141">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2142">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2142">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2143">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la información del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2143">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2144">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Error al mostrar el cursor del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2144">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2145">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2145">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
/* Make mouse cursor hidden ”. */
status = gx_canvas_mouse_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse of “my_canvas” has been
hidden successfully. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2154">Asignar desplazamiento de pantalla X,Y del lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2154">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2155">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2155">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2156">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2156">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2157">Este servicio asigna un desplazamiento de pantalla X,Y para el lienzo especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2157">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2158">Controla la posición en la que se compone el lienzo en el búfer de fotogramas visible y, a menudo, se usa cuando el lienzo es más pequeño que la pantalla física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2158">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2159">Si el lienzo se ha enlazado a una capa de gráficos de hardware mediante la API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), el servicio gx_canvas_offset_set se implementa directamente con la compatibilidad de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2159">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2160">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2160">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2161">**canvas**: puntero al bloque de control del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2161">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2162">**x**: coordenada X de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2162">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2163">**y**: coordenada Y de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2163">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2164">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2164">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Asignación correcta de desplazamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2168">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2168">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2169">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2169">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2170">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2170">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2171">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2171">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_offset_set(&my_canvas, 20, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
position 20,30. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2176">gx_canvas_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2176">gx_canvas_initiate,</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2182">Dibujar un gráfico circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2182">Draw pie</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2183">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2183">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2184">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2184">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2185">Este servicio dibuja un gráfico circular en el lienzo utilizando el pincel del contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2185">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2186">El gráfico circular se recorta en la región no válida del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2186">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2187">Este servicio requiere la definición de la opción de configuración GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2187">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2188">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2189">**xcenter**: posición X del centro del gráfico circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2189">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2190">**ycenter**: posición Y del centro del gráfico circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2190">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2191">**r**: radio del gráfico circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2191">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2192">**start_angle**: ángulo inicial del gráfico circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2192">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2193">**end_angle**: ángulo final del gráfico circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2193">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2194">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2194">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto del arco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo abierto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2199">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2199">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2200">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2200">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2201">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2201">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a pie from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_pie_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pie has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2214">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2214">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2215">Dibujar píxel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2215">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2216">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2216">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2217">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2217">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2218">Este servicio dibuja un píxel en el lienzo utilizando el color de línea del pincel del contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2218">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2219">Si se define la opción de configuración GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT, mezcla el píxel con los otros; de lo contrario, dibuja el píxel como totalmente opaco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2219">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2220">**point**: posición X,Y del píxel que se va a dibujar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2220">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2221">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2221">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto del mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo abierto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2225">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2225">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2226">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2226">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2227">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2227">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2233">Combinar mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2233">Blend pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2234">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2234">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2235">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2235">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2236">Este servicio combina un mapa de píxeles con el fondo del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2236">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2237">El autor de la llamada especifica la proporción de la combinación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2237">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2238">El valor alfa puede oscilar entre 0 (totalmente transparente) y 255 (totalmente opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2238">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2239">El mapa de píxeles también puede incluir un canal alfa interno, que se combina con el valor de combinación de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2239">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2240">Este servicio solo es compatible con los controladores de pantalla que se ejecutan con una profundidad de color de 16 bpp y superior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2240">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2241">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2242">**x_start**: posición X de inicio del mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2242">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2243">**y_end**: posición Y de inicio del mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2243">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2244">**pixelmap**: puntero al mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2244">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2245">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2245">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto del mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) No compatible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo abierto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2251">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2251">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2252">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2252">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2253">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2253">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

GX_PIXELMAP *map;
gx_system_pixelmap_get(ID_MY_PIXELMAP, &map);

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(10, 20, map, 128);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been blended onto the current canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2281">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2281">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2282">Obtener mapa de píxeles del lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2282">Get canvas pixelmap</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2300">Dibujar mapa de píxeles girado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2300">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2301">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2302">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2303">Este servicio gira un mapa de píxeles en el ángulo especificado y representa el mapa de píxeles en el lienzo directamente a medida que se realiza la rotación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2303">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2304">Este servicio difiere de gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate en que la salida de la rotación se representa directamente en la memoria del lienzo y que el mapa de píxeles girado no se devuelve al autor de la llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2304">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2305">La ventaja de este servicio sobre gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate es que no se necesita memoria adicional para retener el mapa de píxeles girado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2305">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2306">El inconveniente es que el código de rotación se debe ejecutar cada vez que se dibuja el mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2306">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2307">El recorte y la validación de la ventanilla se aplican durante la representación del mapa de píxeles girado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2307">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2308">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2309">**x_position**: posición X de inicio del mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2309">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2310">**x_position**: posición Y de inicio del mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2310">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2311">**pixelmap**: puntero al mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2311">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2312">**angle**: ángulo que se va a girar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2312">**angle** Angle to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2313">**rot_cx**: coordenada X del centro de rotación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2313">**rot_cx** X-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2314">Si este valor se establece en -1, el centro de la imagen se utiliza como centro de rotación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2314">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the rotation center.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2315">**rot_cy**: coordenada Y del centro de rotación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2315">**rot_cy** Y-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2316">Si este valor se establece en -1, el centro de la imagen se utiliza como centro de rotación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2316">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the center of rotation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2317">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2317">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2318">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto del mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2318">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2319">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2319">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
    -1, -1);

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2330">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2330">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2331">Colocar en mosaico el mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2331">Tile pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2332">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2332">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile(
    GX_RECTANGLE *fill,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2333">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2333">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2334">Este servicio rellena un rectángulo dentro de un lienzo con el mapa de píxeles solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2334">This service fills a rectangle within a canvas with the requested pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2335">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2336">**fill**: área para colocar en mosaico el mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2336">**fill** Area to tile with pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2337">**pixelmap**: puntero al mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2337">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2338">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Colocación en mosaico correcta del mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap tile</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2342">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo abierto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2342">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2343">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Tamaño de relleno no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2343">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid fill size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2344">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2344">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been tiled on canvas */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_polygon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2352">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2352">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2353">Dibujar polígono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2353">Draw polygon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2354">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2354">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_polygon_draw(
    GX_POINT *point_array,
    INT number_of_points);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2355">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2355">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2356">Este servicio dibuja un polígono en el lienzo utilizando el pincel del contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2356">This service draws a polygon on the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2357">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2357">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2358">**point_array**: matriz de puntos del polígono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2358">**point_array** Array of points of the polygon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2359">**number_of_points**: número de puntos del polígono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2359">**number_of_points** Number of points of polygon</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2360">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto del polígono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful polygon draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2364">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo abierto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2364">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2365">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2365">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2366">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2366">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2367">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2367">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT my_polygon[4] =
{
    { 208, 63 },
    { 274, 63 },
    { 274, 163 },
    { 208, 163 }
};

/* Draw polygon “my_polygon” on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_polygon_draw(&my_polygon, 4);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the polygon “my_polygon” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2408">Dibujar texto girado sobre el punto central (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2408">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2409">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2410">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2411">Esta API se ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2411">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2412">Aunque todavía se admita, las nuevas aplicaciones no deben usar esta API y, en su lugar, deben usar gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2412">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2413">Este servicio dibuja texto en el lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2413">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2414">El texto se dibuja girado sobre el punto central solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2414">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2415">La fuente del contexto de dibujo actual y el color de la línea del contexto de dibujo se utilizan para representar el texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2415">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2416">Este servicio usa la función gx_utility_string_to_alphamap para representar la cadena de texto en un mapa de píxeles temporal de 8 bpp que contiene solo el valor alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2416">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2417">A continuación, el servicio gira el mapa alfa con la función gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2417">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2418">Después de que el mapa alfa se represente en el lienzo, este servicio libera el mapa alfa temporal y la memoria asociada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2418">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2419">Dado que se necesita un mapa alfa temporal para representar el texto girado, la aplicación debe configurar gx_system_memory_allocator mediante la llamada a la API gx_system_memory_allocator_set() antes de intentar dibujar el texto girado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2419">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2420">Este servicio solo se debe usar para representar el texto girado "una vez".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2420">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2421">Si se va a dibujar varias veces la misma cadena de texto en ubicaciones diferentes o con distintos ángulos de rotación, es más eficaz usar la función de utilidad gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() para crear el mapa alfa de texto una vez y luego usar gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate varias veces para girar el mapa alfa resultante de manera repetida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2421">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2422">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2423">**text**: cadena de texto que se va a dibujar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2423">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2424">**xCenter**: posición de centro alrededor del cual se girará el texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2424">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2425">**yCenter**: posición de centro alrededor del cual se girará el texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2425">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2426">**angle**: ángulo de rotación del texto deseado, en grados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2426">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2427">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2427">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2428">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Representación de texto correcta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2428">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2431">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) No hay suficiente memoria disponible o no se ha asignado gx_system_memory_allocator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2431">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2433">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2433">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2434">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2434">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2435">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2435">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2444">Dibujar texto girado sobre un punto central</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2444">Draw text rotated about a center point</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2445">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2446">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2447">Este servicio dibuja texto en el lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2447">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2448">El texto se dibuja girado sobre el punto central solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2448">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2449">La fuente del contexto de dibujo actual y el color de la línea del contexto de dibujo se utilizan para representar el texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2449">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2450">Este servicio usa la función gx_utility_string_to_alphamap para representar la cadena de texto en un mapa de píxeles temporal de 8 bpp que contiene solo el valor alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2450">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2451">A continuación, el servicio gira el mapa alfa con la función gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2451">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2452">Después de que el mapa alfa se represente en el lienzo, este servicio libera el mapa alfa temporal y la memoria asociada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2452">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2453">Dado que se necesita un mapa alfa temporal para representar el texto girado, la aplicación debe configurar gx_system_memory_allocator mediante la llamada a la API ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** antes de intentar dibujar el texto girado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2453">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2454">Este servicio solo se debe usar para representar el texto girado "una vez".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2454">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2455">Si se va a dibujar varias veces la misma cadena de texto en ubicaciones diferentes o con distintos ángulos de rotación, es más eficaz usar la función de utilidad gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() para crear el mapa alfa de texto una vez y luego usar gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate varias veces para girar el mapa alfa resultante de manera repetida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2455">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2456">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2457">**text**: cadena de texto que se va a dibujar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2457">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2458">**xCenter**: posición de centro alrededor del cual se girará el texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2458">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2459">**yCenter**: posición de centro alrededor del cual se girará el texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2459">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2460">**angle**: ángulo de rotación del texto deseado, en grados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2460">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2461">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2461">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2462">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Representación de texto correcta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2462">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Contexto de dibujo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) No hay suficiente memoria disponible o no se ha asignado gx_system_memory_allocator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2468">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2468">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2469">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2469">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2470">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2470">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2479">Desplazar el lienzo por X,Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2479">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2480">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2480">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2481">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2481">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2482">Este servicio desplaza el desplazamiento de lienzo especificado en la cantidad especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2482">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2483">Afecta a la posición en la que se representa el lienzo dentro del búfer de fotogramas visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2483">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2484">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2484">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2485">**canvas**: puntero al bloque de control del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2485">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2486">**x**: píxeles que se van a desplazar en el eje X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2486">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2487">**y**: píxeles que se van a desplazar en el eje Y.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2487">**y** Pixels to shift on the Y axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2488">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2488">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2490">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2490">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2492">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2492">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2493">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2493">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2494">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2494">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2495">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2495">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift canvas “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_shift(&my_canvas, 10, 15);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas has been shifted by 10 pixels
    on the X axis and 15 on the Y axis. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2502">gx_canvas_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2502">gx_canvas_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2503">Hacer que un lienzo sea visible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2503">Make a canvas visible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2504">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2504">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2505">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2505">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2506">Este servicio hace que un lienzo esté visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2506">This service makes a canvas visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2507">Si el lienzo se ha enlazado previamente a una capa de gráficos de hardware mediante la API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), el servicio gx_canvas_offset_show() se implementa directamente con la compatibilidad de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2507">If the canvas has been previously bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_show() service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2508">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2508">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2509">**canvas**: puntero al bloque de control del lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2509">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2510">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2510">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Asignación correcta de desplazamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2515">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2515">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2516">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2516">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2517">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2517">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make this canvas visible. */
status = gx_canvas_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now visible */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2527">Dibujar texto (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2527">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2528">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2528">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2529">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2529">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2530">Este servicio dibuja texto en el lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2530">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2531">Esta API, aunque todavía se admite, está en desuso y, en su lugar, las aplicaciones nuevas deben usar gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2531">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2532">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2532">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2533">**x_start**: coordenada X de inicio del texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2533">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2534">**y_start**: coordenada Y de inicio del texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2534">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2535">**string**: puntero a la cadena que se va a dibujar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2535">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2536">**length**: si la longitud >= 0, se limita el número de caracteres que se dibujan a la longitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2536">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2537">Si la longitud < 0, se dibuja toda la cadena hasta el terminador NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2537">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2538">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto del texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Error de dibujo de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo abierto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2545">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2546">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2546">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2547">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 40, string_ptr, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2593">Crear casilla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2593">Create checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2594">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_create(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2595">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2596">Este servicio crea un widget de casilla con las propiedades especificadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2596">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2597">GX_CHECKBOX se deriva de GX_TEXT_BUTTON y todos los servicios gx_text_button se pueden usar con widgets GX_CHECKBOX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2597">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2598">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2598">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2599">**checkbox**: puntero al nombre lógico del bloque de control de la casilla, nombre lógico del widget de casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2599">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block name Logical name of checkbox widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2600">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2600">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2601">**text_id**: id. de recurso del texto de casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2601">**text_id** Resource ID of checkbox text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2602">**style**: estilo de la casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2602">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2603">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2603">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2604">**checkbox_id**: id. de casilla definido por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2604">**checkbox_id** Application-defined ID of checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2605">**size**: dimensiones de la casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2605">**size** Dimensions of checkbox</span></span>

## <a name="gx_checkbox_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2620">Dibujar casilla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2620">Draw checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2621">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2622">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2623">Este servicio dibuja la casilla especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2623">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2624">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de casilla personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2624">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2625">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2626">**checkbox**: puntero al bloque de control de casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2626">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2627">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2627">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2628">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2628">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2629">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2629">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2630">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2630">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2631">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2631">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom checkbox draw function. */
VOID custom_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox)
{
    /* Call default checkbox draw. */
    gx_checkbox_draw(checkbox);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2632">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2632">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_checkbox_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2637">Procesar evento de casilla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2637">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2638">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2638">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2639">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2639">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2640">Este servicio procesa un evento para la casilla especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2640">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2641">Cualquier función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de casilla debe llamar a este servicio como controlador de eventos predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2641">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2642">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2642">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2643">**checkbox**: puntero al bloque de control de casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2643">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2644">**event_ptr**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2644">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2645">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2645">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2646">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto de evento de casilla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2646">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2649">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2649">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2650">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2650">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2651">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2651">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2652">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2652">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2658">Establecer mapa de píxeles de casilla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2658">Set pixelmap for checkbox</span></span>

```C

    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_disabled_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2660">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2661">Este servicio asigna los mapas de píxeles que se van a mostrar en la casilla especificada para cada estado de casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2661">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified checkbox for each checkbox state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2662">Los id. de recursos se pueden duplicar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2662">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2663">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2664">**checkbox**: puntero al bloque de control de casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2664">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2665">**unchecked_id**: mapa de píxeles usado para el estado sin activar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2665">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap used for unchecked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2666">**checked_id**: mapa de píxeles usado para el estado activado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2666">**checked_id** Pixelmap used for checked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id**: mapa de píxeles usado para una casilla deshabilitada y sin activar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and unchecked checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2668">**checked_disabled_id**:mapa de píxeles usado para una casilla deshabilitada y activada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2668">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2669">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2669">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2670">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Selección correcta de la casilla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2670">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2672">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2672">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2673">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2673">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2674">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2674">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2675">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2675">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(&my_checkbox,
    PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_ID, PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_DISABLED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_SIABLED_ID));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps are assigned to the checkbox “my_checkbox” */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_angle_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2699">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2699">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2700">Obtener ángulo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2700">Get current angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2701">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2701">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge, 
    INT *angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2702">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2702">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2703">Este servicio recupera el ángulo de aguja actual del widget de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2703">This service retrieves the current needle angle of circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2704">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2704">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2705">**gauge**: puntero al bloque de control de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2705">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2709">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2709">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
INT current_angle;

/* Retrieve the current needle angle of “my_gauge”. */

```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2720">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2720">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2721">Establecer el ángulo de destino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2721">Set target angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2722">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2722">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_angle_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2723">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2723">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2724">Este servicio establece el ángulo de destino de un widget de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2724">This service sets the target angle of a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2726">**gauge**: puntero al bloque de control de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2726">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2727">**angle**: ángulo de la aguja de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2727">**angle** Target needle angle</span></span>
