- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2730">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2730">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2732">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2733">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2734">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2734">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set target angle of “my_gauge” to 180. */

```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2743">Establecer parámetros de animación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2743">Set animation parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2744">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2744">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2745">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2745">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2746">Este servicio establece los pasos de animación y el tiempo de retraso para un widget de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2746">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2747">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2747">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2748">**gauge**: puntero al bloque de control de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2748">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2749">**steps**: número total de pasos para una rotación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2749">**steps** Total steps for one rotation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2750">**delay**: tiempo de retraso para cada paso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2750">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2751">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2751">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2752">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Selección correcta de la casilla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2752">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2756">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2756">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2757">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2757">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2758">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2758">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2766">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2766">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2767">Dibujar fondo de medidor circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2767">Draw circular gauge background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2768">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2769">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2770">Este servicio dibuja el fondo del medidor circular especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2770">This service draws background of the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2771">Normalmente, la función gx_circular_gauge_draw llama a este servicio internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudar a escribir funciones de dibujo personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2771">This service is normally called internally by the gx_circular_gauge_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2772">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2772">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2774">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2774">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2775">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2775">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2776">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2777">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2777">Threads</span></span>

```C
/* Draw circular gauge background. */
gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(&my_circular_gauge);
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2787">Crear medidor circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2787">Create circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2788">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
    GX_VALUE xpos,
    GX_VALUE ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2789">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2790">Este servicio crea un widget de medidor circular con las propiedades especificadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2790">This service creates a circular gauge widget with the specified properties.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2791">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2791">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2792">**gauge**: puntero al bloque de control de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2792">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2793">**name**: nombre lógico del widget de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2793">**name** Logical name of circular gauge widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2794">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2794">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2795">**info**: puntero a la estructura de información del medidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2795">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2796">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2796">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2797">**background_id**: id. de recurso de mapa de píxeles del fondo de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2797">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2798">**style** estilo de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2798">**style** Style of circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2799">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2799">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2800">**circular_gauge_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de un medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2800">**circular_gauge_id** Application-defined ID of circular gauge</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2801">**xpos**: posición de la coordenada X del medidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2801">**xpos** Gauge x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2802">**ypos**: posición de la coordenada Y del medidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2802">**ypos** Gauge y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2803">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2803">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2804">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Selección correcta de la casilla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2804">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2805">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2805">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2806">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2806">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2807">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2807">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2808">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2808">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2810">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2810">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2811">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2811">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2819">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2819">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2820">Dibujar medidor circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2820">Draw circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2821">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2821">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2822">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2823">Este servicio dibuja el medidor circular especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2823">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2824">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de medidor personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2824">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2825">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2825">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2826">**gauge**: puntero al bloque de control de medidor circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2826">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2827">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2827">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2828">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2828">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2829">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2829">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2830">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2830">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2831">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2831">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom circular gauge draw function. */
VOID custom_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge)
{
    /* Call default circular gauge draw. */
    gx_circular_gauge_draw(gauge);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2840">Procesar evento de medidor circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2840">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2841">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2842">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2843">Este servicio procesa un evento para el medidor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2843">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2844">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2845">**gauge**: puntero al bloque de control de medidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2845">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2846">**event_ptr**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2846">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2847">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto de evento de medidor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2851">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2851">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2852">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2852">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2853">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2853">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

```C
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2891">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2891">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2892">Este servicio define el pincel del contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2892">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2897">**fill_color_id**: id. de recurso de color de relleno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2897">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2898">En el **apéndice B** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2898">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2899">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2899">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2900">**style**: estilo del pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2900">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2901">En el **apéndice D** se describen los estilos de pincel admitidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2901">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2902">Los estilos de pincel se pueden combinar en una variable mediante la operación OR bit a bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2902">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2927">Obtener el pincel del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2927">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2928">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2928">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_get(GX_BRUSH **return_brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2929">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2929">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2930">Este servicio devuelve un puntero al pincel activo en el contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2930">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2931">Si no hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo, el servicio genera un error y devuelve un puntero nulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2931">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2932">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2932">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2933">**return_brush**: puntero al destino del pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2933">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2934">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2934">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta del pincel del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2938">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2939">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2939">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2940">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2940">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRUSH *my_brush;

/* Get the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_get(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2956">Establecer patrón del pincel del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2956">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2957">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2957">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2958">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2958">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2959">Este servicio establece el patrón del pincel del contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2959">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2960">El patrón del pincel se usa para dibujar líneas discontinuas horizontales y verticales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2960">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2961">Cuando se llama a gx_canvas_line_draw() y la línea es horizontal o vertical, y el campo brush.gx_brush_line_pattern es distinto de cero, se dibuja una línea de patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2961">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2962">La máscara de patrón de pincel solo se admite actualmente para líneas horizontales y verticales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2962">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2963">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2963">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2964">**pattern** patrón que se va a usar para el pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2964">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2965">Se trata de un patrón simple hexadecimal que se activa o desactiva y que se usará para el dibujo de la línea de patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2965">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2966">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2966">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del pincel del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Contexto de dibujo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2969">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2970">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2971">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2971">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2985">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2985">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2986">Establecer el pincel del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2986">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2987">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2987">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2988">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2988">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2989">Este servicio establece el pincel del contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2989">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2990">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2990">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2991">**brush** puntero al pincel que se va a usar para el contexto actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2991">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2992">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2992">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2993">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del pincel del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2993">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2994">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2994">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2996">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2996">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-2997">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2997">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-2998">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-2998">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3013">gx_context_brush_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3013">gx_context_brush_style_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3014">Establecer el estilo del pincel del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3014">Set brush style of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3015">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3015">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_style_set(UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3016">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3016">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3017">Este servicio establece el estilo del pincel del contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3017">This service sets the brush style of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3018">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3018">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3019">**style**: estilo del pincel del contexto actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3019">**style** Brush style of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3020">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3020">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3021">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del estilo del pincel del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3023">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3023">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3024">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3024">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3025">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3025">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3026">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3026">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush style of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_style_set(GX_BRUSH_ALIAS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush style of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_width_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3041">gx_context_brush_width_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3041">gx_context_brush_width_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3042">Establecer el ancho del pincel del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3042">Set brush width of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3043">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3043">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_width_set(UINT width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3044">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3044">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3045">Este servicio establece el ancho del pincel activo en el contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3045">This service sets the width of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3046">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3046">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3047">**width**: ancho del pincel en píxeles del contexto actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3047">**width** Brush width in pixels of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3048">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3048">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3050">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3050">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3051">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3051">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3053">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3053">Example</span></span>

```C

status = gx_context_brush_width_set(10); /*

If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush width of the current context has been set to 10. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3068">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3068">gx_context_color_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3069">Obtener el valor del color asociado al id. de color en el contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3069">Get color value associated with color ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3070">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3070">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_color_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3071">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3072">Este servicio recupera el valor del color asociado al id. de color indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3072">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3073">El valor del color se devuelve en el formato de color de la pantalla del contexto activo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3073">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3074">Este servicio solo debe llamarse desde una operación de dibujo activa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3074">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3075">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3075">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3076">**color_id**: id. de recurso del color solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3076">**color_id** Resource ID of color requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3077">**return_color**: dirección de la variable que va a contener el valor del color devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3077">**return_color** Address of variable to hold returned color value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3078">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3078">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3079">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del valor del color</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3079">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3080">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3080">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3081">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3081">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3082">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3082">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3083">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3083">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3084">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3084">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3085">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3085">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR color_value;

/* Get the color vaue. */
status = gx_context_color_get(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID, &color_value);
```

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3101">Establecer el color de relleno del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3101">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3102">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3102">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3103">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3103">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3104">Este servicio establece el color de relleno del pincel activo en el contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3104">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3105">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3105">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3106">**fill_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno del contexto actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3106">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3107">En el **apéndice B** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3107">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3108">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3108">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3109">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del color de relleno del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3111">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3111">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3130">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3130">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3131">Obtener la fuente asociada al id. de fuente en el contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3131">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3132">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3133">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3134">Este servicio recupera el puntero de fuente asociado al id. de fuente indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3134">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3135">Este servicio solo debe llamarse desde una operación de dibujo activa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3135">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3136">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3137">**font_id**: id. de recurso de la fuente solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3137">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3138">**return_font**: dirección de la variable que va a contener el puntero de fuente devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3138">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3139">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3139">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la fuente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3141">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3141">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3144">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3144">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3145">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3145">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3146">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3146">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;

/* Get the font pointer. */
status = gx_context_font_get(MY_MIDSIZE_FONT, &my_font);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3161">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3161">gx_context_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3162">Establecer la fuente del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3162">Set font of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3163">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3163">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3164">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3165">Este servicio establece la fuente del pincel activo del contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3165">This service sets the font in the active brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3166">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3166">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3167">**font_id**: id. de recurso de fuente del contexto actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3167">**font_id** Font resource ID of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3168">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3168">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3169">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la fuente del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3169">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context font set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3170">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3170">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3171">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3171">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3172">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3172">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3173">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3173">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3174">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3174">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the font of the current context to MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_context_font_set(MY_FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3189">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3189">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3190">Establecer el color de línea del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3190">Set line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3191">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3191">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_line_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3192">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3192">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3193">Este servicio establece el color de línea del pincel activo en el contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3193">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3194">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3195">**line_color_id**: color de línea del contexto actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3195">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3196">En el **apéndice B** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3196">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3197">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3197">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3198">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3198">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3199">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del color de línea del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3199">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3200">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3200">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3201">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3201">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3202">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3202">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3203">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3203">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3204">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3204">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the line color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the line color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3220">Obtener el mapa de píxeles asociado al id. de mapa de píxeles en el contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3220">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3221">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3222">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3223">Este servicio recupera el puntero de mapa de píxeles asociado al id. de mapa de píxeles indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3223">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3224">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3224">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3225">**pixelmap_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3225">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3226">**return_map**: dirección de la variable que va a contener la dirección del mapa de píxeles devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3226">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3227">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta del mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3229">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3229">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de mapa de píxeles no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3232">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3232">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3233">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3233">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3234">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3234">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3250">Establecer mapa de píxeles del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3250">Set pixelmap of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3251">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3251">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3252">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3252">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3253">Este servicio asigna los mapas de píxeles del pincel activo en el contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3253">This service assigns the pixelmap of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3254">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3255">**pixelmap_id**: id. de recurso de mapa de píxeles que se va a usar para el contexto actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3255">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID to use for current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3256">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3256">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3257">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del mapa de píxeles del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3257">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3258">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3258">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Contexto no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3260">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3260">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3261">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3261">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3262">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3262">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap of the current context to MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_set(MY_PIXELMAP_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3278">Definir pincel sin formato del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3278">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3279">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3280">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3281">Este servicio define el pincel sin formato del contexto de pantalla actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3281">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3282">Las definiciones sin formato se usan cuando se van a pasar valores de colores ARGB de 32 bits al pincel en lugar de los id. de color.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3282">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3283">Las definiciones de color sin formato son útiles cuando el color deseado no está presente en la tabla de colores actual del sistema o cuando el valor de color RGB se calcula en tiempo de ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3283">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3284">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3284">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3285">**line_color**: color de la línea en formato de color ARGB sin formato de 32 bits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3285">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3286">El **apéndice A** contiene los colores predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3286">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3287">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3287">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3288">**fill_color**: color de relleno en formato de color ARGB sin formato de 32 bits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3288">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3289">El **apéndice A** contiene los colores predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3289">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3290">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3290">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3291">**style**: estilo del pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3291">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3292">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3292">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3293">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3293">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definición correcta del pincel sin formato del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3296">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3297">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3297">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3298">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3298">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3313">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3313">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3314">Establecer el color de relleno sin formato del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3314">Set raw fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3315">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3316">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3317">Este servicio establece el color de relleno sin formato del contexto de pantalla actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3317">This service sets the raw fill color of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3318">El parámetro line_color es un valor de color sin formato ARGB de 32 bits, en lugar de un valor de id. de color.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3318">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3319">Las definiciones de color sin formato son útiles cuando el color deseado no está presente en la tabla de colores actual del sistema o cuando el valor de color RGB se calcula en tiempo de ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3319">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3320">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3320">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3321">**line_color**: color de la línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3321">**line_color** Color of line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3322">El **apéndice A** contiene los colores predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3322">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3323">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3323">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3324">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del color de relleno sin formato del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3326">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3326">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_raw_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3345">Establecer el color de línea sin formato del contexto de dibujo actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3345">Set raw line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3346">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3346">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3347">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3347">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3348">Este servicio establece el color de línea del pincel activo en el contexto de dibujo actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3348">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3349">El parámetro line_color es un valor de color sin formato ARGB de 32 bits, en lugar de un valor de id. de color.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3349">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3350">Las definiciones de color sin formato son útiles cuando el color deseado no está presente en la tabla de colores actual del sistema o cuando el valor de color RGB se calcula en tiempo de ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3350">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3351">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3351">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3352">**line_color**: valor del color de la línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3352">**line_color** Color of line value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3353">El **apéndice A** contiene los colores predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3353">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3354">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3354">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3355">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3355">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del color de línea sin formato del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3358">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3358">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3374">gx_context_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3374">gx_context_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3375">Recuperar la cadena asociada a un id. de cadena (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3375">Retrieve string associated with String ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3376">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3376">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get(GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3377">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3378">Esta API en desuso devuelve la cadena asociada al id. de cadena especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3378">This deprecated API returns the string associated with the given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3379">Las nuevas aplicaciones deben usar gx_context_string_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3379">New applications should use gx_context_string_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3380">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3381">**string_id**: id. de cadena generado por la aplicación GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3381">**string_id** String ID generated by the GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3382">**return_string**: dirección de la variable para devolver el puntero de cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3382">**return_string** Address of variable to return string pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3383">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3383">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del color de línea sin formato del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3388">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3388">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3389">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3389">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3390">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3390">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *text;

status = gx_context_string_get(GX_ID_ERROR, &text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string pointer has been returned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3391">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3391">See Also</span></span>
