## <a name="gx_context_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3394">Recuperar la cadena asociada al id. de cadena proporcionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3394">Retrieve string associated with given string ID.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3395">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get_ext(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3396">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3397">Este servicio devuelve la cadena asociada a un id. de cadena proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3397">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3398">Este servicio solo se puede invocar cuando hay un contexto de dibujo activo, es decir, desde la función de dibujo de un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3398">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3399">Este servicio identifica el lienzo activo, y muestra y recupera la cadena de la instancia de pantalla localizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3399">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3400">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3400">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3401">**string_id**: id. de cadena que se usa para identificar la cadena, tal y como la genera GUIX Studio en el archivo de encabezado del recurso de aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3401">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3402">**return_string**: dirección de la variable GX_STRING en la que se devolverá el puntero de la cadena y la longitud de la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3402">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3403">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3403">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del color de línea sin formato del contexto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No hay ningún contexto de dibujo activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3408">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3408">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3409">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3409">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3410">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3410">Example</span></span>


```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_string_get_ext(ID_ERROR, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string.gx_string_ptr and
string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3420">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3420">gx_context_font_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3421">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3421">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3422">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3422">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3423">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3423">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3424">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3424">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3426">Asignar el idioma activo de la pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3426">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3427">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3427">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3428">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3428">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3429">Este servicio asigna el idioma activo actualmente para la pantalla indicada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3429">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3430">El índice de idioma corresponde a los idiomas definidos en la tabla de idiomas de la pantalla y no es un identificador de lenguaje ANSI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3430">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3431">Cada una de las pantallas de un sistema de varias pantallas puede ejecutarse en diferentes idiomas activos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3431">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3432">La tabla de idiomas de la pantalla debe asignarse antes de usar esta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3432">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3433">Cuando se inicializa una pantalla mediante gx_studio_display_configure, la tabla de idiomas se instala automáticamente y la aplicación pasa el índice del idioma activo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3433">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3434">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3435">**display**: puntero al bloque de control de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3435">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3436">**language**: índice del idioma activo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3436">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3437">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3437">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3438">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Asignación correcta del idioma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3438">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de pantalla no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Índice de idioma no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3441">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3441">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3442">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3442">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3443">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3443">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3444">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3444">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3445">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3445">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3446">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3446">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3447">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3447">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3448">Volver a asignar un valor de color</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3448">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3449">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3450">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3451">Este servicio vuelve a asignar el valor de color asociado al id. de color especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3451">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3452">Se puede usar para modificar la tabla de colores de una pantalla sin proporcionar una tabla de colores completamente nueva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3452">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3453">El valor de color proporcionado debe estar en el formato nativo compatible con la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3453">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3454">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3455">**display**: puntero al bloque de control de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3455">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3456">**color_id**: id. de color que se va a reasignar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3456">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3457">**new_color**: valor de color que se va a asignar a esta ranura color_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3457">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3458">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3458">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3459">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Reasignación correcta del color</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3459">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3460">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de color no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3460">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3462">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Pantalla no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3462">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3463">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3463">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3464">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3464">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3465">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3465">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_color_set(&my_display, MY_COLOR_ID, 0x5454);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3466">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3466">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3467">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3467">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3468">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3468">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3469">Asignar tabla de colores de la pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3469">Assign display color table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3470">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3470">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_COLOR *color_table, 
    INT color_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3471">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3472">Este servicio vuelve a asignar la tabla de colores que se va a usar en la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3472">This service re-assigns the color table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3473">Normalmente la función de configuración de la pantalla generada por GUIX Studio invoca este servicio, pero también se puede llamar mediante el software de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3473">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3474">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3474">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3475">**display**: puntero al bloque de control de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3475">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3476">**color_table**: matriz de valores de colores en el formato nativo de la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3476">**color_table** Array of color values in display native format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3477">**color_count**: indica el número de entradas en la tabla de colores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3477">**color_count** Indicates number of entries in color table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3478">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la tabla de colores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3481">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3481">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3482">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Pantalla no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3482">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3483">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3484">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3484">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3485">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3485">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR default_table[32] = { … };

/* Change the color table */
status = gx_display_color_table_set(&my_display, default_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color table has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3486">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3486">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3487">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3487">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3488">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3488">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3489">Crear pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3489">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3490">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3490">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3491">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3492">Este servicio crea una pantalla y llama a la función de configuración del controlador de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3492">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3493">GUIX toma esta pantalla y la agrega a su lista interna de pantallas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3493">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3494">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3494">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3495">**display**: puntero al bloque de control de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3495">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3496">**name**: Nombre de la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3496">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3497">**display_driver_setup**: puntero a la función de configuración del controlador de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3497">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3498">**optional_driver_info**: puntero a información opcional del controlador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3498">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3499">**color_format**: formato de color, tal como se define en el **apéndice C**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3499">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3500">**width**: número de píxeles en el eje X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3500">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3501">**height**: número de píxeles en el eje Y.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3501">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3502">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3502">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) No se pudo configurar la pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Tamaño de bloque de control de pantalla no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3508">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3508">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3509">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3509">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3510">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3510">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_create(&my_display, “my display”,
    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3511">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3511">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3512">gx_display_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3512">gx_display_delete</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3513">gx_display_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3513">gx_display_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3514">Destruir pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3514">Destroy display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3515">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3515">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_delete(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    VOID (*display_driver_cleanup)(GX_DISPLAY *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3516">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3516">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3517">Este servicio cierra una pantalla y limpia los recursos asignados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3517">This service shuts down a display, and cleans up allocated resources.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3518">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3518">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_font_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3538">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3538">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3539">Asignar tabla de fuentes de la pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3539">Assign display font table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3540">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3540">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_font_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_FONT **font_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3541">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3541">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3542">Este servicio vuelve a asignar la tabla de fuentes que se va a usar en la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3542">This service re-assigns the font table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3543">Normalmente la función de configuración de la pantalla generada por GUIX Studio invoca este servicio, pero también se puede llamar mediante el software de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3543">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3544">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3545">**display**: puntero al bloque de control de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3545">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3546">**font_table**: matriz de punteros de GX_FONT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3546">**font_table** Array of GX_FONT pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3547">**table_size**: número de fuentes en la tabla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3547">**table_size** Number of fonts in table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3548">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3548">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3549">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la tabla de fuentes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3549">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3550">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3550">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3551">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3551">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3552">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3552">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3553">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3553">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3554">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3554">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = { … };

/* Assign font table */
status = gx_display_font_table_set(&my_display, font_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font table has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3562">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3563">Este servicio recupera la tabla de idiomas de la pantalla indicada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3563">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3564">Una aplicación puede usar este servicio para modificar la tabla de idiomas de la pantalla, en tiempo de ejecución, mediante cadenas definidas dinámicamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3564">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3565">Esta API está en desuso y solo se admite para aplicaciones que usan la tabla de idiomas del estilo anterior (es decir, el archivo de recursos generado por Studio se genera para la versión de la biblioteca anterior a la versión 5.6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3565">This API is deprecated and supported only for applications using the old style language table (i.e. the Studio generated resource file is generated for library version prior to version 5.6).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3566">Las nuevas aplicaciones deben usar gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3566">New applications should use gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3570">**language_count**: dirección para recibir el recuento de idiomas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3570">**language_count** Address to receive language count</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3574">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3574">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3609">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3609">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3610">Este servicio está en desuso y las aplicaciones nuevas deben usar gx_display_language_table_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3610">This service is deprecated and new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3611">Este servicio solo se admite por compatibilidad con archivos de recursos generados por Studio que tienen como destino versiones de bibliotecas anteriores a la versión 5.6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3611">This service is supported only for compatibility with Studio generated resources files targeting library versions prior to version 5.6.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3612">Este servicio asigna la tabla de idiomas que se va a usar en la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3612">This service assigns the language table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3613">Normalmente la función gx_studio_display_configure de configuración de la pantalla generada por GUIX Studio invoca este servicio, pero también se puede llamar mediante el software de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3613">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated function gx_studio_display_configure, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3629">gx_display_language_table_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3629">gx_display_language_table_set_ext</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3631">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3631">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_set_ext(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_STRING **table, 
    GX_UBYTE number_of_languages,
    UINT number_of_strings);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3632">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3632">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3633">Este servicio asigna la tabla de idiomas que se va a usar en la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3633">This service assigns the language table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3634">Normalmente la función gx_studio_display_configure de configuración de la pantalla generada por GUIX Studio invoca este servicio, pero también se puede llamar mediante el software de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3634">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated function gx_studio_display_configure, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3635">Normalmente, la asignación de tabla de idiomas se realiza cuando se cargan los idiomas desde un archivo de recursos binario mediante gx_binres_language_table_load ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3635">Runtime language table assignment is usually done when languages are loaded from a binary resource file using gx_binres_language_table_load().</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3637">**display**: puntero al bloque de control de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3637">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3638">**table**: tabla de idiomas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3638">**table** Language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3639">**number_of_languages**: número de columnas de la tabla proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3639">**number_of_languages** Number of columns in the provided table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3640">**number_of_strings**: número de cadenas de cada columna de la tabla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3640">**number_of_strings** Number of strings in each table column</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3641">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3641">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3642">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la tabla de fuentes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3642">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3643">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3643">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3644">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3644">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3645">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3645">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3665">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3665">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3673">gx_display_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3673">gx_display_string_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3675">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3675">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_string_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3676">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3677">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_display_string_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3677">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3678">Este servicio recupera una cadena de la tabla de cadenas activa para la pantalla indicada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3678">This service retrieves a string from the active string table for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3679">El idioma activo se usa para seleccionar la cadena de la tabla de idiomas asignada a la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3679">The active language is used to select the string from the language table assigned to the display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3680">GUIX Studio genera los id. de cadena y se encuentran en el archivo de encabezado resources.h de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3680">String IDs are generated by GUIX Studio and are found in the application resources.h header file.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3681">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3681">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3682">**display**: puntero al bloque de control de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3682">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3683">**string_id**: id. de cadena, generado por GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3683">**string_id** String ID, generated by GUIX Studio.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3684">**string**: dirección de la variable de puntero de cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3684">**string** Address of string pointer variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3685">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3685">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful string retrieval</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3688">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de cadena no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3688">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Invalid string Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de pantalla no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3690">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3690">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3691">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3691">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3692">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3692">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Retrieve string value */

    GX_STRING_ID_MONDAY, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_theme_install"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3767">gx_display_theme_install</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3767">gx_display_theme_install</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3768">Instalar temas en la pantalla especificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3768">Install themes to the specified display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3769">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3769">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_theme_install(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_THEME *theme_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3770">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3770">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3771">Este servicio instala temas en la pantalla especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3771">This service install themes to the specified display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3772">Normalmente la función de configuración de la pantalla generada por Studio invoca este servicio, pero también se puede llamar mediante el software de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3772">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3773">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3773">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3774">**display**: puntero al bloque de control de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3774">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3775">**theme_table**: tabla de temas que se va a instalar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3775">**theme_table** Theme table to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3776">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3776">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3777">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Instalación correcta de la tabla de temas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3777">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed theme table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de tabla de temas no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid theme table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3780">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Pantalla no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3780">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3781">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3781">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3782">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3782">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3783">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3783">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3807">gx_drop_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3807">gx_drop_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3808">Crear una lista desplegable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3808">Create a drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3809">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3809">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_create(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list, 
    GX_CONST
    GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    INT open_height,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT drop_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3810">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3810">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3811">Este servicio crea una lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3811">This service creates a drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3812">Una lista desplegable es una combinación del widget de lista desplegable y una lista vertical emergente que se muestra cuando se abre la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3812">A drop list is a combination of the drop list widget, and a popup vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3813">La lista vertical emergente se crea automáticamente al crear el widget de lista desplegable, y se muestra u oculta al abrir o cerrar el widget de lista desplegable, respectivamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3813">The popup vertical list is created automatically when the drop-list widget is created, and displayed or hidden when the drop-list widget is opened or closed, respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3814">El widget de lista de desplegable admite dos mapas de píxeles asociados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3814">The drop list widget supports two associated pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3815">El primero, descrito como "List Wallpaper" (Papel tapiz de lista) en la vista de propiedades de Studio, es el mapa de píxeles del papel tapiz opcional que se muestra como fondo de la lista vertical que aparece cuando se abre el widget de lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3815">The first, described as “List Wallpaper” in the Studio properties view, is the optional wallpaper pixelmap that is displayed as the background of the vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3816">El segundo mapa de píxeles, que se describe como "Imagen de fondo" en la vista de propiedades de Studio, es una imagen opcional que se muestra como fondo de la propia lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3816">The second pixelmap, described as the “Background Image” in the Studio properties view, is an optional image displayed as the background of the drop-list itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3817">Un widget de lista desplegable puede tener (pero no es necesario) un widget secundario que se use para abrir y cerrar la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3817">A drop-list widget can have (but is not required to have) a child widget that is used to open and close the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3818">Habitualmente, se trata de un widget de icono o de botón, pero hasta se podría usar un widget personalizado para alternar entre abrir y cerrar la lista desplegable primaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3818">This is customarily an icon or button widget, but even a custom widget could be used as the open/close toggle for the parent drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3819">La configuración clave que hace que este widget secundario funcione en la lista desplegable es que debe tener predefinido el id. de widget ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3819">The key setting which makes this child widget operate the drop list is that this child widget must have the pre-defined widget id ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3820">Para definir un widget secundario que abra y cierre la lista desplegable, primero agregue un widget secundario a la lista desplegable, y coloque este elemento secundario dentro de la lista desplegable según desee:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3820">To define a child widget which will open and close the drop-list, firstadd and child widget to the drop list, and position this child within the drop list as desired:</span></span>

![Captura de pantalla de la lista desplegable.](./media/guix/image6.jpg)

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3822">A continuación, use la vista de propiedades de Studio para asignar a este widget secundario el valor de id. ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, que es un valor de id. definido internamente reconocido por la lista desplegable principal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3822">Then use the Studio properties view to assign this child widget the ID value ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, which is an internally defined ID value recognized by the parent drop list:</span></span>

![Captura de pantalla de la vista de propiedades de Studio.](./media/guix/image7.jpg)

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3824">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3824">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3825">**drop_list**: puntero al bloque de control de la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3825">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3826">**name**: nombre de la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3826">**name** Name of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3827">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3827">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3828">**total_rows**: número total de filas en la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3828">**total_rows** Total number of rows in the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3829">**open_height** Altura de la lista vertical que se muestra cuando se abre la lista desplegable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3829">**open_height** The height of the vertical list displayed when the drop list is opened.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3830">**callback**: función a la que llama la lista vertical al desplazar la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3830">**callback** Function called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3831">Consulte la documentación de GX_VERTICAL_LIST para obtener más información.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3831">Refer to the documentation of GX_VERTICAL_LIST for more information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3832">**style**: estilo de borde de la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3832">**style** The drop-down list border style.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3833">**drop_list_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3833">**drop_list_id** Application-defined ID of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3834">**size**: dimensiones de la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3834">**size** Dimensions of the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3835">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la lista desplegable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3839">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3839">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3842">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3842">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST my_drop_list;
VOID list_row_create(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *list,
                     GX_WIDGET *row, INT index);
{
    …
}

GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 80, 40);

status = gx_drop_list_create(&my_drop_list,
    "my drop list", GX_NULL,
    10, 100, list_row_create,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RECESSED | GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
    ID_DROP_LIST, &size)

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, the drop list was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3849">gx_drop_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3849">gx_drop_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3850">Procesar evento de lista desplegable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3850">Process drop list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3851">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3851">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_DROP_LIST *list, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3852">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3853">Este servicio procesa un evento para la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3853">This service processes an event for the drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3854">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3854">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3855">**drop_list**: bloque de control del widget de lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3855">**drop_list** Drop list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3856">**event**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3856">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3857">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3857">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3858">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto de evento de lista desplegable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3858">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed drop list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3859">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3859">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3860">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3860">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3861">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3861">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3862">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3862">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3863">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3863">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic drop list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_drop_list_event_process(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default drop list
            event processing */
        status = gx_drop_list_event_process(drop_list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3893">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3893">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3894">Asignar una imagen de fondo a la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3894">Assign a background image to the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3895">Este mapa de píxeles se usa como fondo para el widget de lista desplegable y no para la lista vertical emergente que se muestra cuando se abre la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3895">This pixelmap is used as the background for the drop list widget itself, and not for the popup vertical list that is displayed when the list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3896">Para asignar un mapa de píxeles a la lista emergente de lista desplegable, debe llamar primero a gx_drop_list_popup_get para recuperar un puntero a la lista emergente y, a continuación, usar gx_window_wallpaper_set() para asignar un mapa de píxeles a esta lista emergente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3896">To assign a pixelmap to the drop-list popup, you would need to first call gx_drop_list_popup_get to retrieve a pointer to the popup list, and then use gx_window_wallpaper_set() to assign a pixelmap to this popup list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3897">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3897">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3898">**drop_list**: puntero al bloque de control de la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3898">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3899">**id**: id. de recurso para el mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3899">**id** Resource ID to the pixlemap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3900">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3900">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del mapa de píxeles de la lista desplegable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3904">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de mapa de píxeles no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3904">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid pixlemap ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3905">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3905">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3906">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3906">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3907">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3907">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST mylist;

/* create the drop list here */

/* Assign a pixelmap id, which will turn on the list button */
status = gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set(&mylist,
    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_DROP_LIST_BACKGROND);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_popup_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3914">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3914">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3915">Recuperar el puntero a la lista vertical emergente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3915">Retrieve pointer to popup vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3916">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3916">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_popup_get(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST **return_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3917">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3917">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3918">Un widget de lista desplegable se compone del widget de lista desplegable y una lista vertical emergente que se aparece cuando se abre el widget de lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3918">A drop-list widget is composed of the drop-list widget itself, and a popup vertical list that is shown when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3919">Este servicio recupera un puntero al componente de lista vertical de la lista desplegable, lo que permite que la aplicación invoque los servicios de API directamente en esta lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3919">This service retrieves a pointer to the vertical list component of the drop list, allowing the application to invoke API services directly on this vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3920">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3920">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3921">**drop_list**: puntero al bloque de control de la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3921">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3922">**return_list**: puntero a la lista vertical almacenada en la lista desplegable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3922">**return_list** Pointer to the vertical list stored in the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3923">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3923">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3924">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la lista vertical emergente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3924">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved popup vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3925">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3925">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3926">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3926">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3927">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3927">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3928">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3928">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST drop_list;
GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list;

/* Retrieve the popup list of “drop_list”. */
status = gx_drop_list_popup_get(&drop_list, &vertical_list)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the popup list was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3934">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3934">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3935">Colocar elementos secundarios para la lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3935">Position children for the horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3936">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3936">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_children_position(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3937">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3937">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3938">Esta función coloca los elementos secundarios para la lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3938">This function positions the children for the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3939">Se llama automáticamente a esta función cuando la lista recibe el evento GX_EVENT_SHOW, pero se debe llamar directamente si la lista se modifica una vez que se ha hecho visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3939">This function is called automatically when the list receives the GX_EVENT_SHOW event, but should be called directly if the list is modified after it has been made visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3940">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3941">**horizontal_list**: puntero al bloque de control de lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3941">**horizontal_list** Pointer to the horizontal list control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3942">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3942">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3943">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Colocación correcta de los elementos secundarios para la lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3943">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful positioned the children for the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3944">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3944">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3946">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3946">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3947">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3947">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3948">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3948">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position children in the horizontal list */
status = gx_horizontal_list_children_position (&horizontal_list);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the horizontal list are positioned. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3957">gx_horizontal_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3957">gx_horizontal_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3958">Crear lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3958">Create horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3959">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3959">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_create(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_columns,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT horizontal_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3960">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3960">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3961">Este servicio crea una lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3961">This service creates a horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3962">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3962">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3963">**horizontal_list**: bloque de control del widget de lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3963">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3964">**name**: nombre de la lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3964">**name** Name of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3965">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3965">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3966">**total_columns**: número total de columnas de la lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3966">**total_columns** Total number of comumns in horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3967">**callback**: se trata de un puntero a una función de devolución de llamada proporcionada por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3967">**callback** This is a pointer to a callback function provided by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3968">La función de devolución de llamada se invoca cuando se desplaza la lista horizontal para crear los elementos de lista que se hacen visibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3968">The callback function is invoked when the horizontal list is scrolled, to create the newly visible list items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3969">De esta manera, la lista horizontal puede mostrar cualquier tipo de widget definido por el usuario como los elementos de la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3969">In this way the horizontal list can display any user-defined widget type as the list items.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3970">**style**: estilo del widget de barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3970">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3971">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3971">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3972">**horizontal_list_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3972">**horizontal_list_id** Application-defined ID of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3973">**size**: dimensiones de la lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3973">**size** Dimensions of the horitzonal list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3974">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3978">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3978">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3979">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3979">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Número de columnas no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of columns not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3981">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3981">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3982">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3982">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3983">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3983">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal list “my_list” with 5 columns. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
    5, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal list “my_list” has been created. */
```
