## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3992">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3992">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3993">Procesar evento de la lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3993">Process horizontal list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3994">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3994">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3995">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3995">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-3996">Este servicio procesa un evento para la lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3996">This service processes an event for the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-3997">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3997">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3998">**list**: bloque de control del widget de lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3998">**list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-3999">**event**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-3999">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4000">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4000">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4001">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto de evento de lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4001">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed horizontal list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4002">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4002">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4003">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4003">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4004">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4004">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4005">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4005">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4006">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4006">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic horizontal list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default horizontal
        list event processing */
        status =
        gx_horizontal_list_event_process(list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4062">Asignar la entrada seleccionada en una lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4062">Assign the selected entry in a horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4063">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4063">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_HORIZONATAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4064">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4064">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4065">Este servicio asigna la entrada seleccionada en una lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4065">This service assigns the selected entry in a horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4066">Si es necesario, la lista horizontal se desplazará para que la entrada seleccionada esté visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4066">If required, the horizontal list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4067">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4069">**index**: posición basada en índice de la nueva entrada de lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4069">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4072">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) El índice no se encuentra en un intervalo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4072">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Index is not in invalid range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4073">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4073">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4074">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4074">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4075">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4075">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4090">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4090">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4091">Este servicio devuelve la entrada de lista seleccionada de la lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4091">This service returns the selected list entry of the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4092">Tenga en cuenta que si la lista horizontal tiene más filas que widgets secundarios y la entrada seleccionada se ha desplazado de la vista, esta API devolverá GX_NULL porque los widgets secundarios se reutilizan a medida que se desplaza el contenido de la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4092">Note that if the horizontal list has more rows than child widgets, and the selected entry has been scrolled from view, this API will return GX_NULL because the child widgets are re-used as the list content is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4093">La función gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get devolverá de forma confiable el índice del elemento seleccionado, incluso si ese elemento se ha desplazado de la vista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4093">The gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get function will reliably return the index of the selected item, even if that item has been scrolled from view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4094">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4094">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4095">**horizontal_list**: bloque de control del widget de lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4095">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4096">**return_list_entry**: destino del widget de entrada de lista de devoluciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4096">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4097">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4097">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta de la entrada de lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4099">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) El widget seleccionado se ha desplazado de la vista en una lista con más filas que los elementos secundarios del cliente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4099">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Selected widget has been scrolled from view in a list with more rows than client children.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4100">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4100">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4101">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4101">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4102">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4102">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4103">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4103">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4104">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4104">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_list_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */

    
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4125">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor de recuento no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4125">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid count value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4127">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4127">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4138">Crear barra de desplazamiento horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4138">Create horizontal scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4139">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4139">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4140">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4141">Este servicio crea una barra de desplazamiento horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4141">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4142">El id. de una barra de desplazamiento horizontal está predefinido (porque una ventana tiene que saber cómo se filtran los eventos) y el tamaño es automático (porque tiene que rellenar el ancho de cliente de la ventana primaria).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4142">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4143">Si decidimos permitir las barras de desplazamiento del área de cliente, tendremos que agregar otra función de creación con los parámetros id y size.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4143">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4144">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4145">**scrollbar**: bloque de control del widget de barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4145">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4146">**name**: nombre de la barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4146">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4147">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4147">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4148">**appearance**: la estructura de la apariencia define la apariencia de la barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4148">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4149">Si este valor es GX_NULL, la barra de desplazamiento usará la apariencia de la barra de desplazamiento predeterminada definida por gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4149">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4150">Consulte el **apéndice I** para ver la definición de la estructura GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4150">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4151">**Style**: estilo del widget de barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4151">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4152">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4152">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4153">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4153">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la barra de desplazamiento horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4157">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4157">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4159">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4159">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4160">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4160">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4161">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4161">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4170">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4170">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,

    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4171">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4171">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4172">Este servicio crea el widget de botón de icono especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4172">This service creates the specified icon button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON se deriva de GX_BUTTON y admite todos los servicios de API gx_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4176">**name**: nombre lógico del widget de botón de icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4176">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4177">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4177">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4178">**icon_id**: id. de recurso del icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4178">**icon_id** Resource ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4179">**style**: estilo del icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4179">**style** Style of icon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4180">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4180">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4182">**size**: dimensiones del botón de icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4182">**size** Dimensions of icon button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4183">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del botón de icono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created icon button</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4209">Dibujar un botón de icono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4209">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4210">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4211">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4212">Este servicio dibuja el botón de icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4212">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4213">Normalmente, GUIX llama a esta función internamente como parte de una operación de actualización del lienzo, pero también se expone a la aplicación que podría querer proporcionar una función de dibujo personalizada e invocar el dibujo del botón de icono predeterminado como base de dibujo personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4213">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4214">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4215">**button**: puntero a un bloque de control de botón de icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4215">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4216">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4216">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4217">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4217">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4218">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4218">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4219">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4219">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4220">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4220">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id);
```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4241">Este servicio asigna un nuevo mapa de píxeles al widget de botón de icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4241">This service assigns a new pixelmap to the icon button widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4268">gx_icon_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4268">gx_icon_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4269">Dibujar fondo de icono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4269">Draw icon background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4270">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4270">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_background_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4271">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4271">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4272">Este servicio dibuja el fondo del widget de icono especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4272">This service draws background of the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4273">Normalmente, la función gx_icon_button_draw llama a este servicio internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudar a escribir funciones de dibujo personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4273">This service is normally called internally by the gx_icon_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4274">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4274">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4275">**icon**: puntero al bloque de control del widget de icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4275">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4276">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4276">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4277">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4277">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4278">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4279">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4280">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */
    gx_icon_background_draw(icon);

    /* Add custom drawing here */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4292">**icon**: puntero al bloque de control del icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4292">**icon** Pointer to icon control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4293">**name**: nombre lógico del widget de icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4293">**name** Logical name of icon widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4294">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4294">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4295">**pixelmap_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4295">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4296">**style**: estilo del icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4296">**style** Style of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4297">**icon_id**: id. de icono definido por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4297">**icon_id** Application-defined ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4298">**x**: posición de inicio de la coordenada X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4298">**x** Starting x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4299">**y**: posición de inicio de la coordenada Y.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4299">**y** Starting y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4300">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4300">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4301">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del icono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4301">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4302">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4302">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4304">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4304">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4305">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4305">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_create(&my_icon, “my_icon”, &my_parent,
    MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_ID,
    5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon “my_icon” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4313">gx_icon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4313">gx_icon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4314">Dibujar icono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4314">Draw icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4315">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4316">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4317">Este servicio dibuja el widget de icono especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4317">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4318">Normalmente, GUIX llama a este servicio internamente como parte de una operación de actualización del lienzo, pero también se expone a la aplicación que podría querer proporcionar una función de dibujo personalizado e invocar el dibujo del icono predeterminado como base de dibujo personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4318">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4319">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4319">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4320">**icon**: puntero al bloque de control del widget de icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4320">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4321">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4322">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4322">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4323">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4324">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4324">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4325">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4330">gx_icon_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4330">gx_icon_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4331">Procesamiento de eventos del widget de icono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4331">Icon widget event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4332">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4332">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_event_process(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4333">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4333">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4334">Este servicio controla los eventos enviados a un widget GX_ICON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4334">This service handles events sent to a GX_ICON widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4335">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4336">**icon**: puntero al bloque de control del widget de icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4336">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4337">**event_ptr**: puntero a estructura GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4337">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4338">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Procesamiento correcto del evento de icono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful processed icon event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4342">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4342">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4343">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4343">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4344">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4344">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
    /* Do default handling. */
    status = gx_icon_event_process(icon, event_ptr);

    /* add your own handling here */
    break;
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4349">gx_icon_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4349">gx_icon_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4350">Establecer mapa de píxeles para icono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4350">Set pixelmap for icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4351">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4351">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4352">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4353">Este servicio establece el mapa de píxeles para el widget de icono especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4353">This service sets the pixelmap for the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4354">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4355">**icon**: puntero al bloque de control del widget de icono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4355">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4356">**normal_id**: id. de recurso de estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4356">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4357">**selected_id**: id. de recurso de estado seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4357">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4358">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4358">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del mapa de píxeles del icono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4360">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4360">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4361">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4361">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4362">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4362">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4363">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4363">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4364">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4364">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_pixelmap_set(&my_icon,
    MY_NOT_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_SELECTED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the icon “my_icon” has a pixelmap set. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4369">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4369">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4370">Crear instancia de módulo del lector de imágenes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4370">Create image reader module instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4371">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4371">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_create(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4372">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4372">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4373">Esta función crea un lector o descodificador de imágenes sin formato en tiempo de ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4373">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4374">Actualmente solo se admiten los tipos de imagen sin formato JPEG y PNG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4374">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4375">Este servicio requiere la definición de GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4375">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4376">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4376">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4377">**image_reader**: bloque de control del lector de imágenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4377">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4378">**data**: puntero a los datos de entrada sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4378">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4379">**data_size**: tamaño de los datos de entrada sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4379">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4380">**color_format**: el formato del color de salida solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4380">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4381">**mode**: marcas de los modos de compresión, interpolación y alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4381">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4382">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4382">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del lector de imágenes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4384">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4384">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Tamaño de datos no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4386">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4386">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4387">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4387">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4388">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4388">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_palette_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4392">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4392">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4393">Definir paleta de lector de imágenes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4393">Define image reader palette</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4394">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4394">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4395">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4395">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4400">**pal**: puntero a la paleta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4400">**pal** Pointer to palette</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4401">**palsize**: el tamaño de la paleta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4401">**palsize** The size of the palette</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4405">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Tamaño de paleta no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4405">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid palette size</span></span>

## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4412">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4412">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4413">Iniciar el proceso de descompresión y conversión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4413">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4414">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4414">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4415">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4415">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4416">Este servicio descodifica una imagen sin procesar en un formato de color especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4416">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4417">Actualmente solo se admiten los tipos de imagen sin formato JPEG y PNG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4417">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4418">Esto requiere la definición de GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4418">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4419">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4420">**image_reader**: bloque de control del lector de imágenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4420">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4421">**pixelmap**: mapa de píxeles de salida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4421">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4422">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4423">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Descodificación correcta de la imagen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4423">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4424">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) El asignador de memoria no está definido o se ha producido un error de asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4424">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4425">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) No se admite el tipo de imagen de entrada o el formato de color de salida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4425">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4428">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4428">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4429">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4429">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4430">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4430">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;
GX_PIXELMAP output_map;
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_axis_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4434">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4434">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4435">Dibujar eje X,Y del gráfico de líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4435">Draw line chart x,y axis</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4436">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_axis_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4437">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4438">Este servicio dibuja el eje X,Y de un gráfico de líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4438">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4439">Los parámetros de ancho de línea y colores del eje se recuperan de la estructura de información del gráfico de líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4439">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4440">Normalmente, la función gx_line_chart_draw llama a este servicio internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudar a escribir funciones de dibujo personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4440">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4441">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4441">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4442">**chart**: bloque de control de gráfico de líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4442">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4443">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4443">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4444">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4444">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4445">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4446">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4446">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4447">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4447">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4457">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4458">Este servicio crea una ventana de gráfico de líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4458">This service creates a line chart window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4459">Los parámetros de dibujo del gráfico y los datos del gráfico se pasan a través de la estructura GX_LINE_CHART_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4459">The chart drawing parameters and chart data are passed in via the GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4460">GX_LINE_CHART se basa en GX_WINDOW y es compatible con todas las API GX_WINDOW.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4460">GX_LINE_CHART is based on GX_WINDOW, and supports all of the GX_WINDOW APIs.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4461">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4461">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4462">**chart**: puntero al bloque de control de GX_LINE_CHART.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4462">**chart** Pointer to the GX_LINE_CHART control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4463">**name**: nombre del gráfico de líneas opcional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4463">**name** Optional line chart name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4464">**parent**: widget primario o GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4464">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4465">**info**: estructura que define los parámetros de dibujo del gráfico de líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4465">**info** Structure defining line chart drawing parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4466">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_LINE_CHART_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4466">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4467">**style**: marcas de estilo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4467">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4468">**chart_id**: valor del id. lógico del gráfico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4468">**chart_id** Chart logical ID value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4469">**size**: rectángulo delimitador de la ventana del gráfico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4469">**size** Chart window bounding rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4470">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del gráfico de líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line chart create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4475">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4475">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4476">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4476">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4477">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4477">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4478">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4488">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4488">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4489">Este servicio dibuja la línea de datos del gráfico de líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4489">This service draws the line chart data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4490">Los parámetros de ancho de línea y colores de la línea se recuperan de la estructura de información del gráfico de líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4490">The line colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4491">Normalmente, la función gx_line_chart_draw llama a este servicio internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudar a escribir funciones de dibujo personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4491">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4492">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4493">**chart**: bloque de control de gráfico de líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4493">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4494">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4494">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4495">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4495">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4496">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4496">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4497">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4497">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4498">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4498">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(chart);

    /* Draw the data line. */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4504">gx_line_chart_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4504">gx_line_chart_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4505">Dibujar el gráfico de líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4505">Draw the line chart</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4506">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4506">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4507">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4507">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4508">Esta es la función de dibujo del gráfico de líneas predeterminada, que dibuja el eje del gráfico y la línea de datos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4508">This is the default line chart drawing function, which draws the chart axis and data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4509">Las aplicaciones suelen proporcionar una función de dibujo personalizada para reemplazar el dibujo predeterminado y agregar elementos, como marcas de graduación, escala u otra información al eje del gráfico y a la línea de datos dibujada por el widget de gráfico de líneas base.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4509">Applications usually provide a custom drawing function to replace the default drawing to add things such as tickmarks, scale, or other information to the chart axis and data line drawn by the base line chart widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4510">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4510">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4511">**chart**: puntero al bloque de control de gráfico de líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4511">**chart** Pointer to the line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4512">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4512">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4513">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4513">**None**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4515">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4515">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4516">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4516">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default line chart draw. */
    gx_line_chart_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_update"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4522">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4522">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4523">Actualizar línea de datos del gráfico de líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4523">Update line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4524">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4524">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart, 
    INT *data,
    INT data_count)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4525">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4525">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4526">Este servicio actualiza la matriz de datos trazada por la ventana del gráfico de líneas y obliga a que se vuelva a dibujar la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4526">This service updates the data array plotted by the line chart window, and forces the window to redraw.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4527">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4527">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4529">**data**: matriz de datos que se va a trazar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4529">**data** Data array to be plotted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4530">**data_count**: tamaño de la matriz de datos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4530">**data_count** Size of the data array</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4532">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4532">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4533">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4533">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
INT chart_data[100];
GX_LINE_CHART chart;

/* Update the data array associated with “chart”. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4543">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4543">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4544">Calcular el valor de escalado del eje Y de punto fijo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4544">Calculate fixed-point y axis scaling value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4545">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4545">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4546">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4546">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4547">Este servicio calcula el valor de escalado de punto fijo que se usa para trazar los valores de datos en el eje Y del gráfico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4547">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4548">Los parámetros chart_info y el rectángulo delimitador del gráfico se usan para calcular este valor de escalado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4548">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4549">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4549">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4550">**chart**: bloque de control de gráfico de líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4550">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4551">**return_val**: dirección del valor que va a contener el valor devuelto de punto fijo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4551">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4552">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4552">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4553">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cálculo correcto del valor de escala de Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4553">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful y scale value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4555">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4555">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
INT y_scale;

/* Caluclate y scale value of “chart”. */

```

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4563">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4563">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4564">Crear un menú</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4564">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4565">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4565">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,

    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4566">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4566">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4567">Este servicio crea un menú tal y como se especifica, y asocia el menú al widget primario proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4567">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4568">Acepta todos los tipos de widget como elementos de menú secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4568">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4569">Para insertar un widget como elemento de menú secundario, llame a **gx_menu_insert**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4569">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4570">GX_MENU se deriva de GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT y admite todos los servicios de API gx_pixelmap_prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4570">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4572">**menu**: puntero al bloque de control de menú.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4572">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4573">**name**: nombre del menú.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4573">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4574">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4574">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4575">**text_id**: id. de recurso del texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4575">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4576">**fill_id**: id. de recurso de relleno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4576">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4577">**style**: estilo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4577">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4578">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4578">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4579">**menu_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del menú.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4579">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4581">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4601">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4601">gx_menu_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4602">Dibujar menú</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4602">Draw menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4603">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4604">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4605">Este servicio dibuja el menú especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4605">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4606">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de menú personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4606">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4607">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4607">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4608">**menu**: puntero al bloque de control de menú.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4608">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4609">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4610">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4610">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4611">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4611">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4612">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4612">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4613">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4613">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu draw. */
    gx_menu_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4625">gx_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4625">gx_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4626">Procesar evento de menú</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4626">Process menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4627">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4628">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4629">Este servicio procesa un evento para el menú especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4629">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4630">Cualquier función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de menú debe llamar a este servicio como controlador de eventos predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4630">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4631">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4631">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4632">**menu**: puntero al bloque de control de menú.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4632">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4633">**event_ptr**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4633">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4634">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4634">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto de evento de menú</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4638">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4638">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4639">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4639">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4640">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4640">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4641">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4641">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```
