## <a name="gx_menu_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4701">gx_menu_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4701">gx_menu_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4702">Dibujar texto de menú</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4702">Draw menu text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4703">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4703">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_text_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4704">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4705">Este servicio dibuja el texto de un menú.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4705">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4706">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de menú personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4706">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4707">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4708">**menu**: puntero al bloque de control de menú.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4708">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4709">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4709">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4710">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4710">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4711">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4711">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4712">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4712">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4713">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4713">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4725">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4725">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4726">Establecer desplazamiento de dibujo de texto de menú</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4726">Set menu text draw offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4727">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4727">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_text_offset_set(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_VALUE x_offset,
    GX_VALUE y_offset);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4728">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4729">Este servicio establece el desplazamiento de pantalla X,Y para el texto de menú.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4729">This service sets x, y display offset for menu text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4730">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4731">**menu**: puntero al bloque de control de menú.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4731">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4732">**x_offset**: coordenada X de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4732">**x_offset** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4733">**y_offset**: coordenada Y de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4733">**y_offset** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4734">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4734">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4735">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del desplazamiento del dibujo del texto de menú</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4735">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set menu text draw offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4736">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4736">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4737">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4737">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4738">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4739">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4739">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4740">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text draw offset of menu “my_menu” to (20, 10). */
status = gx_menu_text_offset_set(&my_menu, 20, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text draw offset of menu “my_menu” has been set to (20, 10). */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4753">Crear botón de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4753">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4754">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4754">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4755">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4755">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4756">Este servicio crea un widget de botón de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4756">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4757">Un botón de texto de varias líneas muestra el texto del botón en 1-n líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4757">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4758">La constante GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES define el número máximo de líneas, cuyo valor predeterminado es 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4758">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4759">Los saltos de línea se establecen mediante el retorno de carro o los pares de retorno de carro + avance de línea dentro de la cadena de texto asignada al botón de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4759">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON se deriva de GX_TEXT_BUTTON y admite todos los servicios de API gx_text_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4761">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4762">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4762">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4763">**name**: nombre lógico del botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4763">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4764">**parent**: puntero al widget primario del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4765">**text_id**: id. de recurso del texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4765">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4766">**style**: estilo del botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4766">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4767">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4767">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4768">**text_button_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4768">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4769">**size**: tamaño del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4769">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4770">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del botón de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4774">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4774">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4775">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4775">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4776">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4777">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4777">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4778">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4778">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4787">Dibujar botón de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4787">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4788">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4789">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4790">Este servicio dibuja el botón de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4790">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4791">Normalmente, GUIX llama a esta función internamente como parte de una operación de actualización del lienzo, pero también se expone a la aplicación que podría querer proporcionar una función de dibujo personalizada e invocar el dibujo del botón de texto de varias líneas predeterminado como base de dibujo personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4791">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4792">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4792">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4793">**button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4793">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4794">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4795">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4795">**None**</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4807">Control de eventos predeterminado para el botón de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4807">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4808">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4809">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4810">Este servicio es la función de control de eventos predeterminada para el widget de botón de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4810">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4811">Esta función está accesible para las aplicaciones que quieren proporcionar un control de eventos personalizado para un widget de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4811">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4812">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4812">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4813">**button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4813">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4814">**event_ptr**: evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4814">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4815">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4815">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Control correcto del evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4819">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4820">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4821">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4821">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4830">Función de compatibilidad de dibujo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4830">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4831">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4832">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4833">Esta función de soporte dibuja la parte de texto de un botón de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4833">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4834">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw() llama internamente a esta función, y se proporciona como una API independiente para comodidad de las aplicaciones que definen una función de dibujo de botón de texto de varias líneas personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4834">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4835">Las aplicaciones que quieren personalizar el dibujo del fondo del botón pueden proporcionar su función de dibujo personalizada e invocar el servicio multi_line_text_button_text_draw como parte de su dibujo personalizado para dibujar el texto del botón sobre el fondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4835">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4836">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4836">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4837">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4837">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4838">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4838">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4839">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4839">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4840">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4841">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4842">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4850">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4850">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4851">Establecer el id. de recurso de texto en el botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4851">Set text resource ID to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4852">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4852">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4853">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4853">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4854">Este servicio establece el id. de recurso de cadena especificado en el botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4854">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4855">La cadena puede contener caracteres de nueva línea que actúan para mostrar el texto en varias líneas dentro del área del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4855">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4856">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4856">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4857">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4857">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4858">**string_id**: id. de recurso de la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4858">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4859">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4859">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4860">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del id. de recurso de cadena en el botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4860">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4863">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4863">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4864">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4864">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4865">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4865">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    &my_text_button, MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to “my_text_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4874">Asignar texto al botón de texto (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4874">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4875">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4875">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4876">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4876">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4877">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4877">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4878">Este servicio asigna la cadena especificada al botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4878">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4879">Si el widget text_button se creó con el estilo GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, el widget crea una copia privada de la cadena de texto asignada y, por tanto, se debe invocar la API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set una vez antes de que se solicite este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4879">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4880">Si GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY no está activo, el widget no realiza una copia privada de la cadena de entrada y, por lo tanto, la cadena se debe asignar de forma estática o global, es decir, no puede ser una variable automática o temporal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4880">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4881">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4881">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4882">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4882">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4883">**text**: puntero a la cadena terminada en NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4883">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4884">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4884">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del texto en el botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4888">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) No se ha definido el asignador de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4888">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4900">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4900">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4901">Asignar texto al botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4901">Assign text to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4902">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4902">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4903">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4904">Este servicio asigna la cadena especificada al botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4904">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4905">Si el widget text_button se creó con el estilo GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, el widget crea una copia privada de la cadena de texto asignada y, por tanto, se debe invocar la API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set una vez antes de que se solicite este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4905">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4906">Si GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY no está activo, el widget no realiza una copia privada de la cadena de entrada y, por lo tanto, la cadena se debe asignar de forma estática o global, es decir, no puede ser una variable automática o temporal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4906">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4907">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4907">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4908">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4908">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4909">**string**: puntero a la variable GX_STRING.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4909">**string** pointer to GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4910">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4910">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del texto en el botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4914">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) No se ha definido el asignador de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4914">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4916">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4916">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4917">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4917">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4918">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4918">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(text);

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4924">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4924">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4926">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4926">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-4927">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4927">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-4928">Este servicio elimina el carácter delante de la posición del cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4928">This service deletes the character before multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4929">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla de retroceso, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4929">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-4934">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-4934">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5018">Recuperar información de búfer del widget de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5018">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5019">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5019">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address,
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5020">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5020">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5021">Este servicio recupera información de búfer de un widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5021">This service retrieves buffer information of a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5022">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5022">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5023">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5023">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5024">**buffer_address**: la dirección del búfer de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5024">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5025">**content_size**: el recuento de bytes de los datos de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5025">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5026">**buffer_size**: el tamaño del búfer de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5026">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5027">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5027">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5031">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5032">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5033">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5033">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT context_size;
UINT buffer_size;

/* Retrieves buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
    &buffer_address, &string_size,
    &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5066">Insertar una cadena de caracteres en la posición actual del cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5066">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5067">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5067">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5068">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5069">Esta API está en desuso y se ha reemplazado por gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5069">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5070">Este servicio inserta una cadena de caracteres en el búfer de cadenas de entrada de texto de varias líneas en la posición actual del cursor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5070">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5071">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar un tecla específica, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5071">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5072">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5073">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5073">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5074">**insert_str**: cadena de caracteres de formato UTF-8 que se va a insertar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5074">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5075">**insert_size**: recuento de bytes que se van a insertar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5075">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5076">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5076">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Inserción correcta de la cadena de caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5080">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5080">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5088">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5088">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5089">Insertar una cadena de caracteres en la posición actual del cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5089">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5090">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5090">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5091">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5091">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5092">Este servicio inserta una cadena de caracteres en el búfer de cadenas de entrada de texto de varias líneas en la posición actual del cursor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5092">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5093">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar un tecla específica, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5093">This service is called internally when specific key down events are received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5095">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5095">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5096">**string**: cadena de caracteres con codificación UTF-8 que se va a insertar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5096">**string** UTF-8 encoded character string to be inserted</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = insert_text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(insert_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully inserted the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5139">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5139">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5140">Crear entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5140">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5141">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5141">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5142">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5142">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5143">Este servicio crea un widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5143">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT se deriva de GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW y admite todos los servicios gx_multi_line_text_view.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5145">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5145">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5146">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5146">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5147">**name**: nombre del widget de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5147">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5148">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5148">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5149">**input_buffer**: puntero al búfer de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5149">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5150">**buffer_size**: tamaño del búfer de entrada de texto en bytes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5150">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5151">**style**: estilo del widget de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5151">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5152">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5152">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5153">**text_input_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5153">**text_input_id** Application-defined ID of text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5154">**size**: dimensiones del widget de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5154">**size** Dimensions of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5155">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5155">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5156">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5156">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5157">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5157">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5158">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5158">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5159">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5159">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5160">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5160">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5161">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5161">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5162">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5162">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5163">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5163">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5164">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5164">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5196">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5196">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5197">Recuperar la posición del cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5197">Retrieve multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5198">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5198">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_POINT cursor_pos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5199">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5200">Este servicio recupera la posición del cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5200">This service retrieves the mult-line text input cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5201">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5201">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5202">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5202">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5203">**cursor_pos**: posición del cursor recuperado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5203">**cursor_pos** Retrieved cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5204">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5204">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Posición correcta del cursor recuperado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved cursor position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5206">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5206">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5207">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5207">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5208">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5209">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5209">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5210">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5210">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the cursor position of “my_text_input”. */
GX_POINT cursor_pos;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(&my_text_input,
    &cursor_pos);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor position has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5244">Eliminar el carácter en la posición del cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5244">Delete the character at the multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5245">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5246">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5247">Este servicio elimina el carácter de después de la posición del cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5247">This service deletes the character after the multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5248">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla de supresión, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5248">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5249">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5249">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5250">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5250">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5251">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5251">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5252">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Eliminación correcta de un carácter después del cursor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5252">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5253">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5253">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5254">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5254">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5256">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Fuente no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5256">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5257">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5257">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5258">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5258">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5259">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5259">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete the character after the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character after the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5291">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5291">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5292">Mover el cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas a la línea siguiente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5292">Move the multi line text input cursor to the next line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5293">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5293">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5294">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5294">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5295">Este servicio coloca el cursor del widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas en la línea siguiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5295">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the next line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5296">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla de flecha abajo, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5296">This service is called internally when a down arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5297">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5297">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5298">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5298">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5299">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5299">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5300">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del cursor de entrada de texto a la línea siguiente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5300">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to the next line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5301">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5301">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5302">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5302">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5303">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5303">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5304">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Fuente o altura de línea no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5304">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or line height</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5305">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5305">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5306">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5306">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5307">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5307">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the next line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to the next line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5339">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5339">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5340">Mover el cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas hasta el final de la línea actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5340">Move the multi line text input cursor to the end of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5341">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5341">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_end(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5342">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5343">Este servicio coloca el cursor del widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas al final de la línea de cadena actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5343">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the end of the current string line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5344">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla de fin, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5344">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5345">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5345">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5346">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5346">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5347">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5347">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5348">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del cursor de entrada de texto al final de la línea actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5348">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to end of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5349">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5349">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5350">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5350">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5351">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5351">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5352">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5352">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5353">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5353">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5354">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5354">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the end of current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the end of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5387">Control de eventos predeterminado para la entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5387">Default event handling for multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5388">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5388">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5389">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5389">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5390">Este servicio es la función de control de eventos predeterminada para el widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5390">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5391">Esta función está accesible para las aplicaciones que quieren proporcionar un control de eventos personalizado para un widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5391">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5392">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5393">**button**: puntero al bloque de control de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5393">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5394">**event_ptr**: evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5394">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5395">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5395">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Control correcto del evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5400">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5400">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5401">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5401">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5402">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5402">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5434">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5434">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5435">Establecer el color de fondo de la entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5435">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5436">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5437">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5438">Este servicio asigna los colores de relleno para el widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5438">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5439">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5439">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5440">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5440">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5441">**normal_fill_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno normal que se usa en estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5441">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5442">**selected_fill_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno seleccionado que se usa cuando el widget obtiene el foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5442">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5443">**disabled_fill_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno deshabilitado que se usa cuando GX_STYLE_ENABLED no está activo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5443">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5444">**readonly_fill_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno de solo lectura que se usa cuando GX_STYLE_ENABLED y GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY están activos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5444">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5445">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5445">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de los colores para la entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5447">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5447">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5448">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5448">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5449">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5449">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5450">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5450">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5451">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5451">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```
