## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5483">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5483">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5484">Mover el cursor de entrada de texto hasta el inicio de la línea actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5484">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5485">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5485">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5486">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5486">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5487">Este servicio mueve la posición del cursor de entrada de texto al principio de la línea actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5487">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5488">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla de inicio, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5488">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5489">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5490">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5490">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5491">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del cursor al principio de la línea actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to start of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5495">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5495">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5496">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5496">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5497">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5497">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5498">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5498">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the start of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5530">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5530">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5531">Mover el cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas un carácter hacia la izquierda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5531">Move multi line text input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5532">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5532">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5533">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5534">Este servicio mueve el cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas un carácter hacia la izquierda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5534">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5535">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla a la izquierda, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5535">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5536">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5537">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5537">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5538">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del cursor hacia la izquierda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the left</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5540">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5540">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5541">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5541">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5542">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5542">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5543">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Fuente no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5543">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5544">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5544">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5545">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5545">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5546">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5546">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor one character to the left. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved one character to the left. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5578">gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5578">gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5579">Mover el cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas un carácter hacia la derecha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5579">Move mult line text input cursor one character to the right</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5580">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5580">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5581">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5582">Este servicio mueve el cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas un carácter hacia la derecha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5582">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the right.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5583">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla a la derecha, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5583">This service is called internally when a right key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5584">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5584">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5585">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5585">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5586">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5586">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5587">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del cursor hacia la derecha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5587">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the right</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5588">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5588">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5589">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5589">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5590">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5590">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5591">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5591">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5592">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5592">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5593">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5593">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor one character to the right. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input cursor has been moved one character to the right. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5625">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5625">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5626">Agregar estilos de entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5626">Add multi line text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5627">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5628">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5629">Este servicio agrega estilos a un widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5629">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5630">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5630">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5631">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5631">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5632">**style**: estilos que se van a agregar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5632">**style** Styles to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5633">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5633">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5634">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5634">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Adición correcta de estilo de entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5638">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5639">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5640">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5640">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style GX_STYTLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS to multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS has been successfully added. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5673">Quitar estilos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5673">Remove styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5674">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5674">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_remove(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5675">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5675">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5676">Este servicio quita los estilos especificados del widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5676">This service removes the specified styles from the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5677">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5677">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5678">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5678">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5679">**style**: estilos que se van a quitar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5679">**style** Styles to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5680">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5680">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS from text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_remove(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS has been successfully removed. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5766">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5766">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5767">Establecer el color del texto de entrada de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5767">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5768">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5769">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5770">Este servicio asigna los colores de texto para el widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5770">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5771">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5771">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5772">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5772">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5773">**normal_fill_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de texto normal que se usa en estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5773">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5774">**selected_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de texto seleccionado que se usa cuando el widget obtiene el foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5774">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5775">**disabled_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de texto deshabilitado que se usa cuando GX_STYLE_ENABLED no está activo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5775">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5776">**readonly_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de texto de solo lectura que se usa cuando GX_STYLE_ENABLED y GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY están activos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5776">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the read only text color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5777">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5777">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5778">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de los colores para la entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5778">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5779">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5779">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5780">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5780">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5781">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5781">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5782">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5782">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5783">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5783">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill colors of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5815">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5815">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5816">Seleccionar texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5816">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5817">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5817">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5818">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5818">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5819">Este servicio selecciona texto de la entrada del texto de varias líneas el índice de marca de inicio y de marca final especificado y resalta el texto seleccionado con los colores de texto y relleno seleccionados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5819">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5820">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5820">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5821">**text_input**: puntero al bloque de control de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5821">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5822">**start_index**: índice del primer carácter seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5822">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5823">**end_index**: índice del último carácter seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5823">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5824">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5824">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5825">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Selección correcta de texto de entrada del texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5825">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5826">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5826">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5827">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5827">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5828">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5828">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5829">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor de índice no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5829">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5830">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5830">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5831">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5831">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5832">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5832">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5864">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5864">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5865">Asignar texto a la entrada de texto (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5865">Assign text to the text input (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5866">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5866">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5867">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5867">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5868">Esta API está en desuso y se ha reemplazado por gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5868">This API is deprecated and replace by gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5869">Este servicio asigna la cadena especificada a la entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5869">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5870">Si el tamaño del búfer de entrada del widget multi_line_text_input es menor que la longitud de la cadena, esta se truncará.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5870">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5871">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5871">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5872">**text_input**: puntero al bloque de control de entrada de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5872">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5873">**text**: puntero a la cadena terminada en NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5873">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5874">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5874">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5875">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del texto en la entrada de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5875">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5876">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5876">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5877">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5877">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5878">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5878">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5879">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5879">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5880">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5880">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5881">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5881">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
    “myrstring”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5897">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5897">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */

string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5932">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5932">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5933">Mover el cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas a la línea anterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5933">Move multi line text input cursor to the previous line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5934">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5934">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5935">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5936">Este servicio mueve el cursor de entrada de texto de varias líneas a la línea de texto anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5936">This service moves the multi line text input cursor to the previous line of text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5937">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla de flecha arriba, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5937">This service is called internally when an up arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5938">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5938">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5939">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5939">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5940">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5940">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5941">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del cursor hacia la línea anterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5941">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the previous line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5942">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5942">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5943">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5943">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5944">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5944">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5945">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5945">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5946">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5946">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5947">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5947">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor to the previous line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the previous line. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5979">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5979">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5980">Crear vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5980">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5981">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5981">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5982">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5982">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-5983">Este servicio crea un widget GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5983">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5984">Este tipo de widget se deriva de GX_WINDOW y, por tanto, todos los servicios de API gx_window también se pueden usar con este tipo de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5984">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5985">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5985">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5986">**text_view**: bloque de control widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5986">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5987">**name**: nombre del widget de vista de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5987">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5988">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5988">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5989">**text_id**: id. de recurso de la cadena de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5989">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5990">**style**: estilo del widget de vista de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5990">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5991">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5991">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5992">**text_view_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la vista de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5992">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5993">**size**: dimensiones del widget de vista de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5993">**size** Dimensions of text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-5994">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5994">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5995">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del widget de vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5995">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created multi-line text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5996">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5996">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5997">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5997">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5998">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5998">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-5999">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-5999">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6000">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6000">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6001">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6001">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6002">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6002">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_create(&my_text_view,
    “my_text_view”, &my_parent,
    TEXT_STRING_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text view “my_text_view” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6034">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6034">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6035">Dibujar un widget de vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6035">Draw a multi line text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6036">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6036">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW * text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6037">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6037">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6038">Este servicio dibuja un widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6038">This service draws a multi line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6039">Normalmente, se llama a este servicio internamente durante la actualización del lienzo, pero también se puede llamar desde funciones personalizadas de dibujo de la vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6039">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom multi line text view drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6040">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6041">**text_view**: bloque de control widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6041">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6042">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6042">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6043">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6043">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6044">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6044">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6045">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6045">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6046">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6046">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom multi line text view drawing function. */

VOID my_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view)
{
    /* Call default multi line text view draw. */
    gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6078">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6078">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6079">Procesar evento de vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6079">Process multi-line text view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6080">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6080">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6081">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6082">Este servicio procesa un evento para un widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6082">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6083">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6083">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6084">**text_view**: bloque de control widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6084">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6085">**event**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6085">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6086">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6086">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto de eventos de vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6090">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6090">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6091">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6091">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6092">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6092">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6093">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6093">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6125">gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6125">gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6126">Establecer fuente usada en la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6126">Set font used in multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6127">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6128">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6129">Este servicio establece la fuente de un widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6129">This service sets the font of a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6130">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6131">**text_view**: bloque de control widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6131">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6132">**font_id**: id. de recurso de la fuente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6132">**font_id** Resource ID for the font</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6133">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la fuente para la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set font for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6135">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6135">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6136">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6136">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6137">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6137">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6138">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6138">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6139">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6139">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set font ID FONT_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set(&my_text_view, FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text view “my_text_view” will use the specified font to display its text. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6171">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6171">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6172">Establecer el espacio entre líneas de la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6172">Set multi-line text view line space</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6173">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6173">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_BYTE line_space);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6174">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6174">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6175">Este servicio establece el espacio entre las líneas de texto del widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6175">This service sets the spacing between lines of text for the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6176">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6176">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6177">**view**: bloque de control widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6177">**view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6178">**line_space**: valor que se va a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6178">**line_space** Value to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6179">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6179">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del valor de espacio entre líneas para la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set line space value for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6181">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6181">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6183">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6184">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6184">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line space of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6216">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6216">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6217">Obtener información de desplazamiento de la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6217">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6218">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6218">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6219">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6220">Este servicio obtiene la información de desplazamiento de la vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6220">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6221">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6221">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6222">**text_view**: bloque de control widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6222">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6223">**Style**: GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL o GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6223">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6224">**Info**: puntero al destino de la información de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6224">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6225">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_SCROLL_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6225">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6226">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6226">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6227">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información de desplazamiento de la vista de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6227">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6228">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) El widget no está visible o el id. de fuente de la vista de texto no es válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6228">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6229">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6229">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6230">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6230">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6231">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6231">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6232">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6232">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(&my_text_view,
    &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6264">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6264">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6265">Establecer el color del texto para la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6265">Set the text color for the multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6266">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6267">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6268">Este servicio asigna el color de texto al widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6268">This service assigns text color to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6269">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6269">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6270">**text_view**: bloque de control widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6270">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6271">**normal_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de texto normal que se usa en estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6271">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6272">**selected_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de texto seleccionado que se usa cuando el widget obtiene el foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6272">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6273">**disabled_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de texto deshabilitado que se usa cuando GX_STYLE_ENABLED no está activo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6273">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6274">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6274">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de los colores para la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6276">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6276">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6277">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6277">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6278">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6279">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6280">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(&my_text_view,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6312">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6312">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6313">Establecer la cadena de texto del sistema en la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6313">Set system text string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6314">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6314">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6315">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6315">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6316">Este servicio establece el id. de recurso de una cadena en el widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6316">This service sets the resource ID of a string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6317">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6317">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6318">**text_view**: bloque de control widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6318">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6319">**text_id**: id. de recurso para la cadena de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6319">**text_id** Resource ID for the text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6320">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6320">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del id. de cadena para la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string id for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6324">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6324">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6325">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6326">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6327">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6327">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string ID STRING_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(&my_text_view, STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text id of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6359">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6359">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6360">Establecer la cadena definida por el usuario en la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6360">Set user-defined string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6361">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6361">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6362">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6362">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6363">Este servicio asigna una cadena de texto al widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6363">This service assigns a text string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6364">Si el widget text_view se creó con el estilo GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, el widget crea una copia privada de la cadena de texto asignada y, por tanto, se debe invocar la API gx_system_memory_allocate_set una vez antes de que se solicite este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6364">If the text_view widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6365">Si GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY no está activo, el widget no realiza una copia privada de la cadena de entrada y, por lo tanto, la cadena asignada se debe asignar de forma estática o global, es decir, no puede ser una variable automática o temporal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6365">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the assigned string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6366">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6366">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6367">**text_view**: bloque de control widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6367">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6368">**text**: cadena de texto terminada en NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6368">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6369">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6369">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la cadena para la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6371">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) El asignador de memoria no está definido o se ha producido un error de asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6371">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6374">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6375">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6376">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6376">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string “my string” to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(&my_text_view, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6408">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6408">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6409">Establecer espacio en blanco en la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6409">Set multi-line text view whitespace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6410">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6410">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_UBYTE whitespace);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6411">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6411">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6412">Este servicio establece el espacio entre los contornos del widget y el área del cliente para un widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6412">This service sets spacing between widget outlines and client area for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6413">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6414">**text_view**: bloque de control widget de vista de texto de varias líneas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6414">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6415">**whitespace**: ancho del margen entre el widget text_view y el texto mostrado, en píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6415">**whitespace** Width of margin between text_view widget and the displayed text, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6416">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del espacio en blanco para la vista de texto de varias líneas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set whitespace for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6420">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6420">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6421">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6421">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6422">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6422">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set whitespace of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the whitespace of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6454">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6454">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6455">Crear solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6455">Create numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6456">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6456">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id,
    ULONG style, USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6457">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6458">Este servicio crea un widget de solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6458">This service creates a numeric pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6459">Un widget numeric_pixelmap_prompt es simplemente un widget pixelmap_prompt que mantiene su propio búfer y proporciona una API gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT), el tamaño del búfer se define mediante la constante GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, cuyo valor predeterminado es 16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6459">A numeric_pixelmap_prompt is just a pixelmap_prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6460">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT se deriva de GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT y admite todos los servicios de API gx_pixelmap_prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6460">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6461">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6461">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6462">**prompt**: bloque de control de solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6462">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6463">**name**: nombre de la solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6463">**name** Name of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6464">**parent**: bloque de control del widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6464">**parent** Parent widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6465">**text_id**: id. de cadena de recurso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6465">**text_id** Resource string id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6466">**fill_id**: id. de mapa de píxeles para el área de relleno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6466">**fill_id** Pixelmap id for fill area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6467">**style**: estilo de solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles, el **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6467">**style** Style of numeric pixelmap prompt, **Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6468">**pixelmap_prompt_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6468">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6469">**size**: dimensiones de la solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6469">**size** Dimensions of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6470">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully create numeric pixlemap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6474">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6474">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6475">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6475">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6476">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6476">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6477">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6477">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6478">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    “my_numeric_pix_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_FEEL_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the numeric pixelmap prompt “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been created. */
```
