## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6482">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6482">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6483">Reemplazar la función de formato de la solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6483">Override format function of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6484">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6484">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    OID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6485">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6486">Este servicio invalida la función de formato predeterminada del widget de solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6486">This service overrides the default format function of the numeric pixlemap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6487">La función de formato predeterminada convierte el valor de la solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles en una cadena y lo almacena en el búfer privado del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6487">The default format function converts the numeric pixelmap prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6488">Este servicio permite que la aplicación defina su propia función de formato para dar formato y almacenar el valor de la solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles en el búfer privado del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6488">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric pixelmap prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6489">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6490">**prompt**: bloque de control de solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6490">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6491">**format_func**: función de formato que se va a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6491">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6492">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6492">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6493">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la función de formato de solicitud numérica de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6493">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric pixlemap prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6495">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6495">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6496">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6496">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6497">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6497">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric pixelmap format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override default format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set(
    &my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been override. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6546">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6546">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6547">Reemplazar la función de formato de la solicitud numérica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6547">Override format function of numeric prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6548">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt,
    VOID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6549">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6550">Este servicio invalida la función de formato predeterminada de un widget de solicitud numérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6550">This service overrides the default format function of a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6551">La función de formato predeterminada convierte el valor de la solicitud numérica en una cadena y lo almacena en el búfer privado del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6551">The default format function converts the numeric prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6552">Este servicio permite que la aplicación defina su propia función de formato para dar formato y almacenar el valor de la solicitud numérica en el búfer privado del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6552">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6553">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6553">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6554">**prompt**: bloque de control de solicitud numérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6554">**prompt** Numeric prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6555">**format_func**: función de formato que se va a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6555">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6556">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6556">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6557">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la función de formato de solicitud numérica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6557">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6558">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6558">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6559">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6560">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6560">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6561">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6561">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt, INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100, prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override the default format function of “my_numeric_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set(&my_numeric_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the format function of “my_numeric_prompt” has been override. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6583">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6583">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6584">Crear rueda del mouse numérica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6584">Create numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6585">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6585">Prototype</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6586">UINT gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create( GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL \*wheel, GX_CONST GX_CHAR \*name, GX_WIDGET \*parent, INT start_val, INT end_val, ULONG style, USHORT wheel_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE \*size);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6586">UINT gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create( GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL \*wheel, GX_CONST GX_CHAR \*name, GX_WIDGET \*parent, INT start_val, INT end_val, ULONG style, USHORT wheel_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE \*size);</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6587">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6588">Este servicio crea un widget de rueda del mouse numérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6588">This service creates a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6589">Una rueda del mouse numérica es un tipo de widget de rueda del mouse que se usa específicamente para mostrar un intervalo de números.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6589">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6590">También están disponibles otros tipos de widgets de rueda del mouse numérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6590">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6591">Consulte la API gx_scroll_wheel_create() para obtener más información sobre la jerarquía del widget de rueda del mouse numérica, los tipos de widget y la derivación del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6591">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6592">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL se deriva de GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL y admite todos los servicios gx_text_scroll_wheel y gx_scroll_wheel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6592">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_text_scroll_wheel and gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6593">Todos los tipos de rueda del mouse generan eventos GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT en su elemento primario cuando se desplaza la rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6593">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6594">De forma predeterminada, una rueda del mouse numérica tendrá las filas abs(end_val – start_val) + 1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6594">A numeric scroll wheel will default to having abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6595">Es decir, en la rueda del mouse se mostrarán todos los valores entre start_val y end_val, con un incremento o decremento de 1 con cada fila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6595">In other words, the scroll wheel will display every value between start_val and end_val, incrementing or decrementing by 1 with each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6596">Tenga en cuenta que start_val puede ser mayor o menor que end_val, según el modo en el que la aplicación quiere que aparezca el intervalo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6596">Note that start_val can be greater or less than end_val, depending on which way the application wants the range to appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6597">Si la aplicación quiere cambiar el incremento de fila, puede hacerlo llamando a gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() después de crear la rueda del mouse numérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6597">If the application wants to change the row increment, it can do this by calling gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() after creating the numeric scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6598">Por ejemplo, una aplicación que quiere crear una rueda del mouse que muestre los valores de los años 1980 a 2020, con un incremento de 5, podría hacer esto:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6598">For example, an application wanting to create a scroll wheel that displays the values years 1980 to 2020, incrementing by 5, might do this:</span></span>

```C
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, GX_NULL, parent, 1980,
    2020, style, id, &size);

/* the years 1980 through 2020, inclusive, incrementing by 5 years,
yields 9 total rows */

gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 9);
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6599">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6599">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6600">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse numérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6600">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6601">**name**: nombre lógico del widget de botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6601">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6602">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6602">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6603">**start_val**: valor numérico inicial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6603">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6604">**end_val**: valor numérico final.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6604">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6605">**style**: estilo de la casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6605">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6606">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6606">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6607">**wheel_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6607">**wheel_id** Application-defined ID of scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6608">**size**: dimensiones del widget de rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6608">**size** Dimensions of scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6609">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la rueda del mouse numérica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created numeric scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6611">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6611">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6612">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6612">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6613">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6613">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6614">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6614">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6615">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6615">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6616">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6616">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6617">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6617">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “year_wheel”. */
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&year_wheel,
    “year_selector””, &parent,
    1980, 2040,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER |
    GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT | GX_STYLE_WRAP |
    GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    YEAR_WHEEL_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel “year_wheel” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6635">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6635">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6636">Asignar intervalo de valores de rueda del mouse numérica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6636">Assign value range of numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6637">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6637">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT start_val, INT end_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6638">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6638">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6639">Este servicio modifica el intervalo de valores permitidos y mostrados por un widget de rueda del mouse numérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6639">This service modifies the range of values allowed and displayed by a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6640">Una rueda del mouse numérica es un tipo de widget de rueda del mouse que se usa específicamente para mostrar un intervalo de números.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6640">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6641">También están disponibles otros tipos de widgets de rueda del mouse numérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6641">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6642">Consulte la API gx_scroll_wheel_create() para obtener más información sobre la jerarquía del widget de rueda del mouse numérica, los tipos de widget y la derivación del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6642">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6643">Al invocar esta API, se restablece el número total de filas de la rueda del mouse en abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, lo que significa que la rueda del mouse se incrementará en 1 para cada fila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6643">Invoking this API resets the scroll wheel total rows to abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, meaning the scroll wheel will increment by 1 for each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6644">Para cambiar esto, la aplicación puede llamar a gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() para cambiar el número total de filas, cambiando efectivamente el incremento del valor entre las filas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6644">To change this, the application can call gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() to change the total number of row, effectively changing the value increment between rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6645">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6645">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6646">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse numérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6646">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6647">**start_val**: valor numérico inicial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6647">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6648">**end_val**: valor numérico final.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6648">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6649">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del intervalo de rueda del mouse numérica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric scroll wheel range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6653">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6653">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6654">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6654">Initialization and threads</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6655">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6655">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change range of “rate” scroll wheel. */

status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(&year_wheel, 0, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel range has been modified. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6674">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6674">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6675">Crear botón de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6675">Create pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6676">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6676">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6677">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6678">Este servicio crea un widget de botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6678">This service creates a pixelmap button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6679">GX_ICON_BUTTON se deriva de GX_BUTTON y admite todos los servicios gx_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6679">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6680">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6680">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6681">**button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6681">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6682">**name**: nombre lógico del widget de botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6682">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6683">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6683">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6684">**normal_id**: id. de recurso de estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6684">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6685">**selected_id**: id. de recurso de estado seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6685">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6686">**disabled_id**: id. de recurso de estado deshabilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6686">**disabled_id** Disabled state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6687">**style**: estilo de la casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6687">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6688">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6688">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6689">**pixelmap_button_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6689">**pixelmap_button_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6690">**size**: dimensiones del botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6690">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6691">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6691">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6692">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del botón de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6692">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6693">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6693">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6694">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6694">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6695">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6695">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6696">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6696">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6697">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6697">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6698">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6698">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6699">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6699">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_create(&my_pixelmap_button,
    “my_pixelmap_button”, &my_parent,
    MY_NORMAL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_DESELECTED_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_PIXELMAP_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button “my_pixelmap_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6721">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6721">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6722">Dibujar botón de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6722">Draw pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6723">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6723">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6724">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6724">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6725">Este servicio dibuja un widget de botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6725">This service draws a pixelmap button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6726">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de botón de mapa de píxeles personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6726">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6727">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6728">**button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6728">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6729">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6729">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6730">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6730">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6731">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6731">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6732">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6732">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6733">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6733">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap button drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap button draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_button_draw(button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6755">gx_pixelmap_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6755">gx_pixelmap_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6756">Procesamiento de eventos de botón de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6756">Pixelmap button event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6757">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6757">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6758">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6758">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6759">Este servicio proporciona el control de eventos predeterminado para el tipo de widget de botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6759">This service provides default event handling for the pixelmap button widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6760">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6761">**button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6761">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6762">**event_ptr**: puntero a estructura GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6762">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6763">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6763">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dibujo correcto del botón de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap button draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6767">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6767">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6768">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6768">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6769">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6769">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_button_event_process(icon, event_ptr);
    
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6791">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6791">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6792">Asignar mapas de píxeles a botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6792">Assign pixelmaps to button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6793">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6793">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6794">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6794">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6795">Este servicio establece mapas de píxeles en el botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6795">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6796">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6796">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6797">**button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6797">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6798">**normal_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles que se va a usar como estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6798">**normal_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6799">**selected_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles que se va a usar cuando se selecciona el botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6799">**selected_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is selected</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6800">**disabled_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles que se va a usar cuando se deshabilita el botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6800">**disabled_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is disabled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6801">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6801">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6802">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del mapa de píxeles en el botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6802">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6803">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6803">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6804">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6804">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6805">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6805">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6806">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6806">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6807">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6807">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_button,
    NORMAL_ID, SELECTED_ID,
    DISABLED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button is properly configured with the specified pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6829">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6829">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6830">Crear solicitud de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6830">Create pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6831">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_pixelmap_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6832">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6833">Este servicio crea un widget de solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6833">This service creates a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6834">Una solicitud de mapa de píxeles difiere de la solicitud GX_PROMPT estándar en que pinta el fondo de la solicitud con mapas de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6834">A pixelmap prompt differs from a standard GX_PROMPT in that it paints the background of the prompt using pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6835">La función de creación acepta un id. de mapa de píxeles, el mapa de píxeles de relleno de estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6835">The create function accepts one pixelmap id, the normal state fill pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6836">Pueden asignarse hasta seis mapas de píxeles en la solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6836">Up to six pixelmaps may be assigned to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6837">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6838">**prompt**: puntero al bloque de control de solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6838">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6839">**name**: nombre lógico del widget de solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6839">**name** Logical name of pixelmap prompt widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6840">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6840">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6841">**text_id**: id. de recurso del texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6841">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6842">**fill_id**: id. de recurso de relleno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6842">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6843">**style**: estilo de la casilla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6843">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6844">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6844">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6845">**pixelmap_prompt_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6845">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6846">**size**: dimensiones de la solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6846">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6847">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la solicitud de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6851">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6851">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6852">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6852">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6853">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6853">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6854">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6854">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6855">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6855">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_prompt”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_pixelmap_prompt,
    “my_pixelmap_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_LEFT_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_FILL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_RIGHT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt “my_pixelmap_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6871">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6871">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6872">Dibujar solicitud de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6872">Draw pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6873">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6873">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6874">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6874">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6875">Este servicio dibuja un widget de solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6875">This service draws a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6876">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de solicitud de mapa de píxeles personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6876">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap prompt widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6877">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6877">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6878">**prompt**: puntero al bloque de control de solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6878">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6879">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6879">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6880">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6880">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6881">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6882">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6882">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6883">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6883">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap prompt draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6899">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6899">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6900">Asignar mapas de píxeles a solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6900">Assign pixelmaps to prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6901">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6901">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_right_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_right_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6902">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6903">Este servicio asigna los id. de mapa de píxeles a la solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6903">This service assigns pixelmap ids to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6904">Los id. de mapa de píxeles izquierdo, de relleno y derecho se usan para permitir que la aplicación use un conjunto de mapas de píxeles para solicitudes de distintos anchos, pero con un alto común para ahorrar requisitos de almacenamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6904">The left, fill, and right pixelmap ids are used to allow the application to use one set of pixelmaps for prompts of various widths but a common height to save on storage requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6905">Si no se usan los id. izquierdo y derecho, se deben establecer en 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6905">If the left and right IDs are not used, they should be set to 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6906">Si la solicitud se debe dibujar de forma diferente cuando obtiene el foco de entrada, se usan los id. de mapa de píxeles seleccionados para ese propósito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6906">If the prompt should draw itself differently when it gains input focus, the selected pixelmap ids are used for that purpose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6907">Si los id. seleccionados no se usan o son los mismos que los id. normales, establézcalos en 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6907">If the selected ids are not used or are the same as the normal ids, set them to 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6908">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6908">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6909">**prompt**: puntero al bloque de control de solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6909">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6910">**normal_left_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles que se va a usar en el lado izquierdo en el estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6910">**normal_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6911">**normal_fill_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles que se va a usar como relleno en mosaico en el estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6911">**normal_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6912">**normal_right_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles que se va a usar en el lado derecho en el estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6912">**normal_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6913">**selected_left_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles que se va a usar en el lado izquierdo en el estado seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6913">**selected_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6914">**selected_fill_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles que se va a usar como relleno en mosaico en el estado seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6914">**selected_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6915">**selected_right_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles que se va a usar en el lado derecho en el estado seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6915">**selected_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the selected state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6916">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6916">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6917">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del mapa de píxeles en la solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6917">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6918">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6918">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6919">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6919">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6920">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6920">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Resource ID not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6921">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6921">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6922">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6922">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6923">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6923">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign pixelmap IDs to “my_prompt”. Only the normal state pixelmaps are used in this case */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set (&my_prompt,
    normal_left_id, normal_fill_id,
    normal_right_id, 0, 0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt is properly configured with pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6945">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6945">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6946">Crear control deslizante de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6946">Create pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6947">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6947">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixelmap_info, ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6948">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6948">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6949">Este servicio crea un widget de control deslizante de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6949">This service creates a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6950">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6950">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6951">**slider**: puntero al bloque de control deslizante de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6951">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6952">**name**: nombre lógico del widget de control deslizante de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6952">**name** Logical name of pixelmap slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6953">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6953">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6954">**info**: puntero a una estructura GX_SLIDER_INFO que contiene los valores que definen el valor mínimo, el valor máximo, el valor actual y los límites de aguja del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6954">**info** Pointer to a GX_SLIDER_INFO structure which contains values defining the slider minimum value, maximum value, current value, and needle limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6955">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6955">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6956">**pixelmap_info**: puntero a una estructura GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO que define los mapas de píxeles que se usan para dibujar el fondo y la aguja del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6956">**pixelmap_info** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6957">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6957">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6958">El fondo del control deslizante puede usar uno o dos mapas de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6958">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6959">Si usa uno, el fondo no cambia a medida que se mueve la aguja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6959">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6960">Si se definen dos fondos, el fondo que se encuentra antes de la aguja usa el primer mapa de píxeles de fondo y el fondo de después de la aguja usa el segundo mapa de píxeles de fondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6960">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6961">**style**: estilo del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6961">**style** Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6962">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6962">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6963">**pixelmap_slider_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del control deslizante de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6963">**pixelmap_slider_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6964">**size**: dimensiones de la solicitud de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6964">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6965">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6965">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del control deslizante de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6967">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6967">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6968">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6968">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6969">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6969">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6970">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6970">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6971">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6971">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6972">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6972">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6973">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6973">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate slider information structure. */
info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_max_tralvel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_pixelmap_slider”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider_create(&my_pixelmap_slider,
                            “my_pixelmap_slider”, &my_parent,
                            &info, &pixelmap_info,
                            GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                            MY_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider “my_pixelmap_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6993">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6993">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6994">Dibujar control deslizante de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6994">Draw pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6995">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6996">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-6997">Este servicio dibuja un widget de control deslizante de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6997">This service draws a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-6998">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de control deslizante de mapa de píxeles personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6998">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap slider widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-6999">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-6999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7000">**slider**: puntero al bloque de control deslizante de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7000">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7001">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7001">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7002">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7002">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7003">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7004">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7004">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7005">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap slider drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap slider draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(pixelmap_slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7026">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7026">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7027">Procesar evento de control deslizante de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7027">Process pixelmap slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7028">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7028">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7029">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7030">Este servicio procesa un evento para el widget de control deslizante de mapa de píxeles especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7030">This service processes an event for the specified pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7031">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7031">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7032">**slider**: puntero al mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7032">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7033">**slider**: puntero de evento de bloque de control al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7033">**slider** control block event Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7034">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7034">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto del evento de control deslizante de mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7036">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7036">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7038">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7038">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7039">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7040">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7040">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7041">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7041">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */
UINT my_event_hanlder(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                    event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                  event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7062">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7062">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7063">Asignar mapas de píxeles a control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7063">Assign pixelmaps to slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7064">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7064">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixinfo);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7065">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7065">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7066">Este servicio establece mapas de píxeles en el control deslizante de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7066">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7067">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7068">**slider**: puntero al bloque de control deslizante de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7068">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7069">**pixinfo**: puntero a una estructura GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO que define los mapas de píxeles que se usan para dibujar el fondo y la aguja del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7069">**pixinfo** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7070">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7070">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7071">El fondo del control deslizante puede usar uno o dos mapas de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7071">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7072">Si usa uno, el fondo no cambia a medida que se mueve la aguja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7072">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7073">Si se definen dos fondos, el fondo que se encuentra antes de la aguja usa el primer mapa de píxeles de fondo y el fondo de después de la aguja usa el segundo mapa de píxeles de fondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7073">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7074">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7074">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del mapa de píxeles en el control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7078">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7078">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7079">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7079">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7080">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7080">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider _pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_slider,
                                &pixelmap_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider is properly configured with “pixelmap_info”. */
```
