## <a name="gx_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7102">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7102">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7103">Dibujar fondo de barra de progreso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7103">Draw progress bar background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7104">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7105">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7106">Este servicio dibuja el fondo de la barra de progreso especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7106">This service draws the background of the specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7107">Esta función se llama internamente como parte de gx_progress_bar_draw(), pero se expone a la aplicación para admitir los casos en los que esta define una función de dibujo de barra de progreso personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7107">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7108">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7109">**progress bar**: puntero al bloque de control de barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7109">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7110">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7110">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7111">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7111">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7112">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7112">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7113">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7113">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7114">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7114">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7125">gx_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7125">gx_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7126">Crear una barra de progreso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7126">Create a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7127">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_create(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *progress_bar_info,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT progress_bar_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7128">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7129">Este servicio crea un widget de barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7129">This service creates a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7130">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7131">**progress_bar**: bloque de control de barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7131">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7132">**name** nombre lógico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7132">**name** Logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7133">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7133">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7134">**progress_bar_info**: puntero a una estructura GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7134">**progress_bar_info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7135">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7135">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7136">**style**: estilo de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7136">**style** Style of progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7137">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7137">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7138">**progress_bar_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7138">**progress_bar_id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7139">**size**: dimensiones de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7139">**size** Dimensions of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7140">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7140">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7141">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la barra de progreso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7141">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7144">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7144">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7145">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7145">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7146">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7146">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7147">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7148">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7149">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7149">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

size.gx_rectangle_left = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_top = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_right = 110;
size.gx_rectangle_bottom = 140;

/* Create a progress bar with the specified information. */
status = gx_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar, GX_NULL, GX_NULL,
                        &info, GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN,
                        0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCSESS the progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7160">gx_progress_bar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7160">gx_progress_bar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7161">Dibujar una barra de progreso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7161">Draw a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7162">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7162">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7163">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7163">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7164">Este servicio dibuja un widget de barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7164">This service draws a progress bar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7165">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de barra de progreso personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7165">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom progress bar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7166">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7166">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7167">**progress_bar**: bloque de control de barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7167">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7168">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7168">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7169">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7169">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7170">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7170">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7171">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7171">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7172">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7172">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7186">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7186">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7187">Este servicio procesa un evento de barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7187">This service processes a progress bar event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7188">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7190">**event_ptr**: puntero a estructura GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7190">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7191">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7191">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7196">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7196">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7197">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7197">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7198">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7198">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7234">gx_progress_bar_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7234">gx_progress_bar_info_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7235">Establecer la estructura de información de la barra de progreso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7235">Set progress bar information structure</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7236">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7236">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_info_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7237">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7237">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7238">Este servicio restablece la estructura de información de un widget de barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7238">This service resets the information structure of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7239">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7239">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7240">**progress_bar**: bloque de control de barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7240">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7241">**info**: puntero a una estructura GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7241">**info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7242">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7242">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7243">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Restablecimiento correcto de la información de la barra de progreso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully reset progress bar info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7247">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7247">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7248">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7248">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7249">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7249">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

status = gx_progress_bar_info_set(&progress_bar, &info);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar info was re-assigned. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7318">**normal_text_color**: id. de recurso del color de texto normal que se usa en estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7318">**normal_text_color** Resource ID of normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7320">**disabled_text_color**: id. de recurso del color de texto deshabilitado que se usa cuando GX_STYLE_ENABLED no está activo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7320">**disabled_text_color** Resource ID of disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7322">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del color del texto de la barra de progreso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7322">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7323">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7323">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7324">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7324">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7326">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the progress bar “my_progress_bar”*/
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* if status is GX_SUCCESS, the progress bar text colors were successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7338">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7338">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7339">Dibujar el texto de la barra de progreso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7339">Draw progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7340">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7340">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7341">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7341">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7342">Este servicio dibuja el texto de la barra de progreso especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7342">This service draws the text of specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7343">Esta función se llama internamente como parte de gx_progress_bar_draw(), pero se expone a la aplicación para admitir los casos en los que esta define una función de dibujo de barra de progreso personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7343">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7344">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7344">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7345">**progress bar**: puntero al bloque de control de barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7345">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7346">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7347">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7347">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7348">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7348">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7349">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7349">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7350">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7350">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7361">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7361">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7362">Establecer el valor actual de una barra de progreso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7362">Set current value of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7363">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7363">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    INT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7364">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7364">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7365">Este servicio asigna el valor actual de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7365">This service assigns the progress bar current value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7366">El widget de barra de progreso se invalidará y volverá a dibujar automáticamente cuando cambie el valor de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7366">The progress bar widget will automatically invalidate and redraw itself when the progress bar value is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7367">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7367">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7368">**progress_bar**: bloque de control de barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7368">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7369">**value**: valor actual de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7369">**value** Progress bar current value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7370">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7370">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7371">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del valor de la barra de progreso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7371">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set the value of the progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7374">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7374">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7376">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7376">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_value_set(progress_bar, 50);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar value was successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7387">gx_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7387">gx_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7388">Crear solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7388">Create prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7389">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7389">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_create(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7390">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7390">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7391">Este servicio crea un widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7391">This service creates a prompt widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7392">GX_PROMPT se deriva de GX_WIDGET y admite todos los servicios gx_widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7392">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7393">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7393">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7394">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7394">**Pointer** to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7395">**text_id**: id. de recurso del texto de la solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7395">**text_id** Resource ID of prompt text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7396">**style**: estilo de la solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7396">**style** Style of prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7397">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7397">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7398">**prompt_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7398">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7399">**size**: dimensiones de la solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7399">**size** Dimensions of prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7400">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7400">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7401">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7401">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7402">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7402">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7404">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7404">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7405">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7405">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7406">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7406">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7407">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7407">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7408">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7408">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_create(&my_prompt, “my_promPt”, &my_parent,
                    MY_PROMPT_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PROPMT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the prompt “my_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7420">gx_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7420">gx_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7421">Dibujar solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7421">Draw prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7422">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7422">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7423">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7423">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7424">Este servicio dibuja un widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7424">This service draws a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7425">GUIX llama a este servicio internamente durante la actualización del lienzo, pero también se puede llamar mediante funciones de dibujo personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7425">This service is called internally by GUIX during canvas refresh, but can also be called by custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7426">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7426">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7427">**prompt**: puntero al bloque de control de widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7427">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7428">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7428">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7429">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7429">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7430">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7431">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7431">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7432">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7432">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default prompt draw. */
    gx_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7444">gx_prompt_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7444">gx_prompt_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7445">Procesar evento de solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7445">Process prompt event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7446">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7446">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7447">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7448">Este servicio procesa un evento para la solicitud especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7448">This service processes an event for the specified prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7449">Cualquier función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de solicitud debe llamar a este servicio como controlador de eventos predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7449">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom prompt event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7450">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7451">**prompt**: puntero al bloque de control de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7451">**prompt** Pointer to prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7452">**event_ptr**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7452">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7453">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7453">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto de evento de solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7455">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7455">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7457">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7457">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7458">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7458">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7459">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7459">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7460">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7460">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic prompt event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default prompt event processing */
        status = gx_prompt_event_process(prompt, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7499">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7499">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7500">Establecer el color del texto de la solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7500">Set prompt text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7501">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7501">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_color_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7502">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7502">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7503">Este servicio establece el color del texto de un widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7503">This service sets the text color of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7504">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7504">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7505">**prompt**: puntero al bloque de control de widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7505">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7506">**normal_color**: id. de recurso del color para el texto normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7506">**normal_color** Resource ID of color for normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7507">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7507">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7508">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7508">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7509">**selected_color**: id. de recurso del color para el texto seleccionado que se usa cuando el widget obtiene el foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7509">**selected_color** Resource ID of color for selected text, used when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7510">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7510">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7511">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7511">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7512">**disabled_color**: id. de recurso del color para el texto deshabilitado que se usa cuando GX_STYLE_ENABLED no está activo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7512">**disabled_color** Resource ID of color for disabled text, used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7513">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7513">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7514">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7514">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7515">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7515">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del color del texto de la solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Tamaño de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Invalid widget size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7520">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7521">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7521">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7522">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text color of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_color_set(&my_prompt,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_BLACK,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_LIGHTGRAY,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color for prompt “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7534">gx_prompt_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7534">gx_prompt_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7535">Función de compatibilidad de dibujo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7535">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7536">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7536">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_text_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7537">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7537">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7538">Esta función de compatibilidad dibuja la parte de texto de una solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7538">This support function draws the text portion of a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7539">gx_prompt_draw() llama internamente a esta función, y se proporciona como una API independiente para comodidad de las aplicaciones que definen una función de dibujo de solicitud personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7539">This function is called internally by gx_prompt_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom prompt drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7540">Las aplicaciones que quieren personalizar el dibujo del fondo de la solicitud pueden proporcionar su función de dibujo personalizada e invocar el servicio gx_prompt_text_draw como parte de su dibujo personalizado para dibujar el texto de la solicitud sobre el fondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7540">Applications that want to customize the prompt background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_prompt_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the prompt text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7541">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7542">**prompt**: puntero al bloque de control de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7542">**prompt** Pointer to the prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7543">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7544">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7544">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7545">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7546">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7546">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7547">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* insert code here to draw prompt background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_prompt_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) prompt);
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7559">gx_prompt_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7559">gx_prompt_text_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7560">Obtener el texto de la solicitud (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7560">Get prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7561">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7561">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7562">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7563">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7563">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7564">Este servicio obtiene el texto de un widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7564">This service gets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7565">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7565">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7566">**prompt**: puntero al bloque de control de widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7566">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7567">**return_text**: puntero al destino del texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7567">**return_text** Pointer to destination for text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7568">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del texto de la solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7572">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7573">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7573">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7574">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7574">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROMPT my_prompt;
GX_CHAR *my_prompt_text;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_get(&my_prompt, &my_prompt_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pointer “my_prompt_text” points to the text displayed by “my_prompt”. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7593">**return_string**: puntero al destino de la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7593">**return_string** Pointer to destination for string</span></span>

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7612">gx_prompt_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7612">gx_prompt_text_id_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7614">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7614">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7615">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7615">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7616">Este servicio establece el id. de cadena para el widget de solicitud de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7616">This service sets the string ID for the text prompt widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7618">**prompt**: puntero al bloque de control de widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7618">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7619">**string_id**: id. de recurso de la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7619">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7620">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7620">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7622">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7622">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7623">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7623">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7624">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7624">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7625">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) No se ha definido la función de liberación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7625">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID of “my_prompt”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text ID for prompt “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7639">gx_prompt_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7639">gx_prompt_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7640">Establecer el texto de la solicitud (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7640">Set prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7641">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7641">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7642">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7642">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7643">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7643">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7644">Este servicio establece el texto de un widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7644">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7645">Si el widget de solicitud se creó con el estilo GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, el widget crea una copia privada de la cadena de texto asignada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7645">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7646">Si GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY no está activo, el widget no realiza una copia privada de la cadena de entrada y, por lo tanto, la cadena se debe asignar de forma estática o global, es decir, no puede ser una variable automática o temporal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7646">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7647">GX_PROMPT se deriva de GX_WIDGET y, por tanto, todos los servicios de API gx_widget se pueden usar con GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7647">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7648">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7648">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7649">**prompt**: puntero al bloque de control de widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7649">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7650">**text**: puntero al texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7650">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7651">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7651">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7652">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del texto de la solicitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7652">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7655">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) No se ha definido la función de asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7655">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7656">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7656">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7657">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7657">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7658">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7658">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “my_text”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, “my_text”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7674">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7674">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7675">Este servicio establece el texto de un widget de solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7675">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7676">Si el widget de solicitud se creó con el estilo GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, el widget crea una copia privada de la cadena de texto asignada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7676">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7677">Si GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY no está activo, el widget no realiza una copia privada de la cadena de entrada y, por lo tanto, la cadena se debe asignar de forma estática o global, es decir, no puede ser una variable automática o temporal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7677">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7678">GX_PROMPT se deriva de GX_WIDGET y, por tanto, todos los servicios de API gx_widget se pueden usar con GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7678">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>


```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7731">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7731">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7732">Este servicio dibuja un fondo de barra de progreso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7732">This service draws a radial progress bar background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7733">La función gx_radial_progress_bar_draw hace referencia internamente a este servicio, pero se expone para que lo use la aplicación en aquellos casos en los que la aplicación define una función personalizada de dibujo de barra de progreso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7733">This service is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7740">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar background draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7751">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7751">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7752">Crear una barra de progreso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7752">Create radial progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7753">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7753">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_create(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info,
    ULONG style
    USHORT id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7754">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7754">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7755">Este servicio crea una barra de progreso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7755">This service creates a radial progress bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7756">Si se aplica el estilo de widget GX_STYLE_ENABLED a la barra de progreso, esta aceptará la entrada de pen_down, pen_drag y pen_up para modificar el valor actual de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7756">If the widget style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is applied to the progress bar, the progress bar will accept pen_down, pen_drag, and pen_up input to modify the progress bar current value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7757">El estilo de widget GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW se puede usar para habilitar el dibujo del valor de la barra de progreso como texto dentro del área de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7757">The widget style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW can be used to enable drawing the progress bar value as text within the progress bar area.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7758">Si se usa este estilo en combinación con el estilo GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, el valor de la barra de progreso se muestra como un porcentaje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7758">If this style is used in combination with the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, the progress bar value is displayed as a percentage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7759">En caso contrario, el valor de la barra de progreso se muestra como el valor angular actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7759">Otherwise the progress bar value is displayed as the current angular value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7760">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7761">**progress bar**: puntero al control de barra de progreso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7761">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7762">**progress bar**: puntero al bloque de control de barra de progreso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7762">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7763">**name**: nombre de la barra de progreso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7763">**name** Name of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7764">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7765">**info**: puntero a una estructura GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7765">**info** Pointer to a GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7766">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7766">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7767">**style**: estilo de la barra de progreso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7767">**style** Style of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7768">**id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7768">**id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7769">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7770">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la barra de progreso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7770">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7771">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7771">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7772">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7772">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7773">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7773">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7775">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7775">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7777">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7777">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Create a radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar,
                    “my_progress_bar”, parent, &info,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT |
                    GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW,
                    ID_MY_RADIAL_PROGRESS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7791">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7791">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7818">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7818">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7826">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7827">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7827">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7828">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7828">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
        case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7880">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7880">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7881">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7881">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7882">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7882">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7929">Dibujar texto de barra de progreso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7929">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7930">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7930">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7931">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7932">Este servicio dibuja el texto de la barra de progreso radial especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7932">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7933">Esta función se llama internamente como parte de gx_radia_progress_bar_draw(), pero se expone a la aplicación para admitir los casos en los que esta define una función de dibujo de barra de progreso personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7933">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7934">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7935">**progress bar**: puntero al bloque de control de barra de progreso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7935">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7936">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7937">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7938">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7939">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7939">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7940">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```
