## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7952">Establecer valor de la barra de progreso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7952">Set radial progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7953">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7953">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7954">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7954">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7955">Este servicio establece el valor de la barra de progreso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7955">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7956">El valor asignado se limita al intervalo [-360, 360], que define el posible intervalo de valores angulares para la ubicación actual de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7956">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7957">La aplicación debe escalar el valor real que se indica para asignar un valor angular al widget de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7957">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7958">La barra de progreso se dibuja de tal manera que el valor actual indica la diferencia angular entre la posición del delimitador y el punto final del arco superior. Un valor negativo hace que el arco se dibuje en el sentido de las agujas del reloj a partir de la posición del delimitador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7958">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7959">Un valor positivo actual hace que el arco se dibuje en sentido contrario a las agujas del reloj a partir de la posición del delimitador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7959">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7960">Por ejemplo, para dibujar un arco que empiece en la parte superior del arco (posición de las 12 en punto) y finalice a la derecha (posición de las tres en punto), asigne un valor de delimitador de 90 grados y un valor actual de -90 grados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7960">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7961">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7961">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7962">**progress bar**: puntero al bloque de control de barra de progreso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7962">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7963">**value**: nuevo valor de la barra de progreso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7963">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7964">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7964">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7965">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del valor de la barra de progreso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7965">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Punteros no válidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7969">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7970">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7971">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7971">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE new_value = 180;

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(&my_progress_bar,
                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7983">Crear botón de radio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7983">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7984">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7984">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7985">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7985">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-7986">Este servicio crea un widget de botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7986">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON se deriva de GX_TEXT_BUTTON y, por tanto, este tipo de widget también admite todos los servicios gx_text_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7988">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7989">**button**: puntero a un bloque de control de botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7989">**button** Pointer to radio button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7990">**name**: nombre lógico del widget de botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7990">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7991">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7991">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7992">**text_id**: id. de recurso del botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7992">**text_id** Resource ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7993">**style**: estilo del botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7993">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7994">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7994">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7995">**radio_button_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7995">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7996">**size**: dimensiones del botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7996">**size** Dimensions of radio button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-7997">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7997">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del botón de radio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-7999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-7999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8002">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8002">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8003">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8003">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8004">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8004">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8023">Dibujar botón de radio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8023">Draw radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8024">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8025">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8026">Este servicio dibuja un widget de botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8026">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8027">La actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a este servicio internamente, pero también se puede llamar mediante funciones de dibujo anuladas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8027">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8028">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8028">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8029">**button**: puntero a un bloque de control de widget de botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8029">**button** Pointer to radio button widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8030">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8030">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8031">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8031">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8032">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8033">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8033">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8034">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8034">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8050">Establecer mapas de píxeles para el botón de radio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8050">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8051">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8051">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8052">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8052">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8053">Este servicio asigna los mapas de píxeles que se van a mostrar en la casilla especificada para cada estado del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8053">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8054">Los id. de recursos se pueden duplicar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8054">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8055">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8056">**off_id**: mapa de píxeles usado para el estado desactivado del botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8056">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8057">**on_id**: mapa de píxeles usado para el estado activado del botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8057">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8058">**off_disabled_id**: mapa de píxeles usado para el estado deshabilitado y desactivado del botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8058">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8059">**on_disabled_id**: mapa de píxeles usado para el estado deshabilitado y activado del botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8059">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8060">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8060">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de los mapas de píxeles del botón de radio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8065">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8065">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8066">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8066">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8067">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8067">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8082">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8082">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8083">Establecer lista de delimitadores de control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8083">Set radial slider anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8084">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8084">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE *anchor_angles, 
    USHORT anchor_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8085">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8085">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8086">Este servicio establece los ángulos delimitadores del control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8086">This service sets anchor angles for radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8087">Si se establece lista de ángulos delimitadores, el ángulo del control deslizante radial será uno de los ángulos delimitadores definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8087">If anchor angle list is set, the radial slider angle will be one of defined anchor angles.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8088">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8089">**slider**: bloque de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8089">**slider** Radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8090">**anchor_angles**: lista de ángulos que se van a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8090">**anchor_angles** Angle list to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8091">**anchor_count**: Recuento de los ángulos delimitadores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8091">**anchor_count** Count of the anchor angles</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8092">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8092">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de los ángulos delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful anchor angles set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8095">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8095">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8096">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Lista de delimitadores no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8096">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8097">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8097">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8098">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8098">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8099">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8099">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8110">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8110">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8111">Establecer ángulo de control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8111">Set radial slider angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8112">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_angle_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE new_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8113">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8114">Este servicio establece un nuevo valor de ángulo para el control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8114">This service sets new angle value for radial slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8115">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8115">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8116">**slider**: puntero al bloque de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8116">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8117">**new_angle**: nuevo valor de ángulo que se va a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8117">**new_angle** New angle value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8118">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8118">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del ángulo del control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider angle set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8123">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8124">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8125">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8125">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_radial_slider” angle to 0 degree(3 o’clock position). */
status = gx_radial_slider_angle_set(&my_radial_slider, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_radial_slider” has been set to 0 degree. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8136">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8136">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8137">Crear información de animación de control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8137">Create radial slider animation info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8138">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    USHORT steps, USHORT delay, 
    USHORT animation_style,
    VOID (*animation_update_callback)(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8139">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8140">Este servicio establece los pasos de animación, el tiempo de retraso y los estilos de animación para la animación de la aguja del control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8140">This service sets animation steps, delay time and animation styles for radial slider needle animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8141">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8141">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8142">**slider**: puntero al bloque de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8142">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8143">**steps**: número total de pasos para una animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8143">**steps** Total steps for one animation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8144">**delay**: tiempo de retraso para cada paso de animación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8144">**delay** Delay time for each animation step</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8145">**animation_style**: facilitación de tipos de función e incluye:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8145">**animation_style** Easing function type, includes:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8146">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8146">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8147">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8147">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8148">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8148">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8149">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8149">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8150">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8150">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8151">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8151">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8152">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8152">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8153">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8153">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8154">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8154">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8155">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8155">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8156">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8156">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8157">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8157">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8158">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8158">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8159">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8159">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8160">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8160">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8161">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8161">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8162">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8162">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8163">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8163">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8164">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8164">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8165">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8165">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8166">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8166">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8167">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8167">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8168">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8168">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8169">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8169">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8170">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8170">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8171">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8171">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8172">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8172">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8173">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8173">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8174">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8174">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8175">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8175">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8176">**animation_update_callback**: función de devolución de llamada definida por el usuario a la que se llamará después de cada paso de animación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8176">**animation_update_callback** User-defined callback function that will be called after each animation step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8177">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8177">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8178">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la animación del control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8178">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider animation set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8179">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8179">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8180">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8180">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8181">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8181">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8182">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8182">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8183">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8183">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8184">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8184">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8195">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8195">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8196">Establecer un nuevo valor de control deslizante radial con animación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8196">Set new radial slider value with animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8197">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8197">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_start(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE target_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8198">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8198">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8199">Este servicio inicia una animación para mover la aguja del control deslizante desde la posición actual hasta la posición especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8199">This service starts an animation to move the slider needle from current position to the specified position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8200">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8200">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8201">**slider**: puntero al bloque de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8201">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8202">**target_angle**: valor del ángulo de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8202">**target_angle** Target angle value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8203">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8203">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8221">gx_radial_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8221">gx_radial_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8222">Crear control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8222">Create radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8223">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_create(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT slider_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8224">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8225">Este servicio crea un widget de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8225">This service creates a radial slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8226">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8227">**slider**: puntero al bloque de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8227">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8228">**name**: nombre lógico del widget de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8228">**name** Logical name of radial slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8229">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8229">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8230">**info**: definición de la apariencia del control deslizante radial. El **apéndice I** contiene la definición de GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8230">**info** Radial slider appearance definition, **Appendix I** contains definition to GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8231">**style**: estilo del botón de radio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8231">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8232">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8232">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8233">**radio_button_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8233">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radial slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8234">**size**: dimensiones del control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8234">**size** Dimensions of radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8235">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8235">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8237">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8237">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8238">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8238">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8239">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8239">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8240">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8240">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8241">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8241">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8242">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8243">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8243">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8244">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8244">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8279">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8279">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8280">Procesar el evento de control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8280">Process radial slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8281">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8281">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8282">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8282">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8283">Este servicio procesa un evento de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8283">This service processes a radial slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8284">Cualquier función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de control deslizante radial debe llamar a este servicio como controlador de eventos predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8284">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom radial slider event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8285">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8285">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8287">**event_ptr**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8287">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8288">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto del evento de control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8292">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8292">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8293">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8293">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8294">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8294">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8295">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8295">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8308">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8308">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_info_get(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO **info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8309">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8309">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8310">Este servicio recupera el puntero de información del control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8310">This service retrieves radial slider information pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8311">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8311">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8312">**slider**: puntero al bloque de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8312">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8313">**info**: puntero de información del control deslizante radial recuperado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8313">**info** Retrieved radial slider information pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8314">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8314">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8315">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Información correcta del control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8315">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8316">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8316">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8317">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8317">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info;

/* Retrive radial slider information structure. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_get(&my_radial_slider,
                                    “my_radial_slider”, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider information pointer of “my_radial_slider” has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8331">gx_radial_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8331">gx_radial_slider_info_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8332">Establecer información de control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8332">Set radial slider info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8333">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8333">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_info_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8334">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8335">Este servicio establece información de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8335">This service sets radial slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8336">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8336">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8337">**slider**: puntero al bloque de control deslizante radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8337">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8338">**info**: información de control deslizante radial que se va a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8338">**info** Radial slider information to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8339">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8339">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8340">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la información del control deslizante radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8340">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8341">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8341">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8342">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8342">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8344">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8344">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8345">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8345">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8346">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8346">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8387">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8389">**Las etiquetas de formato se usan para mostrar tipos especiales de texto:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8389">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8424">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8424">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8431">Dibujar vista de texto enriquecido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8431">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8432">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8432">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8433">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8433">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8434">Este servicio dibuja el widget de vista de texto enriquecido especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8434">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8435">Normalmente, GUIX llama a este servicio internamente como parte de una operación de actualización del lienzo, pero también se expone a la aplicación que podría querer proporcionar una función de dibujo personalizada e invocar el dibujo del icono predeterminado como base de dibujo personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8435">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8436">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8436">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8437">**text_view**: puntero al bloque de control del widget de la vista de texto enriquecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8437">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8438">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8438">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8439">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8439">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8440">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8441">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8441">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8442">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8447">gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8447">gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8448">Establecer fuentes de vista de texto enriquecido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8448">Set rich text view fonts</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8449">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8449">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8450">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8451">Este servicio establece las fuentes de un widget de vista de texto enriquecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8451">This service sets the fonts of a rich text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8452">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8452">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8453">**text_view**: puntero al bloque de control del widget de la vista de texto enriquecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8453">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8454">**fonts**: puntero a la información de fuente de la vista de texto enriquecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8454">**fonts** Pointer to rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8455">El **apéndice I** contiene definiciones de la estructura GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8455">**Apendix I** contains definitions to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8456">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8456">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de las fuentes de la vista de texto enriquecido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view fonts set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8458">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8458">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8461">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8461">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8462">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8462">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8463">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8463">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;

/* Replace the font ids as needed. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Set the font of “my_rich_view”. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(&my_rich_view, &fonts);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font for rich text view “my_rich_view” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8468">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8468">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8469">Dibujar texto de vista de texto enriquecido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8469">Draw rich text view text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8470">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8470">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_text_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8471">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8472">Esta función de compatibilidad dibuja la parte de texto de una vista de texto enriquecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8472">This support function draws the text portion of a rich text view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8473">gx_rich_text_view_draw() llama internamente a esta función, y se proporciona como una API independiente para comodidad de las aplicaciones que definen una función de dibujo de vista de texto enriquecido personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8473">This function is called internally by gx_rich_text_view_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom rich text view drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8474">Las aplicaciones que quieren personalizar el dibujo del fondo de la vista de texto enriquecido pueden proporcionar su función de dibujo personalizada e invocar el servicio gx_rich_text_view_draw como parte de su dibujo personalizado para dibujar el texto de la vista de texto enriquecido sobre el fondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8474">Applications that want to customize the rich text view background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_rich_text_view_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the rich text view text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8475">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8475">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8476">**text_view**: puntero al bloque de control del widget de la vista de texto enriquecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8476">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8477">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8478">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8478">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8479">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8479">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8480">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8480">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8481">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8481">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw rich text view background. */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing. */
    gx_rich_text_view_text_draw();

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) rich_text_view);
}
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8486">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8486">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8487">Inicializar una pila de pantallas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8487">Initialize a screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8488">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8488">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_create(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET **memory_buffer, 
    INT buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8489">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8490">Este servicio Inicializa una pila de pantallas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8490">This service initializes a screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8491">La aplicación debe definir el bloque de memoria y el tamaño de búfer que se usan para implementar la característica de pila de pantallas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8491">The application must define the memory block and buffer size used to implement the screen stack feature.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8492">*Esta API está obsoleta y se reemplaza por gx_system_screen_stack_create(). Esta versión se proporciona solo para la compatibilidad con versiones anteriores de la biblioteca.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8492">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_create(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8493">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8494">**control**: bloque de control de pila de pantallas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8494">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8495">**memory_buffer**: puntero a un búfer de memoria que se usa como pila de pantallas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8495">**memory_buffer** Pointer to a memory buffer that used as a screen stack</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8496">**buffer_size** Tamaño de memoria en bytes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8496">**buffer_size** Memory size in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8497">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la pila de pantallas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8500">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Tamaño de búfer no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8500">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8501">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8501">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8502">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8502">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8503">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8503">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_SIZE 10

GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL my_stack_control;
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_SIZE];

/* Initialize “my_stack_control”. */
status = gx_screen_stack_create(&my_stack_control, screen_stack,
                        SCREEN_STACK_SIZE * sizeof(GX_WIDGET *));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen control block “my_stack control” has been initialized. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8504">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8504">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8505">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8505">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8508">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8508">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8509">Quitar la entrada superior de la pila de pantallas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8509">Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8510">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8510">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_pop(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8511">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8511">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8512">Este servicio quita la entrada superior de la pila de pantallas y asocia la pantalla sacada a su elemento primario anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8512">This service removes the topmost entry from the screen stack, and attaches the popped screen to its previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8513">Esta API también desasocia cualquier elemento secundario existente del elemento primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8513">This API also detaches any existing children from the parent.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8514">*Esta API está obsoleta y se ha reemplazado por gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). Esta versión se proporciona solo para la compatibilidad con versiones anteriores de la biblioteca.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8514">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8515">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8516">**control**: bloque de control de pila de pantallas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8516">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8517">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Aparición correcta de la pila de pantallas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8521">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8521">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8522">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8522">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8523">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8523">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_pop(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the topmost entry has been removed from the screen stack, 
    and the popped screen has been attached to its parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8524">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8524">See Also</span></span>
