- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8527">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8527">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8528">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8528">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8529">Insertar pantalla y sus elementos primarios en la pila</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8529">Push screen and its parents to stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8530">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_push(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET *screen,
    GX_WIDGET *new_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8531">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8532">Este servicio desasocia la pantalla de su elemento primario e inserta el puntero de pantalla y el puntero primario en la pila de pantallas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8532">This service detaches screen from its parent, and pushes the screen pointer and the parent pointer onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8533">El nuevo puntero de pantalla se asocia al elemento primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8533">The new screen pointer is then attached to the parent.</span></span>


> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8534">*Esta API está obsoleta y se ha reemplazado por gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). Esta versión se proporciona solo para la compatibilidad con versiones anteriores de la biblioteca.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8534">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8535">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8536">**control**: bloque de control de pila de pantallas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8536">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8537">**screen**: puntero de pantalla que se va a insertar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8537">**screen** Screen pointer to push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8538">**new_screen**: puntero de la nueva pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8538">**new_screen** Pointer of the new screen</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8539">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8540">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Inserción correcta de la pila de pantallas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8540">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8543">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8543">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8544">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8544">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8545">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8545">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Push “screen” and its parent to screen stack, Dettach “screen” from its parent, and attach “new screen” to the parent. */
status = gx_screen_stack_push(&my_stack_control,
                                screen, new_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “screen” and its parent have been pushed to screen stack, “screen” has been detached from its parent, “new_screen” has been attached to the parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8546">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8546">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8548">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8548">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8550">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8550">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8551">Quitar todas las entradas de la pila de pantallas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8551">Removes all entries from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8552">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8552">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8553">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8554">Este servicio quita todas las entradas de la pila de pantallas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8554">This service removes all entries from the screen stack.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8555">*Esta API está obsoleta y se ha reemplazado por gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). Esta versión se proporciona solo para la compatibilidad con versiones anteriores de la biblioteca.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8555">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8556">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8556">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8557">**control**: bloque de control de pila de pantallas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8557">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8558">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8558">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del desplazamiento para pulgar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8561">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8561">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8562">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8562">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8563">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8563">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove all enteries from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_reset(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all entries of screen stack has been removed. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8568">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8568">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8569">Crear desplazamiento para pulgar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8569">Create scroll thumb</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8570">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8570">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_create(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_SCROLLBAR *parent, ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8571">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8571">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8572">Este servicio crea una rueda del mouse para pulgar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8572">This service creates a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8573">Normalmente, se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se crea un elemento GX_SCROLLBAR, pero se hace público con el fin de permitir implementaciones de barra de desplazamiento personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8573">This service is normally called internally when a GX_SCROLLBAR is created, but is made public in order to allow custom scrollbar implementations.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8574">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8574">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8575">**scroll_thumb**: bloque de control de widget de desplazamiento para pulgar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8575">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8576">**parent**: puntero a la barra de desplazamiento primaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8576">**parent** Pointer to parent scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8577">**style**: estilo del widget de barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8577">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8578">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8578">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8579">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8579">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8581">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8581">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8592">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8592">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8593">Dibujar desplazamiento para pulgar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8593">Draw scroll thumb</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8594">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_scroll_thumb_draw(GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8595">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8596">Este servicio dibuja una rueda del mouse para pulgar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8596">This service draws a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8597">La actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a este servicio internamente, pero también se puede llamar mediante funciones de dibujo anuladas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8597">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8598">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8598">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8599">**scroll_thumb**: bloque de control de widget de desplazamiento para pulgar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8599">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8600">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8600">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8601">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8601">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8602">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8602">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8603">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8603">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8604">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8604">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scroll thumb drawing function. */

VOID my_scroll_thumb_draw(GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb)
{
    /* Call default scroll thumb draw. */
    gx_scroll_thumb_draw(thumb);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8608">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8608">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8609">Procesar evento de desplazamiento para pulgar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8609">Process scroll thumb event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8610">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8610">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8611">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8611">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8612">Este servicio controla los eventos enviados a una rueda del mouse para pulgar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8612">This service handles events sent to a scrollbar thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8613">Normalmente, GUIX usa este servicio internamente, pero se hace público para ayudar a implementar comportamientos personalizados de barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8613">This service is normally used internally by GUIX, but is made public to assist with implementing custom scrollbar behaviors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8614">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8615">**scroll_thumb**: bloque de control de widget de desplazamiento para pulgar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8615">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8616">**event**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8616">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8617">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto del desplazamiento para pulgar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8622">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8622">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8623">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8624">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8628">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8628">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8629">Crear un widget de rueda del mouse base</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8629">Create a base scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8630">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8630">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_create( 
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8631">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8631">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8632">Este servicio crea un widget de rueda del mouse genérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8632">This service creates a generic scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8633">Una rueda del mouse genérica es el widget base para todos los tipos de widget de rueda del mouse, entre los que se incluye *gx_text_scroll_wheel\*\*\*, que es la base para los widgets *gx_numeric_scroll_wheel**\* y \*gx_string_scroll_wheel\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8633">A generic scroll wheel is the base widget for all scroll wheel widget types, including the *gx_text_scroll_wheel*\*\* which is the base for *gx_numeric_scroll_wheel*\*\* and *gx_string_ scroll_wheel*\*\* widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8634">El widget de rueda del mouse base proporciona el control de eventos, la animación del desplazamiento y el cálculo de la fila seleccionada para todos los tipos de widget de rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8634">The base scroll wheel widget provides event handling, scrolling animation, and selected row calculation for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8635">Normalmente, las aplicaciones no crean una instancia de un widget de rueda del mouse genérica, ya que este tipo de widget no proporciona ninguna función de dibujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8635">Applications would not normally create an instance of a generic scroll wheel widget, since this widget type provides no drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8636">Sin embargo, se proporciona acceso a esta API como ayuda para las aplicaciones que necesitan crear un tipo de widget de rueda del mouse personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8636">However access to this API is provided to assist applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8637">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL se basa en GX_WINDOW y, por tanto, todas las API de GX_WINDOW se pueden usar con GX_SCROLL_WHEEL y widgets derivados de GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8637">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL is based on GX_WINDOW, and therefore all GX_WINDOW APIs may be used with GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and widgets derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8638">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8638">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8639">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse genérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8639">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8640">**nombre**: nombre de widget asignado por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8640">**name** Application assigned widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8641">**parent**: widget primario o GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8641">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8642">**total_rows**: total de filas disponibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8642">**total_rows** Total available rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8643">**style**: marcas de estilo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8643">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8644">**id**: id. de widget asignado por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8644">**id** Application assigned widget ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8645">**size**: rectángulo que define el tamaño inicial del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8645">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8646">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8646">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8647">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la rueda del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8647">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8648">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8648">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8649">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8649">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8650">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8650">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8651">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8651">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8652">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8652">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8653">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8653">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8654">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8654">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8655">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8655">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic create function during custom widget createl. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_create(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
                    GX_WIDGET *parent,
                    INT total_rows, ULONG style,
                    USHORT id,
                    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* create base widget as part of custom create */
    status = gx_scroll_wheel_create(wheel, name, parent,
                            total_rows, style, id, size);

    /* If status is GX_SUCCESS the base scroll wheel has been created. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8675">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8675">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8676">Función de procesamiento de eventos para el widget de rueda del mouse genérica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8676">Event processing function for generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8677">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8677">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8678">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8678">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8679">Este servicio proporciona el control básico de eventos de entrada para todos los tipos de widget de rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8679">This service provides the basic input event handling for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8680">Esta función se expone al software de la aplicación como ayuda para las aplicaciones que necesitan crear un tipo de widget de rueda del mouse personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8680">This function is exposed to the application software to assist with applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8681">Las aplicaciones suelen proporcionar su propia función de procesamiento de eventos, pero invocan el procesamiento de eventos genéricos para widgets de rueda para eventos que no necesitan personalizar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8681">Applications would often provide their own event processing function, but invoke the generic event processing for wheel widgets for events that they do not need to customize.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8682">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8682">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8683">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse genérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8683">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8684">**event**: puntero a GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8684">**event** GX_EVENT pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8685">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8685">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto del evento de rueda del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8688">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8688">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8689">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8689">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8690">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8690">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8691">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8691">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8692">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8692">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic scroll wheel event processing 
    as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_event_process(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
        gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8712">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8712">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8713">Asignar valores alfa de degradado para un degradado de superposición opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8713">Assign gradient alpha values for optional overlay gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8714">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8714">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha,
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8715">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8715">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8716">Este servicio define los valores alfa inicial y final para una superposición de degradado opcional del widget de rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8716">This service defines the starting and ending alpha values for an optional gradient overlay of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8717">Todos los widgets de rueda del mouse admiten un efecto de "atenuación" de las filas de la rueda del mouse cuando las filas se acercan al borde superior e inferior del widget de rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8717">All scroll wheel widgets support a “fade” effect of the scroll wheel rows as the rows near the top and bottom edge of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8718">Este efecto de atenuación se consigue dibujando un mapa de píxeles de degradado sobre las filas de la rueda del mouse, lo que hace que parezca que las filas se desvanecen a medida que se dibujan cerca de la parte superior e inferior del widget de rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8718">This fade effect is accomplished by drawing a gradient pixelmap over the scroll wheel rows, which make the rows appear to fade out as the rows are drawn near the top and bottom of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8719">Este servicio de API permite a la aplicación modificar la intensidad del efecto de atenuación o deshabilitar este efecto por completo si se establecen los valores alfa inicial y final en 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8719">This API service allows the application to modify the fading effect intensity, or disable this effect entirely by setting the start and end alpha values to 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8720">El mapa de píxeles de degradado se crea en tiempo de ejecución cuando la rueda del mouse se vuelve visible inicialmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8720">The gradient pixelmap is created at runtime when the scroll wheel initially becomes visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8721">Esto requiere que se haya definido un servicio de asignación de memoria en tiempo de ejecución mediante _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8721">This requires that a runtime memory allocation service has been defined using _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8722">Si no se ha definido ninguna función de asignación de memoria, no se creará la imagen de degradado y no estará disponible ningún efecto de atenuación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8722">If no memory allocator function has been defined, the gradient image will not be created and no fade effect will be available.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8723">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8723">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8724">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse genérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8724">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8725">**start_alpha**: valor alfa de inicio del degradado superpuesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8725">**start_alpha** The overlay gradient starting alpha value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8726">**end_alpha**: valor alfa del final del degradado superpuesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8726">**end_alpha** The overlay gradient ending alpha value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8727">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8727">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8728">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del valor alfa del degradado de la rueda del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8728">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the scroll wheel gradient alpha</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8729">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8729">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8730">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8730">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8731">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8731">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8732">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8733">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8734">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8734">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(&wheel, 240, 0);
/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel gradient alpha values were
Successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8754">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8754">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8755">Asignar el alto de cada fila de la rueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8755">Assign the row height for each wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8756">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_VALUE row_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8757">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8758">Este servicio asigna el alto de fila para cada fila de la rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8758">This service assigns the row height for each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8759">Tenga en cuenta que si la rueda del mouse tiene el estilo GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, el alto de la fila pasa a través de una transformación, lo que reduce efectivamente el alto de fila a medida que esta se acerca al borde superior o inferior de la rueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8759">Note that if the scroll wheel has style GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, the row height passes through a transform which effectively reduces the row height as the row nears the top or bottom edge of the wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8760">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8761">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse genérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8761">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8762">**row_height**: valor del alto de la fila, en píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8762">**row_height** Row height value, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8763">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8763">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del alto de la rueda del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8767">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8767">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8768">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8768">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8769">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8769">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8770">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8770">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(&wheel, 40);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel row height has been set to 40
pixels. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8790">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8790">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8791">Asignar imagen de fondo a la fila seleccionada de la rueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8791">Assign background image for wheel selected row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8792">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8792">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL*wheel, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID image_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8793">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8794">Este servicio asigna un id. de mapa de píxeles opcional que se dibuja detrás de la fila seleccionada de la rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8794">This service assigns an optional pixelmap ID that is drawn behind the selected row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8795">Se puede usar para resaltar la fila seleccionada de forma que el usuario pueda distinguir fácilmente qué fila de la rueda del mouse está seleccionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8795">This can be used to highlight the selected row so that the user can easily distinguish which row of the scroll wheel is selected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8796">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8796">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8797">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse genérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8797">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8798">**image_id**: id. de mapa de píxeles que se va a usar como imagen de fondo de la fila seleccionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8798">**image_id** Pixelmap ID to use as the selected row background image.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8799">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8799">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8800">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del fondo de la rueda del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8800">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel background</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8803">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8803">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8804">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8804">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8805">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8805">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8806">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8806">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(&wheel,
GX_PIXELMAP_ID_SELECTED_ROW);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the background image has been
assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8826">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8826">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8827">Recuperar la fila de la rueda seleccionada actualmente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8827">Retrieve the currently selected wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8828">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8828">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT *row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8829">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8830">Este servicio consultará la rueda del mouse para recuperar la fila seleccionada actualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8830">This service will query the scroll wheel to retrieve the currently selected row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8831">El autor de la llamada debe pasar la ubicación para devolver el índice de fila seleccionada como segundo parámetro para esta función.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8831">The caller must pass the location to return the selected row index as the second parameter to this function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8832">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8832">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8833">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse genérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8833">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8834">**row**: ubicación en la que se devolverá el valor de la fila seleccionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8834">**row** Location in which selected row value will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8835">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la fila seleccionada de la rueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8840">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8841">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8842">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8842">Example</span></span>

```C
INT row;
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(&wheel, &row);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the selected row has been returned in
the row variable. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8897">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8897">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8898">Asignar velocidad de desplazamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8898">Assign scrolling speed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8899">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8899">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_FIXED_VAL start_speed_rate,
    GX_FIXED_VAL end_speed_rate,
    GX_VALUE max_steps,
    GX_VALUE delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8900">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8900">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8901">Este servicio asigna la velocidad de desplazamiento del widget de rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8901">This service assigns the scrolling speed for the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8902">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8903">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse genérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8903">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8904">**start_speed_rate**: la velocidad del inicio del desplazamiento para la velocidad de gestos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8904">**start_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling start speed to flick speed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8905">**start_speed_rate**: la velocidad del fin del desplazamiento para la velocidad de gestos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8905">**end_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling end speed to flick speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8906">**max_steps**: pasos máximos para el desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8906">**max_steps** Max steps for scrolling.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8907">**delay**: tiempo de retraso de cada paso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8907">**delay** Delay time of each step.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8908">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8908">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la velocidad de la rueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set wheel speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8911">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8911">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8912">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8912">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8913">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8913">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8914">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8914">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8915">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8915">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8916">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8916">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(&wheel, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(2),
                                GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2, 10, 2);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel speed has been
successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8936">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8936">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8937">Asignar el total de las filas disponibles de la rueda del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8937">Assign the total scroll wheel rows available</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8938">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8938">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8939">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8939">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8940">Este servicio asigna el número de filas disponibles en la rueda del mouse indicada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8940">This service assigns the number of rows available in the indicated scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8941">El widget de rueda del mouse normalmente recibe el contenido de la fila de la aplicación en forma de matriz de cadenas o datos de cadena proporcionados por el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8941">The scroll wheel widget usually receives the row content from the application in the form of an array of strings or user supplied string data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8942">Esta API informa a la rueda del mouse del número total de filas que se deben presentar al usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8942">This API informs the scroll wheel of the total number of rows that should be presented to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8943">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8944">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse genérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8944">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8945">**total_rows**: número total de filas de la rueda que se van a presentar al usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8945">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8946">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del total de filas de la rueda del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8948">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8948">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8950">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8950">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8951">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8951">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8952">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8952">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been changed to
display 100 total rows */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8976">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8976">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8994">Procesar evento de barra de desplazamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8994">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8995">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_event_process(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8996">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-8997">Este servicio procesa un evento de barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8997">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-8998">Se utiliza una función de control de eventos común para los widgets de barra de desplazamiento vertical y horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8998">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-8999">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-8999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9000">**scrollbar**: bloque de control del widget de barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9000">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9001">**event**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9001">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9002">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9002">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto del evento de barra de desplazamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9006">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9006">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9007">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9007">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9008">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9008">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9009">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9009">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_limit_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9016">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9016">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9020">Este servicio comprueba el límite de la barra de desplazamiento e impide que la rueda del mouse para pulgar de la barra de desplazamiento vaya más allá de los límites predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9020">This service checks the limit of the scrollbar and prevents the scrollbar thumbwheel from traveling beyond the predefined limits.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9037">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9037">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9038">Restablecer barra de desplazamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9038">Reset scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9039">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9039">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9040">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9040">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9041">Este servicio restablece la barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9041">This service resets the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9042">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9042">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9043">**scrollbar**: bloque de control del widget de barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9043">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9044">**info**: puntero a la estructura GX_SCROLL_INFO que define los límites de la barra de desplazamiento, el valor actual y el paso o incremento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9044">**info** Pointer to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure that defines the scrollbar limits, current value, and step or increment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9045">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_SCROLL_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9045">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9046">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9046">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9047">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Restablecimiento correcto de la barra de desplazamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9047">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9048">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9048">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9050">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9050">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9051">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Información de desplazamiento no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9051">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9052">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9052">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9053">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9053">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9054">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9054">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9085">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9085">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_backspace(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9089">Este servicio elimina el carácter delante de la posición del cursor de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9089">This service deletes the character before text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9090">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla de retroceso, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9090">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9158">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9158">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9159">Recuperar información de búfer del widget de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9159">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9160">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9160">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address, 
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9161">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9161">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9162">Este servicio recupera información del búfer de un widget de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9162">This service retrieves buffer information of the text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9163">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9163">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9164">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9164">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9165">**buffer_address**: la dirección del búfer de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9165">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9166">**content_size**: el recuento de bytes de los datos de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9166">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9167">**buffer_size**: el tamaño del búfer de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9167">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9168">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9168">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9169">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información del búfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9169">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved buffer information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9170">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9170">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9171">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9171">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9172">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9172">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9173">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9173">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9174">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9174">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9175">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9175">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT buffer_size;
UINT content_size;

/* Retrieve buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
                    &buffer_address, &string_size, &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9196">gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9196">gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9197">Eliminar el carácter situado en la posición actual del cursor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9197">Delete the character at the current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9198">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9198">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9199">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9200">Este servicio elimina el carácter de después de la posición del cursor de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9200">This service deletes the character after the text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9201">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla de supresión, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9201">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9202">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9203">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9203">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9204">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9204">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Eliminación correcta de un carácter después del cursor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9206">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9206">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9207">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9207">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9208">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9208">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9209">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9209">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9210">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9210">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9211">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9211">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete the character after the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character after the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9234">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9234">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9235">Insertar una cadena de caracteres en la posición actual del cursor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9235">Insert a character string at current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9236">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9236">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9237">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9237">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9238">Este servicio inserta una cadena de caracteres en el búfer de cadenas de entrada de texto en la posición actual del cursor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9238">This service inserts a character string into the text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9239">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9239">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9240">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9240">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9241">**insert_str**: cadena de caracteres que se va a insertar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9241">**insert_str** Character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9242">**insert_size**: recuento de bytes que se van a insertar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9242">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9243">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Inserción correcta del carácter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9248">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9248">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9249">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9249">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9250">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9250">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */

GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(&my_text_input,
                                            insert_text,
                                            GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9274">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9274">Prototype</span></span>
