
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9275">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9275">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9276">Este servicio crea un widget de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9276">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9277">El autor de la llamada debe proporcionar el almacenamiento para la cadena de entrada e indicar la longitud máxima de la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9277">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT se deriva de GX_PROMPT y, por tanto, todos los servicios gx_prompt se pueden usar con los widgets GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9279">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9279">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9280">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9280">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9281">**name**: nombre lógico de widget opcional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9281">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9282">**parent**: widget primario opcional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9282">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9283">**input_buffer**: almacenamiento de la cadena de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9283">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9284">**buffer_size**: tamaño del área de almacenamiento de cadenas de entrada, en bytes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9284">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9285">**style**: marcas de estilo de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9285">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9286">**text_input_id**: id. opcional del widget de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9286">**text_input_id** Optional ID of the input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9287">**size**: rectángulo que define el tamaño del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9287">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9288">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la entrada de texto de una sola línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9292">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9292">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9295">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9295">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9296">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9296">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9297">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9297">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9320">Dibujar un widget de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9320">Draw a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9321">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_single_line_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9322">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9323">Este servicio dibuja un widget de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9323">This service draws a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9324">Normalmente, se llama a este servicio internamente durante la actualización del lienzo, pero también se puede llamar desde funciones de dibujo de entrada de texto personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9324">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text input drawing functions.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9326">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9326">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9327">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9327">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9331">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9331">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
    /* Call default single line text input draw. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw(input);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9353">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9353">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9354">Recuperar la posición inicial de dibujo de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9354">Retrieve text draw start position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9355">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9355">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_VALUE *xpos, GX_VALUE *ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9356">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9357">Este servicio recupera la posición de inicio de dibujo del texto de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9357">This service retrieves the draw start position of text input text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9358">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9358">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9359">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9359">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9360">**xpos**: Se ha recuperado la posición inicial de dibujo en la coordenada X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9360">**xpos** Retrieved draw start position in x coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9361">**ypos**: Se ha recuperado la posición inicial de dibujo en la coordenada Y.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9361">**ypos** Retrieved draw start position in y coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9362">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9362">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9363">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del cursor de entrada de texto al final</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9363">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9364">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9364">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9366">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9366">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9367">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9367">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9368">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9368">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9389">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9389">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9390">Mover el cursor de entrada de texto al final de la cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9390">Move the text input cursor to the string end</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9391">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9391">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_end(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9392">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9392">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9393">Este servicio coloca el cursor del widget de entrada de texto al final de la cadena de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9393">This service positions the text input widget cursor at the end of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9394">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla de fin, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9394">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9395">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9395">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9396">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9396">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9397">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9397">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9398">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del cursor de entrada de texto al final</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9398">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9399">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9399">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9400">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9400">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9401">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9401">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9402">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9402">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9403">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9403">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9404">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9404">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to end. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to end. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9426">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9426">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9427">Función de procesamiento de eventos de widget entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9427">Text input widget event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9428">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9428">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9429">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9429">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9430">Este servicio procesa un evento de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9430">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9431">La función gx_single_line_text_input_create hace referencia internamente a esta función, pero se expone para que lo use la aplicación en aquellos casos en los que la aplicación define una función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9431">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9432">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9433">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9433">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9434">**event_ptr**: puntero a estructura GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9434">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9435">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto de evento de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed text input event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9440">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9441">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9442">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9465">Establecer el color de fondo de la entrada de texto de una sola línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9465">Set single line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9466">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9466">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9467">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9467">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9468">Este servicio establece el color de relleno de la entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9468">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9469">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9469">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9470">**text_input**: puntero al bloque de control de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9470">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9471">**normal_fill_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno del widget en estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9472">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9472">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9473">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9473">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9474">**selected_fill_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno del widget cuando este obtiene el foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9475">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9475">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9476">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9476">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno del widget cuando no se establece el estilo GX_STYLE_ENABLED.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9478">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9478">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9479">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9479">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno del widget cuando se establecen ambos estilos, GX_STYLE_ENABLED y GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9481">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9481">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9482">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9482">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9485">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9485">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9486">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9486">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9487">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9487">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9490">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9490">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9512">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9512">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9513">Mover el cursor de entrada de texto a la posición de inicio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9513">Move the text input cursor to the home position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9514">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9514">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_home(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9515">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9515">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9516">Este servicio mueve la posición del cursor de entrada de texto al inicio de la cadena de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9516">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9517">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla de inicio, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9517">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9518">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9519">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9519">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9520">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9522">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9522">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9524">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9524">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9525">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9525">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the input text. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the home position */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9587">Mover el cursor a la posición del píxel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9587">Move cursor to pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9588">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9588">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    INT pixel_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9589">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9590">Este servicio coloca el cursor de entrada de texto en la posición del píxel solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9590">This service positions the text input cursor based on the requested pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9591">El índice del cursor de entrada de texto se calculará en función del valor X de la posición del píxel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9591">The text input cursor index will be calculated based on the x value of the pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9592">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de bajar el lápiz, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9592">This service is called internally when a pen down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9593">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9594">**text_input**: bloque de control de widget de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9594">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9595">**pixel_position**: valor X de la posición del píxel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9595">**pixel_position** X value of pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9596">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9596">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del cursor en la posición solicitada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the cursor to requested position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9601">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9601">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9602">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9602">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9603">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9603">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set cursor to requested position. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(&my_text_input,
                                                100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget cursor has been positioned */
```

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9628">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9629">Este servicio mueve el cursor de entrada de texto un carácter hacia la derecha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9629">This service moves the text input cursor one character to the right.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9630">Se llama a este servicio internamente cuando se recibe un evento de presionar la tecla a la derecha, pero la aplicación también lo puede invocar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9630">This service is called internally when a right key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9636">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9636">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9638">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9638">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9737">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9737">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9770">Establecer el color de texto de la entrada de texto de una sola línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9770">Set single line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9771">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9772">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9773">Este servicio establece el color de texto de la entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9773">This service sets the text color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9774">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9774">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9775">**text_input**: puntero al bloque de control de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9775">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9776">**normal_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color del texto en estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9776">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9777">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9777">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9778">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9778">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9779">**selected_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color del texto cuando el widget obtiene el foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9779">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9780">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9780">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9781">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9781">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9782">**disabled_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color del texto cuando no se establece el estilo GX_STYLE_ENABLED.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9783">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9783">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9784">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9784">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9785">**readonly_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color del texto cuando se establecen ambos estilos, GX_STYLE_ENABLED y GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9786">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9786">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9787">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9787">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9788">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9788">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del color de texto de la entrada de texto de una sola línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9792">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9792">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9793">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9794">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9795">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9795">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color “my_text_input” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9818">Seleccionar texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9818">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9819">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9819">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9820">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9820">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9821">Este servicio selecciona texto con el índice de marca de inicio y de marca final especificado y resalta el texto seleccionado con los colores de texto y relleno seleccionados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9821">This service selects text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9822">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9822">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9823">**text_input**: puntero al bloque de control de entrada de texto de una sola línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9823">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9824">**start_index**: índice del primer carácter seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9824">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9825">**end_index**: índice del último carácter seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9825">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9826">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9826">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Selección correcta de texto de la entrada de texto de una sola línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9830">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9830">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9831">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor de índice no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9831">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9832">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9832">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9833">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9833">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9834">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9834">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
                                                0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9855">gx_single_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9855">gx_single_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9856">Establecer el texto de la entrada de texto de una sola línea (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9856">Set single line text input text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9857">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9857">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,

```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9859">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_single_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9859">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_single_line_text_input_text_set_ext()</span></span>

## <a name="gx_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9912">gx_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9912">gx_slider_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9913">Crear control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9913">Create slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9914">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9914">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_create(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, INT tick_count,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    ULONG style, USHORT slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9915">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9915">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9916">Este servicio crea un widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9916">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9917">GX_SLIDER se deriva de GX_WIDGET y, por tanto, todos los servicios de API gx_widget se pueden usar con widgets de tipo GX_SLIDER.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9917">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9918">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9918">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9919">**slider**: bloque de control de widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9919">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9920">**name**: nombre del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9920">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9921">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9921">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9922">**tick_count**: número de tics del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9922">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9923">**slider_info**: puntero a la información de control deslizante, que es una estructura que se usa para pasar los límites de los valores del control deslizante, el tamaño y la posición de la aguja del control deslizante y otros parámetros del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9923">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9924">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9924">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9925">**style**: estilo del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9925">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9926">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9926">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9927">**slider_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9927">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9928">**size**: dimensiones del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9928">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9929">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9929">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9930">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9936">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9936">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9937">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9937">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9938">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9938">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9953">gx_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9953">gx_slider_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9954">Dibujar control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9954">Draw slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9955">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9955">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9956">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9956">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9957">Este servicio dibuja un control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9957">This service draws a slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9958">La función gx_slider_create utiliza internamente este servicio, pero también se expone para que la aplicación lo use en las instancias en las que se define una función de dibujo personalizado del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9958">This service is used internally by the gx_slider_create function, but is also exposed for use by the application in those instances when a custom slider drawing function is defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9959">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9959">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9960">**slider**: bloque de control de widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9960">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9961">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9962">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9962">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9963">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9963">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9964">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9964">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9965">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9965">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Call default slider draw. */
    gx_slider_draw(slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9981">Procesar evento de control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9981">Process slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9982">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9982">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_event_process(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9983">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9983">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9984">Este servicio procesa un evento de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9984">This service processes a slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9985">La función gx_slider_create hace referencia internamente a esta función, pero se expone para que lo use la aplicación en aquellos casos en los que la aplicación define una función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9985">This function is internally referenced by the gx_slider_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom slider event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9986">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9986">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9987">**slider**: bloque de control de widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9987">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9988">**event**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9988">**event**: Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9989">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9989">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9990">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto del evento de control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9994">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9994">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-9995">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9995">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-9996">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-9996">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic slider event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_slider_event_process(GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default slider event processing */
            status = gx_slider_event_process(slider, event);
            break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10012">Establecer bloque de información de control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10012">Set slider information block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10013">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10013">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_info_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10014">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10015">Este servicio asigna la información de control deslizante especificada, como los valores mínimo, máximo y actual para el control deslizante indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10015">This service assigns the specified slider information such as slider minimum, slider maximum, and slider current value to the indicated slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10016">El control deslizante actualizará la posición de la aguja y la volverá a dibujar en función de la nueva información de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10016">The slider will update the needle position and redraw based on the new slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10017">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10017">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10018">**slider**: bloque de control de widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10018">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10019">**info**: puntero a la estructura de información del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10019">**info**: Pointer to the slider information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10020">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10020">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10021">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la información del control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set slider information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10026">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10027">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10027">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10028">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10028">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO my_slider_info;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;

my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

/* Set slider information for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_info_set (&my_slider, &my_slider_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_slider” is configured with my_slider_info. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10044">Dibujar aguja de control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10044">Draw slider needle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10045">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10045">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_needle_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10046">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10046">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10047">Este servicio dibuja una aguja de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10047">This service draws a slider needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10048">La función gx_slider_draw llama a este servicio automáticamente, pero también lo puede invocar la aplicación como parte de una función de dibujo de control deslizante personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10048">This service is automatically called by the gx_slider_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10049">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10050">**slider**: bloque de control de widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10050">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10051">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10051">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10052">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10052">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10053">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10053">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10054">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10054">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10055">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10055">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10071">Obtener la posición de la aguja del control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10071">Get slider needle position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10072">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_needle_position_get(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10073">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10074">Este servicio calcula la posición de la aguja del control deslizante según el valor actual del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10074">This service computes the slider needle position based on the current slider value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10075">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10075">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10076">**slider**: bloque de control de widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10076">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10077">**slider_info**: puntero a la estructura de información del control deslizante que define los límites del control deslizante, el tamaño y el desplazamiento de la aguja y otros parámetros del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10077">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider information structure defining the slider limits, needle size and offset, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10078">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10078">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10079">**return_position**: puntero al destino de la posición de aguja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10079">**return_position**: Pointer to destination for needle position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10080">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10080">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10081">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta de la posición de la aguja del control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider needle position get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Información de control deslizante no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10086">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10087">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10088">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE needle_position;

/* Get the needle position for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_needle_posistion_get(&my_slider, &slider_info,
    &needle_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the needle position for slider “my_slider” has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_tickmarks_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10103">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10103">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10104">Dibujar marcas de graduación de control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10104">Draw slider tickmarks</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10105">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10105">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10106">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10107">Este servicio dibuja las marcas de graduación del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10107">This service draws the slider tickmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10108">La función gx_slider_draw llama internamente a esta función, pero se expone para que la usen las aplicaciones que pueden implementar una función personalizada de dibujo del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10108">This function is called internally by the gx_slider_draw function, but is exposed for use by applications that might implement a custom slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10109">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10109">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10110">**slider**: bloque de control de widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10110">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10111">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10112">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10112">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10113">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10113">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10114">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10114">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10115">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10115">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_travel_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10131">Obtener desplazamiento del control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10131">Get slider travel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10132">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_travel_get(
    GX_SLIDER *widget,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT *return_min_travel, 
    INT *return_max_travel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10133">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10134">Este servicio obtiene el desplazamiento del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10134">This service gets the slider travel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10135">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10136">**slider**: bloque de control de widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10136">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10137">**info**: puntero a la estructura de información del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10137">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10138">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10138">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10139">**return_min_travel**: puntero al destino para el valor de desplazamiento mínimo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10139">**return_min_travel**: Pointer to destination for minimum travel value</span></span></td>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10140">**return_max_travell**: puntero al destino para el valor de desplazamiento máximo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10140">**return_max_travell**: Pointer to destination for maximum travel value</span></span></td>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10141">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10141">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10142">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del desplazamiento del control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider travel get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10143">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10143">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10144">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10144">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10145">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10145">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Información de control deslizante no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10147">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10147">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10149">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10149">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get travel information for for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_travel_get(&my_slider, &info,
    &my_min_travel, &my_max_travel);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the travel max/min values for slider “my_slider” have been retrieved. */
```
