## <a name="gx_slider_value_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10165">Calcular valor del control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10165">Calculate slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10166">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10166">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_calculate(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT new_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10167">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10167">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10168">Este servicio calcula el valor del control deslizante en función de la posición de la aguja del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10168">This service calculates the slider value based on the slider needle position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10169">GUIX llama a esta función internamente cuando el usuario mueve la aguja del control deslizante, pero también la puede invocar la aplicación al implementar un widget de control deslizante personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10169">This function is called internally by GUIX when the user moves the slider needle, but can also be invoked by the application when implementing a custom slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10170">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10170">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10171">**slider**: bloque de control de widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10171">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10172">**info**: puntero a la información del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10172">**info**: Pointer to slider info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10173">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10173">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LISDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10174">**new_position**: nueva posición del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10174">**new_position**: New slider position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10175">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10175">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10176">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cálculo correcto del valor del control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10176">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10178">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10180">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Información de control deslizante no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10180">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10181">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10181">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10182">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10182">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10183">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10183">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Calculate new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_calculate(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_slider_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider value of “my_slider” has been calculated. */

```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10198">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10198">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10199">Establecer valor del control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10199">Set slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10200">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10200">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info, 
    INT new_value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10201">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10201">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10202">Este servicio establece el valor del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10202">This service sets the slider value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10203">La aplicación puede llamar a esta API para que el desplazamiento de la aguja del control deslizante se produzca bajo control del programa, omitiendo la necesidad de entrada de usuario para arrastrarla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10203">This API can be called by the application to move a slider needle under program control, bypassing the need for user input to drag the slider needle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10204">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10204">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10205">**slider**: bloque de control de widget de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10205">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10206">**info**: puntero a la estructura de información del control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10206">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10207">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10207">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10208">**new_value**: nuevo valor de control deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10208">**new_value**: New slider value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10209">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10209">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10210">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del valor del control deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10212">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10213">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10213">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10214">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10214">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10215">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10215">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10216">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10216">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_set(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new value has been set for slider “my_slider”. */
```

##  <a name="gx_sprite_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10231">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10231">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10232">Crear un widget de sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10232">Create a sprite widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10233">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_create(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count,
    ULONG style, USHORT sprite_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10234">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10235">Este servicio crea un widget GX_SPRITE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10235">This service creates a GX_SPRITE widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10236">Un sprite se usa para mostrar una secuencia de mapas de píxeles como en una animación, o bien se puede usar como un widget de pantalla de mapa de píxeles de varios estados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10236">A sprite is used to display a sequence of pixelmaps as in an animation, or can be used as a multi-state pixelmap display widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10237">GX_SPRITE se deriva de GX_WIDGET y admite todos los servicios de API gx_widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10237">GX_SPRITE is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10238">El widget GX_SPRITE requiere una matriz de estructuras de GX_SPRITE_FRAME para definir la animación de sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10238">The GX_SPRITE widget requires an array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures to define the sprite animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10239">En el **Apéndice I se** incluye la definición de la estructura GX_PRITE_FRAME.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10239">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PRITE_FRAME structure.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10240">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10240">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10241">**sprite**: bloque de control de widget de sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10241">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10242">**name**: nombre de sprite opcional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10242">**name**: Optional sprite name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10243">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10243">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10244">**frame_list**: una matriz de estructuras de GX_SPRITE_FRAME.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10244">**frame_list**: An array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10245">**frame_count**: especifica el número de entradas de la matriz de lista de fotogramas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10245">**frame_count**: specifies the number of entries in the frame list array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10246">**style**: estilo del sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10246">**style**: Style of sprite.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10247">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10247">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10248">**slider_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10248">**sprite_id**: Application-defined ID of sprite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10249">**size**: dimensiones del sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10249">**size**: Dimensions of sprite</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10250">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10250">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10251">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10251">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10253">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10253">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10254">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10254">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10256">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10256">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10257">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10257">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10258">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10258">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create sprite “my_sprite”. */

status = gx_sprite_create(&my_sprite, “my_sprite”,
    &my_parent,
    sprite_frame_list, frame_count,
    GX_STYLE_SPRITE_AUTO|GX_STYLE_SPRITE_LOOP,
    ID_MY_SPRITE, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_current_frame_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10264">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10264">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10265">Asignar fotograma de sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10265">Assign sprite frame</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10266">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_current_frame_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10267">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10268">Este servicio asigna el fotograma del sprite actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10268">This service assigns the current sprite frame.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10269">Si un widget GX_SPRITE no se ejecuta automáticamente, se puede usar como luz de estado controlada por programa, que muestre el mapa de píxeles del fotograma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10269">If a GX_SPRITE widget is not auto-running, it can be used as a program controlled state light, displaying the commanded frame pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10270">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10270">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10271">**sprite**: bloque de control de widget de sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10271">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10272">**frame**: fotograma de sprite que se va a mostrar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10272">**frame**: Sprite frame to display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10273">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10273">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10274">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10274">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10276">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10278">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10279">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10280">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign frame number 3 as the current sprite frame */
status = gx_sprite_current_frame_set(&my_sprite, 3);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will display frame index 3. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10285">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10285">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_frame_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10286">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10286">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10287">Asignar o modificar una lista de fotogramas de sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10287">Assign or alter a sprite frame list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10288">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10288">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_frame_list_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10289">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10290">Este servicio se puede usar para asignar o volver a asignar la lista de fotogramas que usa un widget de sprite después de haberlo creado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10290">This service can be used to assign or re-assign the frame list used by a sprite widget after the sprite widget has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10291">Para obtener información sobre el contenido de una lista de fotogramas de sprite, consulte la documentación de la API gx_sprite_create.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10291">For information about the contents of a sprite frame list, refer to the gx_sprite_create API documentation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10292">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10292">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10293">**sprite**: bloque de control de widget de sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10293">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10294">**frame_list**: matriz de estructuras GX_SPRITE_FRAME o GX_NULL si no hay ninguna lista de fotogramas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10294">**frame_list**: Array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures or GX_NULL if no frame list.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10295">**frame_count**: número de fotogramas de la matriz de lista de fotogramas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10295">**frame_count**: Number of frames in frame list array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10296">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10296">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10297">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la lista de fotogramas de sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10297">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite frame list set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10299">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10299">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10300">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10300">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10301">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10301">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10302">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10302">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10303">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10303">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign framelist_1, which has 10 frames, to my_sprite */
status = gx_sprite_frame_list_set(&my_sprite, framelist_1, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new frame list is now associated with this sprite */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10304">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10304">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10305">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10305">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10307">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10307">gx_sprite_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10308">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10308">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10309">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10309">gx_sprite_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10310">Iniciar una secuencia de ejecución de sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10310">Start a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10311">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10311">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_start(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10312">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10312">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10313">Este servicio inicia una secuencia de ejecución automática de sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10313">This service starts a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10314">El widget de sprite recorrerá los fotogramas del sprite hasta que se alcance el último fotograma, o se ejecutará de forma continua si se establece el estilo GX_SPRITE_LOOP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10314">The sprite widget will cycle through the sprite frames until the last frame is reached, or will run continuously if the GX_SPRITE_LOOP style is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10315">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10316">**sprite**: bloque de control de widget de sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10316">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10317">**frame**: fotograma de sprite inicial que se va a mostrar, normalmente el fotograma 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10317">**frame**: Initial sprite frame to display, usually frame 0</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10318">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10318">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10319">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Inicio correcto de la ejecución del sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10319">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully started sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10320">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10320">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10321">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10323">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10324">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10324">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10325">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start the sprite “my_sprite” */
status = gx_sprite_start(&my_sprite, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will start running */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10326">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10326">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10331">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10331">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10332">Detener una secuencia de ejecución de sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10332">Stop a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10333">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10333">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_stop(GX_SPRITE *sprite);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10334">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10335">Este servicio detiene una secuencia de ejecución automática de sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10335">This service stops a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10336">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10336">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10337">**sprite**: bloque de control de widget de sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10337">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10338">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Detención correcta de la ejecución del sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10339">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully stopped sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10341">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10343">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10343">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10344">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10344">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10345">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10345">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the sprite sequence */
status = gx_sprite_stop(&my_sprite);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” is stopped. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10346">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10346">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10347">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10347">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10348">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10348">gx_sprite_start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10349">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10349">gx_sprite_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10350">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10350">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10351">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10351">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10352">Crear una rueda del mouse de tipo de cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10352">Create a string type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10353">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10353">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string_list, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10354">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10354">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10355">Este servicio crea una rueda del mouse de tipo cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10355">This service creates a string type scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10356">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL se deriva de GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL y, por tanto, todas las funciones de API gx_text_scroll_wheel pueden usarse con widgets GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10356">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, and therefore all gx_text_scroll_wheel API functions maybe be used with GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL widgets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10357">La aplicación puede pasar una matriz de cadenas simple a la función de creación que define las cadenas que la rueda del mouse mostrará, o bien la aplicación puede pasar GX_NULL como el parámetro string_list y llamar a la API `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` para proporcionar una matriz de id. de cadenas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10357">The application can pass in a simple string array to the create function which defines the strings that will be displayed by the scroll wheel, or the application can pass GX_NULL as the string_list parameter and call the `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API to provide an array of String IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10358">Si se usa este último método, la rueda del mouse de cadenas cambiará automáticamente las cadenas mostradas si se modifica el idioma de la aplicación activa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10358">If the latter method is used the string scroll wheel will automatically switch the displayed strings if the active application language is modified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10359">Como alternativa, si las cadenas que se van a mostrar no están definidas estáticamente o no se conocen en el momento en que se crea la rueda del mouse, la aplicación puede pasar GX_NULL como parámetro de lista de cadenas y llamar a la función de API gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() para definir una función de devolución de llamada que proporcione las cadenas que se deben mostrar en tiempo real según sea necesario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10359">As an alternative, if the strings to be displayed are not statically defined or not know at the time the scroll wheel is created, the application can pass GX_NULL as the string list parameter, and call the API function gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() to define a callback function which will provide the strings to be displayed in a real-time as-needed basis..</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10362">**nombre**: nombre del widget definido por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10362">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10363">**parent**: elemento primario de rueda o GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10363">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10364">**total_rows**: total de filas que se van a presentar al usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10364">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10365">**string_list**: matriz de cadenas definidas estáticamente o GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10365">**string_list**: Statically defined string array, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10366">**style**: marcas de estilo deseadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10366">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10367">**Id**: marcas de estilo de rueda definidas por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10367">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10368">**size**: tamaño inicial de la rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10368">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la rueda del mouse de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10370">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created string scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10377">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10377">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Create the string scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “Day Wheel”,
    root, 7, days,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    ID_SCROLL_WHEEL_DAY, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string scroll wheel has been created. */
```

```C
    INT id_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10399">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10400">Este servicio procesa un evento de la rueda del mouse de cadenas especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10400">This service processes an event for the specified string scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10401">Cualquier función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de rueda del mouse de cadenas debe llamar a este servicio como controlador de eventos predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10401">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom string scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10402">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10402">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10407">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10407">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10408">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10408">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10409">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10409">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10410">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10411">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10411">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10412">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10412">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic string scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default string scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
GX_CONST RESOURCE_ID wheel_ids[] = {
    GX_STRING_ID_SUNDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_MONDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_TUESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_WEDNESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_THURSDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_FRIDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_SATURDAY
};

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ID list has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10469">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10469">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10470">Asignar matriz de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10470">Assign array of strings</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10471">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10471">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string_list, 
    INT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10472">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10472">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10473">Se asigna una matriz de cadenas a un widget de rueda del mouse de cadenas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10473">This assigns an array of strings to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10474">Se puede usar para modificar las cadenas que se muestran después de que se haya creado inicialmente el widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10474">This can be used to modify the strings displayed after the widget has initially been created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10475">Tenga en cuenta que string_scroll_wheel no admite GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY y, por tanto, la aplicación debe definir estáticamente la matriz de cadenas que se pasa a esta función.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10475">Note that string_scroll_wheel does not support GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, and therefore the array of strings passed into this function should be statically defined by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10476">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10477">**wheel**: dirección del bloque de control de rueda del mouse de cadenas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10477">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10478">**string_list**: matriz de punteros de cadenas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10478">**string_list**: Array of string pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10479">**string_count**: tamaño de la matriz de cadenas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10479">**string_count**: Size of the string array.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10480">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10480">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10481">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cambio correcto de las cadenas de la rueda del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10481">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully changed strings for scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10482">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10482">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10483">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10483">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10484">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10484">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10485">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Tamaño de lista de cadenas no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10485">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid string list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10486">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10486">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10487">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10487">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10488">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10488">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Set the array of strings to the scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(&wheel, days, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string array has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10507">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10507">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10508">Crear widget definido en el archivo de especificaciones generado por Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10508">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10509">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10509">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *gx_studio_widget_create(
    GX_BYTE *control,
    GX_CONST GX_STUDIO_WIDGET *definition, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10510">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10510">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10511">Este servicio crea un widget y sus elementos secundarios mediante una especificación de widget definida en el archivo de especificaciones generado por GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10511">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10512">Esta función evita la búsqueda "por nombre" de la función similar `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10512">This function avoids the “by name” lookup of the similar function `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10513">La estructura GX_STUDIO_WIDGET se define en el archivo de encabezado de especificaciones de la aplicación generado por GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10513">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure is defined in the application specifications header file generated by GUIX Studio.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10514">En el caso de los widgets asignados estáticamente, el bloque de control de widget se define en el archivo specifications.c generado y se le asigna el nombre de widget definido en GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10514">For statically allocated widgets, the widget control block is defined in the generated specifications.c file, and given the widget name defined within GUIX Studio.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10515">En el caso de los widgets asignados dinámicamente, la aplicación debe pasar GX_NULL como la dirección del bloque de control de widget y la función intentará asignar dinámicamente el bloque de control de widget mediante la función `gx_system_memory_allocate()`, que la aplicación también define y proporciona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10515">For dynamically allocated widgets, the application should pass GX_NULL as the widget control block address and the function will attempt to dynamically allocate the widget control block using the `gx_system_memory_allocate()` function, which is also defined by and provided by the application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10516">Para que una aplicación haga referencia directamente a la definición del widget de GUIX Studio dentro del archivo de especificaciones generado, es necesario seguir la convención de nomenclatura usada por el generador de código de GUI Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10516">For an application to directly reference the GUIX Studio widget definition within the generated specifications file, it is necessary to follow the naming convention utilized by the GUI Studio code generator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10517">El nombre de la estructura GX_STUDIO_WIDGET generada en el archivo specifications.c siempre sigue esta convención: <nombre_widget>_define, donde el campo <nombre_widget> se puede repetir varias veces si se trata de un widget secundario de un widget secundario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10517">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure generated within the specifications.c file is always named according to this convention: <widget_name>_define, where the <widget_name> field may be repeated multiple times if the widget is child of a child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10518">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10519">**control**: puntero al bloque de control de widget o GX_NULL si se asigna dinámicamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10519">**control** Pointer to widget control block, or GX_NULL if dynamically allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10520">**definition**: estructura de definición de widget generada por Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10520">**definition** Studio generated widget definition structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10521">**parent**: puntero al elemento primario del widget, si existe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10521">**parent** pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10522">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10522">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10523">Puntero al bloque de control de widget creado o GX_NULL si la creación no se ha realizado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10523">Pointer to the created widget control block, or GX_NULL if the creation was not successful.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10524">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10524">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10525">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10525">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10526">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10526">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget “playlist_screen”, which is statically allocated. */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(&playlist_screen,
    &playlist_screen_define,
    root_window);

/* If widget != GX_NULL the widget was created. */

/* create the widget “songs_screen”, which is dynamically allocated */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(GX_NULL,
    &songs_screen_define, root_window);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10527">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10527">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10528">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10528">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_named_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10529">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10529">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10530">Crear widget definido en el archivo de especificaciones generado por Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10530">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10531">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10531">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_named_widget_create(
    char *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **new_widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10532">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10532">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10533">Este servicio crea un widget y sus elementos secundarios mediante una especificación de widget definida en el archivo de especificaciones generado por GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10533">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10534">Esta función de la API se usa para crear pantallas de nivel superior con el nombre de pantalla especificado en la aplicación GUIX Studio como el identificador de la definición del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10534">This API function is used to create top-level screens using the screen name specified within the GUIX Studio application as the widget definition identifier.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10535">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10536">**name**: nombre de la pantalla según se ha definido en la aplicación GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10536">**name**: Screen name as defined within GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10537">**parent**: puntero al elemento primario del widget, si existe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10537">**parent**: pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10538">**new_widget**: ubicación para devolver el puntero de widget creado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10538">**new_widget**: location to return created widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10539">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10540">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10540">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10541">**GX_FAILURE** (0x11) No se pudo encontrar el widget con nombre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10541">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Named widget could not be found</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10542">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10542">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10543">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10543">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10544">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10544">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”,
   which is a child of the top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_named_widget_create(“main_menu”,
    &root_window, &menu_screen);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the screen was created
   and linked to the root window. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_display_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10547">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10547">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10548">Configurar la pantalla definida en el proyecto de GUIX Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10548">Configure display defined in GUIX Studio project</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10549">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10549">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_display_configure(
    USHORT display,
    UINT (*driver)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    USHORT language, 
    USHORT theme,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10550">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10550">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10551">Este servicio inicializa un objeto GX_DISPLAY para que esté listo para su uso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10551">This service initializes a GX_DISPLAY so that it is ready for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10552">Esta función consolida las funciones para inicializar un bloque de control de GX_DISPLAY, crear un lienzo para que se ajuste a la pantalla y crear una ventana raíz para el lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10552">This function consolidates the functions to initialize a GX_DISPLAY control block, create a canvas to fit the display, and create a root window for the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10553">Esta función también instala el idioma y el tema del recurso solicitados después de que se haya inicializado la pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10553">This function also installs the language and resource theme requested after the display has been initialized.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10554">Esta función consolida el trabajo de programación requerido con más frecuencia para preparar una pantalla para su uso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10554">This function consolidates the programming effort most commonly required to prepare a display for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10555">La función invoca las funciones gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create y gx_window_root_create, todas o algunas de las cuales serán necesarias para el programa de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10555">The function invokes the gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create, and gx_window_root_create functions, all or some of which would otherwise be required by the application program.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10556">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10556">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10557">**display**: índice en la tabla de pantalla, que corresponde a las definiciones de pantalla del archivo de proyecto de Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10557">**display**: Index into the display table, which corresponds to the display definitions in the Studio project file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10558">**driver**: puntero a la función de inicialización del controlador de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10558">**driver**: pointer to display driver initialization function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10559">Esta función se invoca para inicializar los punteros de función indirectos del bloque de control de GX_DISPLAY, así como para realizar cualquier configuración de hardware necesaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10559">This function is invoked to initialize the indirect function pointers of the GX_DISPLAY control block, as well as perform any required hardware setup.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10560">**language**: índice de tabla de idioma inicial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10560">**language**: initial language table index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10561">**language**: índice de tema inicial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10561">**language**: initial theme index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10562">**root**: puntero a la variable en la que se va a devolver la dirección de la ventana raíz o GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10562">**root**: pointer to variable in which to return root window address, or GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10563">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10563">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10564">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Correcto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10564">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10565">**GX_FAILURE** (0x11) No se pudo inicializar la pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10565">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Display could not be initialized</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10566">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10566">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10567">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10567">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10568">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10568">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”, which is a child of the
   top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_display_configure(MAIN_DISPLAY,
    my_driver_setup, LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, DEFAULT_THEME, GX_NULL);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the display was initialized, a canvas was
created for the display, a root window was created for the canvas, and
the requested language and theme have been installed.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10579">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10579">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10580">Establecer idioma activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10580">Set active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10581">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10581">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_active_language_set(GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10582">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10582">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10583">Este servicio establece el idioma actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10583">This service set the current language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10584">El índice de idioma debe ser menor que el número de columnas de la tabla de cadenas de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10584">The language index must be less than the number of columns in the application string table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10585">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_display_active_language_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10585">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_active_language_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10586">Todas las aplicaciones nuevas deben usar gx_display_active_language_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10586">All new applications should use gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10587">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10587">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10588">**language**: índice de idioma, definido en el archivo de encabezado del recurso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10588">**language**: Language index, defined in resource header file.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10589">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10589">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10590">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del idioma activo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10590">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set active language</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10591">\*\*GX_CALLER_ERROR\*\*\*\* (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10591">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \*\* (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10592">\*\*GX_PTR_ERROR\*\*\*\* (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10592">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\* (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10593">\*\*GX_INVALID_VALUE\*\*\*\* (0x22) Índice de idioma no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10593">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \*\* (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10594">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10595">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10595">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10596">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10596">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set active language and mark widget canvas as dirty. */
status = gx_system_active_language_set(ID_LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_animation_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10601">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10601">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10602">Obtener el bloque de control de animación del grupo del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10602">Obtain animation control block from system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10603">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_get(GX_ANIMATION **animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10604">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10605">Este servicio se puede usar para obtener un bloque de control de animación de un grupo de dichos bloques de control mantenidos por el componente gx_system.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10605">This service can be used to obtain an animation control block from a pool of such control blocks maintained by the gx_system component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10606">El grupo de bloques de control de animación y los servicios de API relacionados solo se proporcionan si la constante GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE se define con un valor 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10606">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10607">La configuración predeterminada para este valor es 6, lo que significa que el grupo de bloques de control de animación del sistema contiene el tamaño del bloque de control de GX_ANIMATION.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10607">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10608">Un bloque de control de animación asignado mediante esta API se devuelve automáticamente al grupo libre si la animación se ejecuta hasta su finalización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10608">An animation control block allocated using this API is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10609">Si la animación se detiene mediante gx_animation_stop, o no se inicia debido a un error devuelto, la aplicación debe devolver el bloque de control de animación al grupo libre mediante gx_system_animation_free.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10609">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10610">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10611">**animation**: dirección del puntero que va a recibir el puntero de GX_ANIMATION.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10611">**animation**: Address of pointer to receive GX_ANIMATION pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10612">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10612">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10613">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del bloque de control de animación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10613">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully obtained animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10614">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10614">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10615">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de animación no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10615">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10616">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS** (0x31) Se agotó el grupo de animaciones del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10616">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) System animation pool exhausted</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10617">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10617">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10618">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10618">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10619">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10619">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10620">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10620">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10621">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10621">gx_animation_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10622">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10622">gx_animation_start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10623">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10623">gx_animation_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10624">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10624">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_animation_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10625">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10625">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10626">Devolver un bloque de control de animación al grupo del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10626">Return an animation control block to the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10627">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_free(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10628">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10629">Este servicio se puede usar para devolver un bloque de control de animación al grupo del sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10629">This service can be used to return an animation control block to the system pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10630">El grupo de bloques de control de animación y los servicios de API relacionados solo se proporcionan si la constante GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE se define con un valor 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10630">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10631">La configuración predeterminada para este valor es 6, lo que significa que el grupo de bloques de control de animación del sistema contiene el tamaño del bloque de control de GX_ANIMATION.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10631">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10632">Un bloque de control de animación asignado mediante gx_system_animation_get() se devuelve automáticamente al grupo libre si la animación se ejecuta hasta su finalización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10632">An animation control block allocated using gx_system_animation_get() is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10633">El intento de devolver un bloque de control de animación al grupo libre que ya se ha devuelto al grupo libre no tiene ningún efecto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10633">Attempting to return an animation control block to the free pool that has already been returned to the free pool has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10634">Si la animación se detiene mediante gx_animation_stop, o no se inicia debido a un error devuelto, la aplicación debe devolver el bloque de control de animación que se ha obtenido mediante gx_system_animation_get() al grupo libre mediante gx_system_animation_free().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10634">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block that has been obtained using gx_system_animation_get() should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10635">Una animación debe estar en estado inactivo antes de que se pueda devolver al grupo libre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10635">An animation must be in IDLE state before it can be returned to the free pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10636">Una animación está en estado inactivo cuando no se ha iniciado, cuando se ha detenido o cuando se ejecuta hasta su finalización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10636">An animation is in the IDLE state when it has not been started, when it is stopped, or when it runs to completion.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10637">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10637">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10638">**animation**: puntero a un bloque de control de GX_ANIMATION.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10638">**animation**: Pointer to the GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10639">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10640">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Liberación correcta del bloque de animación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10640">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de animación no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-10643">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION** (0x32) La animación no está inactiva o no se ha asignado desde el grupo del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10643">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) The animation is not IDLE, or it has not been allocated from the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10644">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10644">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-10645">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10645">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-10646">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-10646">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    status = gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);

    if (status != GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* animation did not start, return it to the free pool */
        gx_system_animation_free(animation);
    }
}
```
