## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11262">Establecer apariencia de desplazamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11262">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11263">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11264">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11265">Este servicio establece la apariencia predeterminada del desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11265">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11266">Cuando se crea un desplazamiento, se usa esta estructura de apariencia a menos que la aplicación proporcione una versión personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11266">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11267">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11267">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11268">**style**: estilo del desplazamiento `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` o `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11268">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11269">**appearance**: puntero a la estructura de apariencia inicializada con varios atributos de apariencia de la barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11269">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11270">Consulte el **apéndice I** para ver la definición de la estructura GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11270">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11271">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11271">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11272">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la apariencia del desplazamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11275">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11275">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11276">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11276">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11277">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11277">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11301">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11301">gx_system_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11302">Iniciar GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11302">Start GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11303">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11303">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_start(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11304">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11304">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11305">Este servicio inicia el procesamiento de GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11305">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11306">En circunstancias normales, esta función nunca vuelve, sino que comienza a procesar la cola de eventos de GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11306">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11307">Cuando la cola de eventos de GUIX está vacía, este servicio suspende el subproceso que realiza la llamada hasta que llegan nuevos eventos a la cola de eventos de GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11307">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11308">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11309">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11309">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11310">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11310">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11311">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Inicio correcto del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11313">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11314">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11315">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11315">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11343">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11343">Description</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11350">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11350">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11354">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11354">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_string_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11362">gx_system_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11362">gx_system_string_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11363">Recuperar la tabla de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11363">Retrieves the string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11364">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11364">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_table_get(
    GX_UBYTE language,
    GX_CHAR ***string_table,
    UINT *get_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11365">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11365">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11366">Este servicio recupera la tabla de cadenas para el idioma solicitado de la primera pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11366">This service retrieves the string table for the requested language from the first display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11367">Esta función ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11367">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11368">Todas las aplicaciones nuevas deben usar gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11368">All new applications should use gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11369">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11370">**language**: índice del idioma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11370">**language**: Language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11371">**string_table**: puntero al espacio de almacenamiento del puntero de la tabla de cadenas o NULL si el autor de la llamada no necesita obtener el puntero a la tabla de cadenas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11371">**string_table**: Pointer to storage space of the string table pointer, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the pointer to the string table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11372">**get_size**: puntero al almacenamiento del número de cadenas de la tabla de cadenas, o NULL si el autor de la llamada no necesita obtener el número de cadenas de la tabla de cadenas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11372">**get_size**: Pointer to the storage for the number of strings in string table, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the number of strings in the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11373">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11373">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11374">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta de la tabla de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11374">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string table get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11375">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11375">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11376">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11376">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11377">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11377">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11378">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11378">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string table. */

CHAR **my_string_table; UINT table_size;

status = gx_system_string_table_get(LANGUAGE_ID_ENGLISH,
    &my_string_table, &table_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the pointer to the string table has
been obtained. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11384">gx_system_string_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11384">gx_system_string_width_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11385">Obtener ancho de cadena (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11385">Get string width (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11386">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11386">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_width_get(
    GX_FONT *font, GX_CHAR *string,
    INT string_length,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11387">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11388">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11388">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11389">Este servicio calcula el ancho en píxeles de la pantalla de la cadena proporcionada con la fuente especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11389">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11390">Si el parámetro string_length es >= 0, solo se incluye en el cálculo el número de caracteres de la solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11390">If the string_length parameter is >= 0, only the request count of characters are included in the calculation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11391">Si el parámetro string_length es -1, se usa toda la cadena hasta el terminador NULL en el cálculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11391">If the string_length parameter is -1, the entire string up to the NULL terminator is used in the calculation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11392">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11393">**font**: puntero a la fuente de la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11393">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11394">**string**: puntero a la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11394">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11395">**string_length**: longitud de la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11395">**string_length**: Length of string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11396">**return_width**: destino del ancho de la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11396">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11397">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11397">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11398">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del ancho de la cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11398">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11399">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11399">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11400">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11400">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11401">**GX_INVALID_FONT** (0x16) Fuente no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11401">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11402">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11402">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11403">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11403">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string width of “my_string”. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11444">Iniciar temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11444">Start timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11445">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_start(
    GX_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id,
    UINT initial_ticks,
    UINT reschedule_ticks);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11446">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11447">Este servicio inicia un temporizador para el widget especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11447">This service starts a timer for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11448">La constante GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS define el número máximo de temporizadores activos admitidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11448">The constant GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS defined the maximum active timers supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11449">El valor predeterminado es 32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11449">The default setting for this value is 32.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11450">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11451">**owner**: puntero al bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11451">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11452">**timer_id**: id. del temporizador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11452">**timer_id**: ID of timer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11453">**initial_ticks**: tics de expiración iniciales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11453">**initial_ticks**: initial expiration ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11454">**reschedule_ticks**: tics de expiración periódicos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11454">**reschedule_ticks**: Periodic expiration ticks</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11455">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Inicio correcto del temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11456">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11457">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS** (0x04) No hay más temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11457">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) No more timers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11458">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11458">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11461">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valores del temporizador no válidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11461">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Timer value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11462">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11462">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11463">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11463">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11464">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11464">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start a periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_start(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11482">gx_system_timer_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11482">gx_system_timer_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11483">Detener temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11483">Stop timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11484">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11484">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_stop(
    GW_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11485">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11486">Este servicio detiene el temporizador con el objeto timer_id especificado asociado al widget que realiza la llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11486">This service stops the timer with the specified timer_id associated with the calling widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11487">Para detener todos los temporizadores vinculados a un widget determinado, la aplicación puede pasar el valor 0 de timer_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11487">To stop all timers linked to a particular widget, the application can pass the timer_id value of 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11488">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11488">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11489">**owner**: puntero al bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11489">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11490">**timer_id**: id. del temporizador o 0 para todos los temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11490">**timer_id**: ID of timer, or 0 for all timers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11491">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Detención correcta del temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11492">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11493">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) No se encontró el id del temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11493">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Timer ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11494">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11494">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11495">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11495">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11496">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11496">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11497">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11497">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11498">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11498">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11499">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11499">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_stop(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
stopped. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11522">Este servicio recupera la cadena de la versión de la biblioteca GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11522">This service retrieves the GUIX library version string.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11527">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11527">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11571">gx_system_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11571">gx_system_widget_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11572">Buscar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11572">Find widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11573">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_widget_find(
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_level, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_search_result);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11574">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11575">Este servicio busca el id. del widget especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11575">This service searches for the specified widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11576">A diferencia de gx_widget_find(), esta función busca en los elementos secundarios de todas las ventanas raíz definidas en el sistema, lo que significa que se trata de una búsqueda exhaustiva de todos los widgets visibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11576">Unlike gx_widget_find(), this function searches the children of all root windows defined in the system, meaning this is an exhaustive search of all visible widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11577">Si conoce el elemento primario del widget que está buscando, use gx_widget_find() en su lugar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11577">If you know the parent of the widget you are searching for, use gx_widget_find() instead.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11578">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11578">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11579">**widget_id**: id. de widget que se va a buscar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11579">**widget_id**: Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11580">**search_level**: define el nivel de anidamiento recurrente en el que se buscan los widgets secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11580">**search_level**: Defines the recursive nesting level into which child widgets are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11581">Si este valor es 0, solo se busca en los elementos secundarios inmediatos de cada ventana raíz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11581">If this value is 0, only immediate children of each root window are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11582">Si este valor es GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, la función se anida en todos los elementos secundarios en busca del id. del widget solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11582">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, the function nests down into all children searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11583">Para cualquier otro valor > 0, el nivel de búsqueda define la profundidad de anidamiento de la búsqueda del id. del widget solicitado que realizará esta función.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11583">For any other value > 0, the search level defines how deeply nested this function will go searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11584">**return_search_result**: se encontró un puntero al destino del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11584">**return_search_result**: Pointer to destination for widget found</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11585">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11585">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11586">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Búsqueda correcta del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11586">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful widget search</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11587">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) No se encontró el id. del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11587">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11588">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11588">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11589">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11589">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11590">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11590">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11591">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11591">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Search recursively from the top level widget for the widget with
ID of MY_WIDGET_ID. */

status = gx_system_widget_find(MY_WIDGET_ID,
    GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE,
    &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the search was successful and
“my_widget” contains the pointer to the widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11616">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11616">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11617">Crear botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11617">Create text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11618">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11618">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_create(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11619">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11619">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11620">Este servicio crea un widget de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11620">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11621">GX_TEXT_BUTTON se deriva de GX_BUTTON y admite todos los servicios de API gx_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11621">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11622">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11622">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11623">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11623">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11624">**name**: nombre lógico del botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11624">**name**: Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11625">**parent**: puntero al widget primario del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11625">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11626">**text_id**: id. de recurso del texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11626">**text_id**: Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11627">**style**: estilo del botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11627">**style**: Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11628">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11628">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11629">**text_button_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11629">**text_button_id**: Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11630">**size**: tamaño del botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11630">**size**: Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11631">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11631">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11632">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11632">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11634">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11635">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11635">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11636">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11636">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11638">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11639">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11640">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11640">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Create text button “my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text button “my_text_button” was
created. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11658">gx_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11658">gx_text_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11659">Dibujar botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11659">Draw text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11660">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11660">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11661">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11661">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11662">Este servicio dibuja el botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11662">This service draws the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11663">Normalmente, se llama a este servicio internamente durante la actualización del lienzo, pero también se puede llamar desde funciones de dibujo de botón de texto personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11663">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text button drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11664">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11664">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11665">**button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11665">**button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11666">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11666">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11667">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11667">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11668">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11668">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11670">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11670">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom text button draw function. */

VOID my_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button)
{
    /* Call default text button draw. */
    gx_text_button_draw(text_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11688">gx_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11688">gx_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11689">Procesar evento de botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11689">Process text button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11690">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11690">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11691">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11691">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11692">Este servicio procesa un evento para el botón de texto especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11692">This service processes an event for the specified text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11693">Cualquier función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de botón debe llamar a este servicio como controlador de eventos predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11693">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text button event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11694">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11694">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11695">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11695">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11696">**event_ptr**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11696">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11697">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11697">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto de evento de botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11701">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11701">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11702">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11703">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11703">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11704">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11704">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11795">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11795">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11796">Función de compatibilidad para dibujar texto de botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11796">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11797">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11797">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11798">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11798">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11799">Esta función de compatibilidad dibuja la parte de texto de un botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11799">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11800">gx_text_button_draw llama internamente a esta función, y se proporciona como una API independiente para comodidad de las aplicaciones que definen una función de dibujo de botón personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11800">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11801">Las aplicaciones que quieren personalizar el dibujo del fondo del botón pueden proporcionar su función de dibujo personalizada e invocar el servicio gx_text_button_text_draw como parte de su dibujo personalizado para dibujar el texto del botón sobre el fondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11801">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11802">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11802">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11803">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11803">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11804">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11804">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11805">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11805">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11806">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11806">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11807">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11807">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11808">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11808">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11825">gx_text_button_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11825">gx_text_button_text_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11826">Obtener texto del botón de texto (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11826">Get text from the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11827">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11827">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_get(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11828">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11828">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11829">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11829">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11830">Este servicio recupera la cadena especificada del botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11830">This service retrieves the specified string from the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11831">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11831">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11832">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11832">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11833">**return_text**: puntero a la cadena recuperada del botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11833">**return_text**: Pointer to the string retrieved from the text button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11834">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11834">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11835">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del texto del botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11835">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get the text from the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11837">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11839">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11839">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11840">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11840">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11841">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11841">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *string;

/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_get(&my_text_button, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string pointer from
“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11876">gx_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11876">gx_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11877">Establecer el id. de recurso de texto en el botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11877">Set text resource ID to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11878">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11878">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11879">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11879">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11880">Este servicio establece el id. de recurso de cadena especificado en el botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11880">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11881">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11881">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11882">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11882">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11883">**string_id**: id. de recurso de la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11883">**string_id**: Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11884">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11884">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del id. de recurso de la cadena en el botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11885">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11887">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11888">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11888">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11889">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de cadena no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11889">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) String ID not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11890">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11891">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11892">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11892">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button
“my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_text_id_set(&my_text_button,
    MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to
“my_text_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11908">gx_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11908">gx_text_button_text_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11909">Asignar texto al botón de texto (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11909">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11910">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11910">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11911">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11911">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11912">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11912">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11913">Este servicio asigna la cadena especificada al botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11913">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11914">Si el widget de text_button se creó con el estilo GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, el widget crea una copia privada de la cadena de texto asignada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11914">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11915">Si GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY no está activo, el widget no realiza una copia privada de la cadena de entrada y, por lo tanto, la cadena se debe asignar de forma estática o global, es decir, no puede ser una variable automática o temporal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11915">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11916">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11916">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11917">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11917">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11918">**text**: puntero a la cadena terminada en NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11918">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11919">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11920">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del texto en el botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11922">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11922">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11923">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11923">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11924">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) El asignador de memoria no está definido o se ha producido un error de asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11924">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11925">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11925">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11926">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11926">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11927">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11927">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11928">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11928">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_button”.
*/

status = gx_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11933">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11933">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11934">Asignar texto al botón de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11934">Assign text to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11935">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11935">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11936">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11936">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11937">Este servicio asigna la cadena especificada al botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11937">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11938">Si el widget de text_button se creó con el estilo GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, el widget crea una copia privada de la cadena de texto asignada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11938">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11939">Si GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY no está activo, el widget no realiza una copia privada de la cadena de entrada y, por lo tanto, la cadena se debe asignar de forma estática o global, es decir, no puede ser una variable automática o temporal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11939">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11940">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11941">**text_button**: puntero al bloque de control de botón de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11941">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11942">**string**: puntero a la variable GX_STRING.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11942">**string**: pointer to the GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11943">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11943">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11944">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del texto en el botón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11944">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11945">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11945">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11946">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11947">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11947">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11948">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) El asignador de memoria no está definido o se ha producido un error de asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11948">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11949">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11949">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11950">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11950">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11951">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11951">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11952">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11952">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING new_string; new_string.gx_string_ptr = “Monday”;

new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Assign the string “new_string” to the text button
“my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

```C
    GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *cursor_input,
    GX_UBYTE blink_interval);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11972">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-11973">Este servicio establece el valor del intervalo de intermitencia del cursor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11973">This service sets blink interval value of the cursor.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11974">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11974">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11975">**cursor_input**: bloque de control del cursor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11975">**cursor_input** Cursor control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11976">**blink_interval**: valor que se va a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11976">**blink_interval** Value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11977">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11977">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11978">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del intervalo de intermitencia del cursor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11978">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the cursor blink interval</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11979">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11979">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-11980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor de intervalo de intermitencia no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Blink interval value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11981">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11981">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-11983">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-11983">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *input_cursor;

/* Pointer the input cursor to the cursor instance of single/multi
line text input widget. */

input_cursor = &sl_input.gx_single_line_text_input_cursor_instance;

/* Set the blink interval value of “input_cursor” to 2. */
status = gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(input_cursor, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the blink interval value of
“input_cursor” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12023">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12023">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12024">Asignar la función de devolución de llamada de la rueda del mouse de tipo de texto (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12024">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12025">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12025">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12026">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12027">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12027">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12028">Este servicio asigna la función de devolución de llamada que invocará una rueda del mouse de tipo de texto para determinar la cadena de texto que se va a mostrar en cada fila de la rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12028">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12029">Para GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL y GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, se proporcionan funciones de devolución de llamada predeterminadas y la aplicación no necesita realizar ningún cambio para usar las implementaciones predeterminadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12029">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12030">Esta API se proporciona para permitir que la aplicación personalice el formato u otros parámetros de la cadena que se muestra en cada fila del widget de rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12030">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12031">La función de devolución de llamada recibirá como entrada un puntero al bloque de control de la rueda del mouse y el número de fila que se muestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12031">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12032">La función debe devolver un puntero a una cadena de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12032">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12033">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12033">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12034">**wheel**: dirección del bloque de control de rueda del mouse de cadenas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12034">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12035">**callback**: puntero a la función de devolución de llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12035">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12036">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12036">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12037">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la devolución de llamada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12037">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12038">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12039">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12039">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12040">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12040">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12041">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12041">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12042">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12042">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12059">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12059">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12060">Asignar la función de devolución de llamada de la rueda del mouse de tipo de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12060">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12061">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12061">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    UINT *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int, GX_STRING *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12062">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12062">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12063">Este servicio asigna la función de devolución de llamada que invocará una rueda del mouse de tipo de texto para determinar la cadena de texto que se va a mostrar en cada fila de la rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12063">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12064">Para GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL y GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, se proporcionan funciones de devolución de llamada predeterminadas y la aplicación no necesita realizar ningún cambio para usar las implementaciones predeterminadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12064">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12065">Esta API se proporciona para permitir que la aplicación personalice el formato u otros parámetros de la cadena que se muestra en cada fila del widget de rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12065">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12066">La función de devolución de llamada recibirá como entrada un puntero al bloque de control de la rueda del mouse y el número de fila que se muestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12066">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12067">La función debe devolver un puntero a una cadena de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12067">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12068">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12068">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12069">**wheel**: dirección del bloque de control de rueda del mouse de cadenas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12069">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12070">**callback**: puntero a la función de devolución de llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12070">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12071">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12071">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12072">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la devolución de llamada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12072">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12073">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12073">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12075">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12075">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12076">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12076">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12077">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12077">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```
