## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12094">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12094">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12095">Crear una rueda del mouse de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12095">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12096">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12097">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12098">Este servicio crea una rueda del mouse de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12098">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12099">La rueda del mouse de texto es un widget base para los widgets de tipo GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL y GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12099">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12100">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create y gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create llaman internamente a esta función, y se proporciona como una API independiente para comodidad de las aplicaciones que definen un widget de rueda del mouse personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12100">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12101">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12101">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12102">**wheel**: dirección del bloque de control de rueda del mouse de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12102">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12103">**nombre**: nombre del widget definido por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12103">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12104">**parent**: elemento primario de rueda o GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12104">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12105">**total_rows**: total de filas que se van a presentar al usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12105">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12106">**style**: marcas de estilo deseadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12106">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12107">**Id**: marcas de estilo de rueda definidas por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12107">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12108">**size**: tamaño inicial de la rueda del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12108">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12109">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la rueda del mouse de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12110">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created text scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12112">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12112">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12115">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12116">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12116">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12117">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12136">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12136">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12137">Dibujar una rueda del mouse de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12137">Draw a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12138">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12139">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12140">Esta es la función de dibujo predeterminada para todos los tipos de rueda basados en GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12140">This is the default drawing function for all wheel types based on GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12141">Esta función puede ser invalidada por aplicaciones que requieren la personalización de la apariencia del dibujo de la rueda del mouse de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12141">This function can be overridden by applications that require customization of the text scroll wheel drawing appearance.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12166">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12166">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12167">Procesar evento de rueda del mouse de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12167">Process text scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12168">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12169">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12170">Este servicio procesa un evento de la rueda del mouse de texto especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12170">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12171">Cualquier función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de rueda del mouse de texto debe llamar a este servicio como controlador de eventos predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12171">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12172">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12173">**wheel**: puntero al bloque de control de rueda del mouse de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12173">**wheel** Pointer to text scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12174">**event_ptr**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12174">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12175">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12175">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12176">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proceso correcto del evento de rueda del mouse de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12176">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12180">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12181">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12181">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12182">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12182">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12264">gx_tree_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12264">gx_tree_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12265">Creación de una vista de árbol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12265">Create a tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12266">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT tree_view_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12267">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12268">Este servicio crea una vista de árbol tal y como se especifica, y asocia la vista de árbol al widget primario proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12268">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12269">Acepta todos los tipos de widget como elementos de menú secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12269">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12270">Se recomienda usar el widget de tipo GX_MENU como su elemento de menú secundario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12270">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12271">GX_TREE_VIEW se deriva de GX_WINDOW y admite todos los servicios de API gx_window.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12271">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12272">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12272">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12273">**tree**: puntero al bloque de control de la vista de árbol.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12273">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12274">**name**: nombre de la vista de árbol.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12274">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12275">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12275">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12276">**style**: estilo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12276">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12277">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12277">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12278">**menu_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la vista de árbol.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12278">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12279">**size**: tamaño de la vista de árbol.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12279">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12280">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12280">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12281">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la vista de árbol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12281">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12282">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12282">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12283">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12283">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12284">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12284">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12285">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12285">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12286">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12286">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12287">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12287">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12288">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12288">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12289">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12289">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
    “my_tree_view”, parent,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_TREE_VIEW_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the tree view was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12304">gx_tree_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12304">gx_tree_view_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12305">Dibujar vista de árbol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12305">Draw tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12306">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12306">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12307">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12307">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12308">Este servicio dibuja la vista de árbol especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12308">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12309">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas para widgets de vista de árbol personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12309">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12310">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12310">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12311">**tree**: puntero al bloque de control de la vista de árbol.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12311">**tree** Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12312">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12312">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12313">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12313">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12314">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12315">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12315">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12316">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12316">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom tree view draw function. */
UINT my_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_tree_view_draw(tree_view);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12331">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12331">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

```C
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12334">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12335">Este servicio procesa un evento para la vista de árbol especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12335">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12336">Cualquier función personalizada de procesamiento de eventos de vista de árbol debe llamar a este servicio como controlador de eventos predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12336">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12337">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12337">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12343">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12343">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12345">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12345">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12346">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12346">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12347">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12347">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```


## <a name="gx_tree_view_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12481">gx_tree_view_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12481">gx_tree_view_selected_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12483">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12483">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_selected_get(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_WIDGET **selected);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12484">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12484">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12485">Este servicio recupera el elemento seleccionado actual de la vista de árbol.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12485">This service retrieves current selected item of the tree view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12486">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12486">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12487">**tree**: puntero al bloque de control de la vista de árbol.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12487">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12491">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12492">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12492">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12495">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12495">Example</span></span>

```C

    UINT (*write_data)(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count));
```

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12553">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12553">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12554">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12554">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12555">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12555">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_circle_point_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12571">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12571">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12572">Calcular punto en un círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12572">Calculate point on a circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12573">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_circle_point_get(
    INT xCenter, 
    INT yCenter,
    UINT radius, 
    INT angle, 
    GX_POINT *point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12574">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12575">Este servicio calcula el punto en un círculo, dado el centro del círculo, el radio y el ángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12575">This service calculates point on a circle given the circle center, radius, and angle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12576">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12576">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12577">**xCenter**: coordenada X del centro del círculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12577">**xCenter**: x coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12578">**yCenter**: coordenada Y del centro del círculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12578">**yCenter**: y coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12579">**radius**: radio del círculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12579">**radius**: Circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12580">**angle**: ángulo al que se va a calcular el punto perimetral del círculo, en grados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12580">**angle**: Angle at which to calculate circle perimeter point, in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12581">**point**: dirección de la variable GX_POINT en la que se va a almacenar la coordenada X,Y calculada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12581">**point**: Address of GX_POINT variable at which to store calculated x,y coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12582">**end_alpha**: valor alfa de fin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12582">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12583">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12583">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12584">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Se creó el degradado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12584">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12585">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Dirección de punto de retorno no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12585">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return point address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12586">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Parámetro de radio no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12586">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid radius parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12587">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12587">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12588">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12588">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12589">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12589">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point;
    UINT status;

        status = gx_utility_circle_point_get(100, 100,
20, 45,
&point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of point is the x,y coordinate of a point on the circle perimeter at an angle of 45 degrees, where the circle is centered at (100, 100), has a radius of 20 pixels */

```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12607">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12607">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12608">Crear un mapa de píxeles de degradado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12608">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12609">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12609">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12610">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12610">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12611">Este servicio crea un mapa de píxeles de degradado en tiempo de ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12611">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12612">Se puede usar una imagen de degradado para lograr efectos de atenuación y otros cambios visuales interesantes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12612">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12613">El ancho y el alto del degradado solicitado no pueden ser inferiores a 2x2 píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12613">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12614">GUIX mantiene internamente una lista de degradados creados, y esta función buscará primero en ella un mapa de píxeles de degradado coincidente antes de crear un nuevo mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12614">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12615">Es decir, se necesita el mismo mapa de píxeles de degradado varias veces, realmente solo se crea un mapa de píxeles y cada degradado que requiere el mapa de píxeles comparte el mapa de píxeles creado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12615">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12616">Esta API requiere que se defina la función gx_system_memory_allocator para permitir la asignación de memoria en tiempo de ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12616">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12617">Las marcas de tipo de degradado incluyen GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA y GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12617">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12618">Actualmente solo se admiten los degradados de tipo GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA (es decir, se debe establecer esta marca de tipo).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12618">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12619">La marca GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR es opcional y, cuando se establece, indica a la lógica de creación de degradado que cree un degradado que cambie de start_alpha a end_alpha y de nuevo a start_alpha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12619">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12620">En caso contrario, se crea un degradado lineal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12620">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12621">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12621">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12622">**gradient**: puntero a la estructura de bloque de control de degradado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12622">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12623">**width**: ancho del mapa de píxeles solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12623">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12624">**height**: alto de mapa de píxeles solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12624">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12625">**tipo**: tipo de degradado solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12625">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12626">**start_alpha**: valor alfa de inicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12626">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12627">**end_alpha**: valor alfa de fin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12627">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12628">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Se creó el degradado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12629">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12630">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) El degradado no tiene al menos 2x2 píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12630">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12631">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) El degradado no es de tipo GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12631">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12632">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) El asignador de memoria no está definido o se ha producido un error en la asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12632">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12634">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de degradado no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12635">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valores de alto y ancho no válidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12635">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12636">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Tipo de degradado no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12636">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12637">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12638">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12638">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12639">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12639">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

status = gx_utiity_gradient_create(&gradient, 3, 40,
    GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, 240, 0);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the gradient pixelmap has been created */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12657">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12657">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12658">Eliminar un degradado creado previamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12658">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12659">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12660">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12661">Este servicio elimina un degradado creado previamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12661">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12662">Si otros degradados no usan el mapa de píxeles asociado a este degradado, también se eliminarán los datos de mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12662">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12663">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12664">**gradient**: puntero al bloque de control de degradado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12664">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12665">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12666">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Se elimino el degradado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12666">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12668">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de degradado no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12668">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12669">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12669">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12670">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12670">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12671">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12671">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

/* Delete previously created gradient. */
status = gx_utility_gradient_delete(&gradient);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS, the gradient has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12689">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12689">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12690">Convertir un entero largo en ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12690">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12691">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12691">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12692">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12692">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12693">Este servicio convierte un valor entero largo en una cadena ASCII.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12693">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12694">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12694">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12695">**value**: valor entero largo que se va a convertir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12695">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12696">**return_buffer**: búfer de destino para la cadena ASCII.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12696">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12697">**return_buffer_size**: tamaño del búfer de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12697">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12698">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12698">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12699">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conversión correcta del valor entero en cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12699">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de búfer de retorno no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12700">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de búfer de retorno no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12702">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12703">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12703">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12704">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12704">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */
status = gx_utility_ltoa(my_value, string_buffer, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12720">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12720">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12721">Calcular arcocoseno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12721">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12722">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12722">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12723">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12723">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12724">Este servicio calcula el valor del ángulo del arcocoseno X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12724">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12725">El valor de entrada es de un tipo de datos de punto fijo, llame a GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE para convertirlo del tipo INT a GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12725">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12726">Por ejemplo, si quiere calcular el arcocoseno de 0,5, la entrada debe ser GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1)/2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12726">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12727">En GUIX 5.4.0 o versión inferior, el tipo del valor de entrada de esta función es INT y el valor se limita al intervalo [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12727">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12728">La aplicación debe escalar el valor del intervalo [-1, 1] al intervalo [-256, 256] antes de invocar este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12728">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12729">Si el proyecto con GUIX 5.4.0 o versión inferior contiene una referencia a esta API, y quiere actualizar el proyecto con la biblioteca de GUIX más reciente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12729">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12730">Tiene dos opciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12730">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12731">Corregir el valor de entrada de esta llamada API para usar el valor de tipo de datos GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12731">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12732">Definir GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12732">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12733">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12733">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12734">**x**: valor cuyo arcocoseno se calcula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12734">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12735">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12735">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12736">**angle**: valor de ángulo del arcocoseno X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12736">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12737">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12738">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12738">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12739">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12739">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12757">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12757">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12758">Calcular arcoseno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12758">Compute arc sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12759">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12759">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12760">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12760">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12761">Este servicio calcula el valor del ángulo del arcoseno X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12761">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12762">El valor de entrada es de un tipo de datos de punto fijo, llame a GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE para convertirlo del tipo INT a GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12762">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL  type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12763">Por ejemplo, si quiere calcular el arcoseno de 0,5, la entrada debe ser GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1)/2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12763">For example, if you want to calculate the arc sin of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12764">En GUIX 5.4.0 o versión inferior, el tipo del valor de entrada de esta función es INT y el valor se limita al intervalo [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12764">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12765">La aplicación debe escalar el valor del intervalo [-1, 1] al intervalo [-256, 256] antes de invocar este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12765">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12766">Si el proyecto se realiza con GUIX 5.4.0 o versión inferior, y quiere actualizar el proyecto con la biblioteca de GUIX más reciente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12766">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12767">Tiene dos opciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12767">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12768">Corregir el valor de entrada de esta llamada API para usar el valor de tipo de datos GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12768">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12769">Definir GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12769">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12770">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12771">**x**: valor cuyo arcoseno se calcula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12771">**x**: Value whose arc sine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12772">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12772">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12773">**angle**: valor de ángulo del arcoseno X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12773">**angle**: Angle value of arc sine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12774">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12775">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12775">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12776">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12776">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc sine of “x”. */

#if defined GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    X = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_asin(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc sine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12794">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12794">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12795">Calcular coseno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12795">Compute cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12796">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12796">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_cos(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12797">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12797">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12798">Este servicio calcula el coseno del ángulo proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12798">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12799">El valor de entrada es de un tipo de datos de punto fijo, llame a GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE para convertirlo de INT a GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12799">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12800">Por ejemplo, si quiere calcular el coseno de 90 grados, la entrada debe ser GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12800">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12801">El valor devuelto es de un tipo de datos de punto fijo, llame a GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT para convertirlo de GX_FIXED_VAL a INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12801">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12802">En GUIX 5.4.0 o versión anterior, el valor de entrada y el tipo de valor devuelto de este servicio es INT, el valor de entrada y el valor devuelto se amplían en 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12802">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12803">Por lo tanto, la aplicación debe escalar el valor de ángulo en 256 antes de invocar este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12803">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12804">Si el proyecto se realiza con GUIX 5.4.0 o versión inferior, y quiere actualizar el proyecto con la biblioteca de GUIX más reciente, tiene dos opciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12804">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12805">Corregir el valor de entrada y el control del valor devuelto de esta llamada API para usar el valor de tipo de datos GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12805">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12806">Definir GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12806">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12807">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12808">**angle**: ángulo para calcular el coseno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12808">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12809">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12810">**cosine**: coseno del ángulo proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12810">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12811">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12811">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12812">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12812">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12813">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12813">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12839">En GUIX 5.4.0 o versión anterior, el valor de entrada y el tipo de valor devuelto es INT, el valor de entrada y el valor devuelto se amplían en 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12839">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12840">Por lo tanto, la aplicación debe escalar el valor de ángulo en 256 antes de invocar este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12840">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12841">Si el proyecto se realiza con GUIX 5.4.0 o versión inferior, y quiere actualizar el proyecto con la biblioteca de GUIX más reciente, tiene dos opciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12841">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12850">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12850">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_angle = 80;

/* Compute sine of “my_angle”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = my_angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(my_angle);
#endif

my_angle_sine = gx_utility_math_sin(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_sine” contains the sine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12896">Reordenar el texto bidireccional en el orden de pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12896">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12897">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12897">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12898">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12898">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12899">Este servicio reordena el texto bidireccional en el orden de visualización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12899">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12900">Si se proporcionan las fuentes de dibujo de texto y el ancho de pantalla, se aplicará primero el salto de línea, el proceso de reordenación se aplicará en función de cada línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12900">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12901">Si el texto proporcionado contiene más de un párrafo, el servicio dividirá el texto en párrafos, el resultado de los saltos de línea y de reordenación de cada párrafo se vinculará como una lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12901">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12902">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12903">**input_info**: puntero a la información de salto de línea y reordenación de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12903">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12904">**resolved_info_head**: puntero a la lista vinculada que contiene los resultados de los saltos de línea y la reordenación de cada párrafo del texto proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12904">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12905">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12905">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12906">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Reordenación correcta del texto bidireccional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Punteros de entrada no válidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) El asignador de memoria no está definido o se ha producido un error de asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12909">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12910">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12910">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12911">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12911">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12912">Dibujar texto bidireccional de una sola línea en el lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12912">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12913">Dibujar texto bidireccional de varias líneas en el lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12913">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12914">Dibujar texto bidireccional de varios párrafos en el lienzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12914">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

```C
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12934">Cambiar el tamaño del mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12934">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12935">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12935">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12936">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12936">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12937">Este servicio cambia el tamaño de un mapa de píxeles y devuelve un puntero a un nuevo mapa de píxeles, que es el resultado del cambio de tamaño del mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12937">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12938">Este servicio requiere el uso anterior de gx_system_memory_allocator_set, para permitir la asignación de memoria para retener los datos de mapa de píxeles cuyo tamaño se ha cambiado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12938">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12939">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12940">**src**: puntero al mapa de píxeles cuyo tamaño se a va cambiar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12940">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12941">**destination**: búfer de destino para el mapa de píxeles resultante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12941">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12942">**width**: ancho del mapa de píxeles resultante, en píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12942">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12943">**height**: alto del mapa de píxeles resultante, en píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12943">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12944">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12944">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12945">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cambio de tamaño correcto del mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de mapa de píxeles de origen o destino no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor de alto y ancho no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) El mapa de píxeles de origen está en formato comprimido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) El asignador de memoria no está definido o se ha producido un error de asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12950">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12950">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12951">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12951">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12952">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12952">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXLEMAP *des_pixelmap;

/* Resize “src_pixelmap” with specifiy width and height. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(src_pixelmap,
    &des_pixelmap, 100, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of resize. */
```
