## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12970">Girar mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12970">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12971">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12971">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12972">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12973">Este servicio gira un mapa de píxeles y devuelve un puntero a un nuevo mapa de píxeles, que es el resultado de la rotación del mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12973">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12974">Para girar un mapa de píxeles directamente en el lienzo, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12974">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12975">Este servicio requiere el uso anterior de gx_system_memory_allocator_set, para permitir la asignación de memoria para retener los datos de mapa de píxeles girado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12975">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12976">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12976">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12977">**src**: mapa de píxeles que se va a girar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12977">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12978">**angle**: ángulo de rotación en grados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12978">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12979">**destination**: búfer de destino para el mapa de píxeles resultante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12979">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12980">**rot_cx**: coordenada X del centro de rotación recuperada con respecto al mapa de píxeles de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12980">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12981">Se debe iniciar con la coordenada X del centro de rotación con respecto al mapa de píxeles de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12981">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12982">Si rot_cx es GX_NULL, no se recuperará el valor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12982">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12983">**rot_cy**: coordenada Y del centro de rotación recuperada con respecto al mapa de píxeles de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12983">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12984">Se debe iniciar con la coordenada Y del centro de rotación con respecto al mapa de píxeles de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12984">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12985">Si rot_cy es GX_NULL, no se recuperará el valor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12985">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12986">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12986">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12987">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Rotación correcta del mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de mapa de píxeles de origen o destino no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) El valor del ángulo es 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x28) El mapa de píxeles de origen está en formato comprimido, que no se admite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) El asignador de memoria no está definido o se ha producido un error de asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12992">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12992">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-12993">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12993">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-12994">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-12994">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13013">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13013">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13014">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13015">Este servicio gira un mapa de píxeles en 90 grados, 180 grados o 270 grados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13015">This service rotates a pixelmap by 90 degree, 180 degree or 270 degree.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13016">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13018">**angle**: ángulo de rotación en grados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13018">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13019">**destination**: búfer de destino para el mapa de píxeles resultante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13019">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13020">**rot_cx**: coordenada X del centro de rotación recuperada con respecto al mapa de píxeles de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13020">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13021">Se debe iniciar con la coordenada X del centro de rotación con respecto al mapa de píxeles de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13021">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13022">Si rot_cx es GX_NULL, no se recuperará el valor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13022">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13023">**rot_cy**: coordenada Y del centro de rotación recuperada con respecto al mapa de píxeles de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13023">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13024">Se debe iniciar con la coordenada Y del centro de rotación con respecto al mapa de píxeles de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13024">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13025">Si rot_cy es GX_NULL, no se recuperará el valor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13025">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13026">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13027">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Rotación correcta del mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13027">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de mapa de píxeles de origen o destino no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) El valor del ángulo es 0 o no es un ángulo simple como 90, 180, 270</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x28) El mapa de píxeles de origen está en formato comprimido, que no se admite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) El asignador de memoria no está definido o se ha producido un error de asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13032">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13033">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13033">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13034">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13034">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 90 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(src_pixelmap, 90,
    &des_pixelmap,
    &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13051">Centrar el rectángulo dentro de otro rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13051">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13052">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13052">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *within_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13053">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13053">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13054">Este servicio centra el rectángulo dentro de otro rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13054">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13055">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13056">**rectangle**: rectángulo que se va a centrar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13056">**rectangle**: Rectangle to center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13057">**within_rectangle**: rectángulo en el que se va a centrar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13057">**within_rectangle**: Rectangle to center within</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13058">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13058">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13059">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Centrado correcto del rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully centered the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de rectángulo de entrada no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de rectángulo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13062">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13062">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13063">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13063">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13064">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13064">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Center “my_inner_rectangle” inside of “my_outer_rectangle”.*/
status = gx_utility_rectangle_center(&my_inner_rectangle,
    &my_outer_rectangle);

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_inner_rectangle” is centered
within “my_other_rectangle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13081">Buscar centro del rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13081">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13082">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13082">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13083">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13083">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13084">Este servicio busca el centro del rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13084">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13085">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13085">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13086">**rectangle**: rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13086">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13087">**return_center**: puntero al punto central.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13087">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13088">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13088">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13089">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Localización correcta del centro del rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13089">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de entrada no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de rectángulo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13092">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13092">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13093">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13093">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13094">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13094">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13111">Combinar dos rectángulos en el primero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13111">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13112">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13113">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13114">Este servicio combina el primer y el segundo rectángulo en el primer rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13114">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13115">El primer rectángulo se expande para incluir el segundo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13115">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13116">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13116">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13117">**first_rectangle**: primer rectángulo y rectángulo combinado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13117">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13118">**second_rectangle**: segundo rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13118">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13119">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13119">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13120">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Combinación correcta de dos rectángulos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de entrada no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13123">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13123">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13124">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13124">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13141">Comparar dos rectángulos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13141">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13142">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13142">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13143">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13143">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13144">Este servicio compara el primer y segundo rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13144">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13145">Si son iguales, se devuelve un valor de GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13145">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13146">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13146">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13147">**first_rectangle**: primer rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13147">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13148">**second_rectangle**: segundo rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13148">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13149">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13149">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13150">**result**: GX_TRUE si los rectángulos son iguales; de lo contrario, se devuelve GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13150">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13151">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13151">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13152">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13152">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13153">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13153">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13170">Definir un rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13170">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13171">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13171">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13172">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13172">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13173">Este servicio define un rectángulo tal y como se especifique.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13173">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13174">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13175">**rectangle**: bloque de control de rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13175">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13176">**left**: coordenada más a la izquierda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13176">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13177">**top**: coordenada superior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13177">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13178">**right**: coordenada más a la derecha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13178">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13179">**bottom**: coordenada inferior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13179">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13180">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13180">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13181">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definición correcta de un rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13181">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de rectángulo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13183">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13184">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13184">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13185">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13185">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13202">Detectar superposición de rectángulos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13202">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13203">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13204">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13205">Este servicio detecta cualquier superposición de los rectángulos proporcionados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13205">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13206">Si se encuentra una superposición, el servicio devuelve GX_TRUE y el rectángulo superpuesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13206">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13207">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13207">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13208">**first_rectangle**: primer rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13208">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13209">**second_rectangle**: segundo rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13209">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13210">**return_overlap_area**: área del rectángulo superpuesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13210">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13211">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13211">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13212">**result**: GX_TRUE si los rectángulos se superponen; de lo contrario GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13212">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13213">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13213">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13214">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13214">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13215">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13215">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13232">Detectar si un punto reside en el rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13232">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13233">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13234">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13235">Este servicio detecta si el punto especificado reside en el rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13235">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13236">Si el punto reside en el rectángulo, el servicio devuelve GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13236">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13237">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13237">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13238">**rectangle**: rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13238">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13239">**point**: punto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13239">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13240">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13241">**result**: GX_TRUE si el punto reside en el rectángulo; de lo contrario GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13241">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13242">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13243">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13243">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13244">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13244">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13261">Aumentar rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13261">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13262">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13262">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13263">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13263">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13264">Este servicio aumenta el tamaño del rectángulo según lo especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13264">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13265">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13266">**rectangle**: puntero a rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13266">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13267">**adjust**: cantidad por la que se va a ajustar el rectángulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13267">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13268">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13269">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cambio de tamaño correcto del rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de rectángulo de entrada no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13271">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13272">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13272">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13273">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13273">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_resize(&my_rectangle, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13289">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13289">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13290">Desplazar rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13290">Shift rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13291">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_shift(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13292">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13293">Este servicio desplaza el rectángulo por los valores especificados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13293">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13294">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13295">**rectangle**: rectángulo que se va a desplazar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13295">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13296">**x_shift**: número de píxeles que se van a desplazar en el eje X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13296">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13297">**x_shift**: número de píxeles que se van a desplazar en el eje Y.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13297">**y_shift**: Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13298">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13298">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13299">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del rectángulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully shifted the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13300">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de rectángulo de entrada no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13301">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13301">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13302">All</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13302">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13303">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13303">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Shift “my_rectangle”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_shift(&my_rectangle, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13320">Representar una cadena en un mapa de píxeles de tipo mapa alfa de 8 bpp (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13320">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13321">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13322">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13323">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13323">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13324">Este servicio representa una cadena de texto en un mapa alfa, que es una forma especial de mapa de píxeles de 8 bpp que contiene solo valores alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13324">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13325">Este servicio se suele usar junto con gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate y gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw para dibujar texto girado en el lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13325">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13326">Este servicio calcula el tamaño de memoria necesario para el mapa alfa resultante e invoca la función gx_system_memory_allocator() definida por la aplicación para asignar memoria de forma dinámica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13326">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13327">La aplicación debe llamar a gx_system_memory_allocator_set() en algún momento, normalmente durante el inicio del programa, antes de usar este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13327">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13328">Si una cadena de texto se va a girar y dibujarse en el lienzo una sola vez, se proporciona el servicio gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() como alternativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13328">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13329">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() llamará a gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate() y gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() para representar el texto girado en una operación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13329">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13330">Sin embargo, si el mismo texto se va a dibujar varias veces girado en distintos ángulos, es más eficaz crear el mapa alfa una vez con la API gx_utility_string_to_alphmap y, a continuación, girar el mapa alfa resultante varias veces según sea necesario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13330">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13335">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13337">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de entrada no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13337">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13338">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) No se ha definido la función de asignación o de liberación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13338">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13341">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13341">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13342">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13342">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13348">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13348">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13349">Este servicio representa una cadena de texto en un mapa alfa, que es una forma especial de mapa de píxeles de 8 bpp que contiene solo valores alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13349">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13350">Este servicio se suele usar junto con gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate y gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw para dibujar texto girado en el lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13350">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13351">Este servicio calcula el tamaño de memoria necesario para el mapa alfa resultante e invoca la función gx_system_memory_allocator() definida por la aplicación para asignar memoria de forma dinámica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13351">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13352">La aplicación debe llamar a gx_system_memory_allocator_set() en algún momento, normalmente durante el inicio del programa, antes de usar este servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13352">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13353">Si una cadena de texto se va a girar y dibujarse en el lienzo una sola vez, se proporciona el servicio gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() como alternativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13353">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13354">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() llamará a gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate() y gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() para representar el texto girado en una operación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13354">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13355">Sin embargo, si el mismo texto se va a dibujar varias veces girado en distintos ángulos, es más eficaz crear el mapa alfa una vez con la API gx_utility_string_to_alphmap y, a continuación, girar el mapa alfa resultante varias veces según sea necesario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13355">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

```C
/* render string to alphamap once */

    &xpos, &ypos);

    &xpos, &ypos);

```

### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13408">Crear lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13408">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13409">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13410">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13411">Este servicio crea una lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13411">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13412">GX_TREE_LIST se deriva de GX_WINDOW y admite todos los servicios de API gx_window.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13413">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13414">**vertical_list**: bloque de control de widget de lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13414">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13415">**name**: nombre de la lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13415">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13416">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13416">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13417">**total_rows**: número total de filas en la lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13417">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13418">**callback**: función a la que llamará la lista vertical al desplazar la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13418">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13419">El autor de la llamada debe crear inicialmente suficientes elementos secundarios basados en GX_WIDGET para rellenar las filas de la lista visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13419">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13420">A medida que se desplaza la lista, se llama a esta función para volver a crear la lista de elementos secundarios correspondiente al índice de la lista proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13420">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13421">**style**: estilo del widget de barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13421">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13422">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13422">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13423">**vertical_list_id**: id. definido por la aplicación de la lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13423">**vertical_list_id** Application-defined ID of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13424">**size**: dimensiones de la lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13424">**size** Dimensions of vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13425">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13425">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta de la lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13427">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13427">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13428">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13428">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13429">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13429">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13430">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13430">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13431">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Número de filas no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13431">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of rows not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13432">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13432">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13433">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13433">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13434">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13434">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13435">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13435">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical list “my_list” with 20 rows. */
status = gx_vertical_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
                    20, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID,
                    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical list “my_list” has been created. */
```

### <a name="get-selected-index-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13494">Obtener el índice seleccionado de la lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13494">Get selected index from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13495">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13495">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_index_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT *return_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13496">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13496">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13498">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13498">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13499">**vertical_list**: bloque de control de widget de lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13499">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13503">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13503">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13504">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13504">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13505">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13506">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13507">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13507">Example</span></span>

```C
INT current_selected_index;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_index_get(&my_list, &current_selected_index);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_index” contains the index of the selected list item. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13516">gx_vertical_list_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13516">gx_vertical_list_selected_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-selected-entry-in-a-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13517">Asignar la entrada seleccionada en una lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13517">Assign the selected entry in a vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13518">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_set(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13519">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13520">Este servicio asigna la entrada seleccionada en una lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13520">This service assigns the selected entry in a vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13521">Si es necesario, la lista vertical se desplazará para que la entrada seleccionada esté visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13521">If necessary, the vertical list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13522">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13522">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13523">**vertical_list**: bloque de control de widget de lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13523">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13524">**index**: posición basada en índice de la nueva entrada de lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13524">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13525">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13525">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13526">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto de la entrada de la lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13526">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13527">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) No se encontró el índice de entrada en la lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13527">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Input index not found in list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13528">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13528">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13529">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13529">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13530">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget de lista vertical o de entrada de lista no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13530">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Vertical list or list entry widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13531">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13531">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13532">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13532">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13533">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13533">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_set(&my_list, 12);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13542">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13542">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-selected-widget-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13543">Obtener el widget seleccionado de la lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13543">Get selected widget from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13544">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13544">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13545">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13545">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13546">Este servicio devuelve el widget seleccionado de la lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13546">This service returns the selected widget of the vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13547">Tenga en cuenta que si la lista contiene más filas que widgets secundarios y el widget secundario seleccionado se ha desplazado de la vista, esta función devolverá GX_NULL como el puntero GX_WIDGET, ya que el widget se ha vuelto a usar para mostrar una nueva entrada de lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13547">Note that if the list contains more rows than child widgets, and the selected child widget has been scrolled from view, this function will return GX_NULL as the GX_WIDGET pointer, since the widget has been reused to display a new list entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13548">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13548">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13549">**vertical_list**: bloque de control de widget de lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13549">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13550">**return_list_entry**: destino del widget de entrada de lista de devoluciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13550">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13551">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13551">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13552">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta de la entrada de la lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13552">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully get the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13553">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) El widget seleccionado se ha desplazado de la vista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13553">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) The selected widget has been scrolled from view.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13555">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13555">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13556">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13556">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13557">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13557">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13558">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13558">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *current_selected_widget;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_selected_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13609">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13609">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

```C
                          “my_vertical_scrollbar”,
                          &my_parent, &scrollbar_appearance,
                          GX_STYLE_ENABLED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13619">gx_widget_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13619">gx_widget_allocate</span></span>
### <a name="allocate-a-widget-control-block"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13620">Asignar un bloque de control de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13620">Allocate a widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13621">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_allocate(
    GX_WIDGET **control_block,
    ULONG memsize);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13622">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13623">Este servicio asigna dinámicamente un bloque de control de widget mediante una llamada a la función de asignación de memoria definida por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13623">This service dynamically allocates a widget control block, by calling the application defined memory allocation function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13624">Este servicio se usa sobre todo en las funciones generadas por GUIX Studio para asignar dinámicamente un bloque de control cuando se selecciona la propiedad de "asignación dinámica" en la vista de propiedades de GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13624">This service is primarily used by the functions generated by GUIX Studio to dynamically allocate control block when the “Dynamic Allocation” property is selected in the GUIX Studio properties view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13625">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13626">**control_block**: puntero al puntero de bloque de control devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13626">**control_block** Pointer to returned control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13627">**memsize**: tamaño de bloque de control, en bytes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13627">**memsize** Control block size, in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13628">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Asignación correcta del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget allocate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13630">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) El asignador de memoria no está definido o se ha producido un error de asignación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13630">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13632">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Tamaño de memoria no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13632">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Memory size not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13633">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13633">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13634">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13634">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13635">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13635">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button;

/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_allocate(&button, sizeof(GX_TEXT_BUTTON));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the button widget control block is allocated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13673">gx_widget_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13673">gx_widget_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13674">Asociar widget a su elemento primario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13674">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13675">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13675">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13676">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13677">Este servicio asocia el widget al elemento primario especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13677">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13678">Si el widget ya está asociado a otro elemento primario, se desasocia primero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13678">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13679">Si el widget ya está asociado al mismo elemento primario, la función no hace nada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13679">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13680">El widget se convierte en el elemento secundario en la parte más delantera del elemento primario en términos de orden Z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13680">The widget becomes the front-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13681">Si hay widgets del mismo nivel que se superponen, este widget se dibuja sobre los elementos del mismo nivel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13681">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn on top of siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13682">Para colocar el nuevo widget en la parte posterior del orden Z, use gx_widget_back_attach o gx_widget_back_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13682">To put the new widget in the back of the z-order, use gx_widget_back_attach or gx_widget_back_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13683">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13683">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13684">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13684">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13685">**widget**: puntero a widget secundario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13685">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13686">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13686">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13687">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Asociación correcta del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13687">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13688">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13688">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13690">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Elemento primario o widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13690">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13691">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13691">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13692">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13692">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13693">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13693">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13731">gx_widget_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13731">gx_widget_background_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-a-widget-background"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13732">Dibujar un fondo de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13732">Draw a widget background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13733">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13733">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_background_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13734">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13735">Este servicio realiza un relleno de color sólido de un fondo de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13735">This service performs a solid color fill of a widget background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13736">La función gx_widget_draw llama a este servicio automáticamente, pero también lo puede invocar la aplicación como parte de una función de dibujo de widget personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13736">This service is automatically called by the gx_widget_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized widget drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13737">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13737">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13738">**widget**: puntero al widget que se va a dibujar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13738">**widget** Pointer to widget to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13739">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13739">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13740">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13740">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13741">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13741">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13742">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13742">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13743">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13743">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
    /* Call default widget background draw. */
    gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```
