## <a name="gx_widget_back_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13781">gx_widget_back_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13781">gx_widget_back_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13782">Asociar widget a su elemento primario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13782">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13783">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13783">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13784">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13784">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13785">Este servicio asocia el widget al elemento primario especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13785">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13786">Si el widget ya está asociado a otro elemento primario, se desasocia primero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13786">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13787">Si el widget ya está asociado al mismo elemento primario, la función no hace nada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13787">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13788">El widget se convierte en el elemento secundario en la parte más posterior del elemento primario en términos de orden Z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13788">The widget becomes the back-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13789">Si hay widgets del mismo nivel que se superponen, este widget se dibuja detrás de estos elementos del mismo nivel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13789">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn behind those siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13790">Para colocar el nuevo widget en la parte delantera del orden Z, use gx_widget_attach o gx_widget_front_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13790">To put the new widget in the front of the z-order, use gx_widget_attach or gx_widget_front_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13791">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13791">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13792">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13792">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13793">**widget**: puntero a widget secundario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13793">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13794">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13795">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Asociación correcta del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13795">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13796">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13796">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Elemento primario o widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13799">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13799">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13800">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13800">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13801">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13801">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_back_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13839">gx_widget_back_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13839">gx_widget_back_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-back"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13840">Mover widget a la parte posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13840">Move widget to back</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13841">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_widget_moved);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13842">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13843">Este servicio mueve el widget a la parte posterior en el orden Z de los widgets secundarios del elemento primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13843">This service moves the widget to the back in the parent's Z-order of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13844">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13845">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13845">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13846">**return_widget_moved**: puntero al destino para marcar que se ha movido el widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13846">**return_widget_moved** Pointer to destination for flag indicating the widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13847">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Movimiento correcto del widget a la parte posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13849">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13849">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13850">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13850">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13851">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) No se aplican cambios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13851">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) No changes are applied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13852">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13852">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13853">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13853">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13854">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13854">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13855">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13855">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move “my_widget” to the back. */
status = gx_widget_back_move(&my_widget, &moved_flag);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “moved_flag” is GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” was moved to the back. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13892">gx_widget_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13892">gx_widget_block_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-a-rectangular-block-of-pixels"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13893">Mover un bloque rectangular de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13893">Move a rectangular block of pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13894">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13894">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_block_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    INT xshift, INT yshift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13895">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13895">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13896">Este servicio mueve un bloque rectangular de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13896">This service moves a rectangular block of pixels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13897">Este servicio se usa con frecuencia para implementar el desplazamiento rápido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13897">This service is most often used to implement fast scrolling.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13898">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13898">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13899">**widget**: puntero al widget que solicita el movimiento del bloque.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13899">**widget** Pointer to widget requesting block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13900">**block**: bloque de límite del rectángulo que se va a desplazar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13900">**block** Rectangle bounding block to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13901">**xshift**: la cantidad de desplazamiento X en píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13901">**xshift** The x shift amount in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13902">**yshift**: la cantidad de desplazamiento Y en píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13902">**yshift** The y shift amount in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13903">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13903">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Movimiento correcto del widget a la parte posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13905">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo de widget no encontrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13905">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13908">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13908">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13909">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13910">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13910">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13911">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13911">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move a block of pixels 20 pixels to the right. */
status = gx_widget_block_move(&my_widget, &size, 20, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the block of pixels was moved. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13948">gx_widget_border_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13948">gx_widget_border_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13949">Dibujar borde de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13949">Draw widget border</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13950">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13950">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_border_draw(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_COLOR border_color,
    GX_COLOR upper_fill, 
    GX_COLOR lower_fill, 
    GX_BOOL fill);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13951">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13951">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13952">Este servicio dibuja el borde del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13952">This service draws the widget border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13953">Este servicio se invoca normalmente como parte de una función de dibujo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13953">This service is normally invoked as part of a widget drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13954">Este servicio interpreta las marcas de estilo del borde del widget para no dibujar ningún borde o dibujar un borde fino, un borde elevado, un borde empotrado o un borde grueso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13954">This service interprets the widget border style flags to draw no border, a thin border, a raised border, a recessed border, or a thick border.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13955">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13955">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13956">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13956">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13957">**border_color**: color del borde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13957">**border_color** Color of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13958">El **apéndice A** contiene los colores predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13958">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13959">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13959">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13960">**upper_fill**: color de relleno superior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13960">**upper_fill** Color of upper fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13961">El **apéndice A** contiene los colores predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13961">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13962">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13962">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13963">**lower_fill**: color de relleno inferior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13963">**lower_fill** Color of lower fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13964">El **apéndice A** contiene los colores predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13964">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13965">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13965">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13966">**fill**: esta marca booleana indica si el área del widget se debe rellenar con los colores de relleno proporcionados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13966">**fill** This boolean flag indicates whether or not the widget area should be filled with the supplied fill colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13967">Si este valor es GX_FALSE, solo se dibuja el borde del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13967">If this value is GX_FALSE, only the widget border is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13968">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13968">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-13969">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13969">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13970">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13970">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-13971">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13971">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-13972">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-13972">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
      /* Call widget border draw. */
      gx_widget_border_draw(widget, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                            GX_COLOR_GREEN, GX_COLOR_BLUE,
                            GX_TRUE);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */

      /* Draw child widgets. */
      Gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14009">gx_widget_border_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14009">gx_widget_border_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-border-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14010">Establecer estilo de borde de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14010">Set widget border style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14011">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14011">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14012">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14013">Este servicio establece el estilo de borde del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14013">This service sets the widget border style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14014">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14014">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14015">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14015">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14016">**style**: estilo del borde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14016">**style** Style of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14017">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14017">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14018">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14019">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del estilo del borde de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14019">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget border style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14022">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14022">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14023">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14023">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14024">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14024">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14025">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set border style of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_style_set(&my_widget,
                                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” border style has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14062">gx_widget_border_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14062">gx_widget_border_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-border-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14063">Obtener ancho de borde de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14063">Get widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14064">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14064">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14065">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14065">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14066">Este servicio obtiene el ancho del borde del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14066">This service gets the widget border width.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14067">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14068">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14068">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14069">**return_width**: puntero al destino del ancho del borde del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14069">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14070">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14070">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta del ancho del borde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved border width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14072">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14072">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14073">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14073">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14074">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14074">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14075">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14075">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14076">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14076">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_width;

/* Get border width of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_width_get(&my_widget, &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_width” contains the border width of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_canvas_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14113">gx_widget_canvas_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14113">gx_widget_canvas_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14114">Obtener lienzo de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14114">Get widget canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14115">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14115">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_canvas_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_CANVAS **return_canvas)
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14116">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14117">Este servicio devuelve un puntero al lienzo en el que se representa este widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14117">This service returns a pointer to the canvas onto which this widget is rendered.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14118">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14118">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14119">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14119">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14120">**return_canvas**: puntero al destino del lienzo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14120">**return_canvas** Pointer to destination for widget’s canvas</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14121">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del lienzo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget canvas get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14123">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) No se encontró el lienzo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14123">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14125">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14125">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14126">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14126">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14127">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14127">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14128">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14128">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get canvas associated with “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_canvas_get(&my_widget, &my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_canvas” contains the canvas of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

### <a name="detect-widget-child"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14167">Detectar elemento secundario de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14167">Detect widget child</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14168">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14168">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *child,
    GX_BOOL *return_detect);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14169">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14170">Este servicio detecta si el widget es un elemento secundario del widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14170">This service detects if the widget is a child of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14171">Este servicio se anida para buscar elementos secundarios de elementos secundarios y devuelve TRUE si el widget primario está en cualquier nivel de un antecesor del widget secundario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14171">This service nests to search children of children, and returns TRUE if the parent widget is at any level an ancestor of the child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14172">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14173">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14173">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14174">**child**: puntero a widget secundario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14174">**child** Pointer to child widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14175">**return_detect**: puntero al destino para la detección.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14175">**return_detect** Pointer to destination for detection</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14176">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14176">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Detección correcta del elemento secundario del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget child detection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario o secundario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or child widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14180">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14181">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14181">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14182">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14182">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL detected;

/* Determine if “my_child” is a child of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_child_detect(&my_widget, &my_child, &detected);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “detected” is GX_TRUE, “my_child” is a child of widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_children_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14219">gx_widget_children_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14219">gx_widget_children_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-children"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14220">Dibujar elementos secundarios del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14220">Draw widget children</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14221">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_children_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14222">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14223">Este servicio dibuja todos los elementos secundarios del widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14223">This service draws all children of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14224">Este servicio se invoca normalmente por todas las funciones de dibujo de widgets estándar para dibujar cualquier widget secundario existente y debe invocarse por cualquier función de dibujo personalizada para permitir que los widgets secundarios se asocien al tipo de widget primario personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14224">This service is normally invoked by all standard widget drawing functions to draw any existing child widgets, and should be invoked by any custom drawing functions to allow child widgets to be attached to your custom parent widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14225">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14225">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14226">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14226">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14227">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14228">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14228">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14229">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14229">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14230">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14230">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14231">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14231">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
        /* Call default widget background draw. */
        gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

        /* Add your own drawing here. */

        /* Draw child widgets. */
        gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_client_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14268">gx_widget_client_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14268">gx_widget_client_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-client-area"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14269">Obtener área de cliente de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14269">Get widget client area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14270">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14270">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_client_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE border_width,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_client_area);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14271">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14271">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14272">Este servicio calcula el área cliente del widget restando el ancho del borde del widget del tamaño total del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14272">This service computes the client area of widget by subtracting the widget border width from the overall widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14273">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14273">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14274">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14274">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14275">**border_width**: ancho del borde del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14275">**border_width** Width of widget border</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14276">**return_client_area**: destino para devolver el área cliente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14276">**return_client_area** Destination for returning client area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14277">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14278">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del área cliente del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14278">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget client area get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14279">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14279">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14280">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14280">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14281">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Borde de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14281">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget border not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14321">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14321">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14322">Obtener color</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14322">Get color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14323">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14323">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_color_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14324">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14324">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14325">Este servicio obtiene el color asociado al id. de recurso proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14325">This service gets the color associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14326">Este servicio solo debe llamarse por widgets visibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14326">This service should only be called by visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14327">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14328">**widget**: puntero al bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14328">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14329">**resource_id**: id. de recurso del color.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14329">**resource_id** Resource ID of color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14330">En el **apéndice B** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14330">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14331">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14331">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14332">**return_color**: puntero al destino del color.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14332">**return_color** Pointer to destination for color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14333">El **apéndice A** contiene los colores predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14333">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14334">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14334">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14335">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del color</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14337">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14337">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14338">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo de widget no válido o el widget es invisible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14338">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14339">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14339">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14340">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14340">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14341">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14341">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14342">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14342">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14343">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14343">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR actual_color;

/* Get color for resource ID MY_FIRST_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_widget_color_get(my_widget, MY_FIRST_COLOR_RESOURCE_ID,
                            &actual_color);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the actual color is contained in “actual_color”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14347">gx_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14347">gx_widget_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14348">Crear widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14348">Create widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14349">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14349">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_create(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14350">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14350">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14351">Este servicio crea un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14351">This service creates a widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14352">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14352">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14353">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14353">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14354">**name**: nombre lógico del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14354">**name** Logical name of widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14355">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14355">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14356">**style**: estilo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14356">**style** Style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14357">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14357">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14358">**widget_id**: id. definido por la aplicación del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14358">**widget_id** Application-defined ID of the widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14359">**size**: tamaño del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14359">**size** Size of the widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14360">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Creación correcta del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14364">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14364">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14365">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14365">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14366">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget primario no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14366">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14367">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14368">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14368">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14369">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14369">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET my_widget;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_create(&my_widget, "my widget",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_WIDGET_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_created_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14406">gx_widget_created_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14406">gx_widget_created_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-if-widget-created"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14407">Probar si se ha creado el widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14407">Test if widget created</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14408">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14408">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_created_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14409">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14410">Este servicio realiza una prueba para determinar si el widget se ha creado anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14410">This service tests to determine if the widget has previously been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14411">Si no se encuentra ningún error, esta función devuelve GX_SUCCESS, independientemente de si el widget ya se ha creado o no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14411">If no errors are encountered, this function return GX_SUCCESS, regardless if the widget is created yet or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14412">El resultado de la prueba está en el puntero return_test.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14412">The result of the test is in the return_test pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14413">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14414">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14414">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14415">**return_test**: destino del resultado de la prueba.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14415">**return_test** Destination for test result</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14416">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00): Finalización correcta de la prueba</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful test completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14418">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14418">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14419">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14419">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14420">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14420">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14421">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14421">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL was_created;

/* Test to see if widget “my_widget” is created. */
status = gx_widget_created_test(&my_widget, &was_created);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, no error occurred. If “was_created” is
GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14458">gx_widget_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14458">gx_widget_delete</span></span>
### <a name="delete-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14459">Eliminar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14459">Delete widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14460">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_delete(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14461">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14462">Este servicio elimina el widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14462">This service deletes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14463">Si el bloque de control de widget se asigna dinámicamente, se invoca el servicio gx_system_memory_free para liberar el almacenamiento asignado dinámicamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14463">If the widget control block is dynamically allocated, the gx_system_memory_free service is invoked to free dynamically allocated storage.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14464">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14465">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14465">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14466">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14466">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14467">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Eliminación correcta del widget GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14467">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget delete GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14469">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14469">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14470">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) No se ha definido la función de liberación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14470">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14471">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14471">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14472">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14472">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14473">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14473">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_delete(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14510">gx_widget_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14510">gx_widget_detach</span></span>
### <a name="detach-widget-from-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14511">Desasociar widget de elemento primario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14511">Detach widget from parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14512">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14512">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_detach(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14513">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14514">Este servicio desasocia el widget de su elemento primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14514">This service detaches the widget from its parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14515">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14516">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14516">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14517">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desasociación correcta del widget GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget detach GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14519">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14519">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14520">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14520">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14521">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14521">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14522">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14522">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14523">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14523">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detach widget “my_widget” from its parent. */
status = gx_widget_detach(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been detached. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14560">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14560">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14561">Dibujar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14561">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14562">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14562">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14563">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14563">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14564">Este servicio dibuja el widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14564">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14565">Normalmente, el mecanismo de actualización del lienzo de GUIX llama a esta función internamente, pero se expone a la aplicación para ayudarle a implementar las funciones de dibujo personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14565">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14566">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14566">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14567">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14567">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14568">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14569">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14569">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14570">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14570">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14571">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14571">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14572">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14572">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14609">vgx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14610">Asignar la función de dibujo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14610">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14611">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14611">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14612">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14612">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14613">Este servicio invalida la función de dibujo predeterminada del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14613">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14614">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14615">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14615">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14616">**drawing_function**: puntero a la función de dibujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14616">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14617">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Invalidación correcta de la función de dibujo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14623">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14624">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14662">Generar evento de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14662">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14663">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14664">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14665">Este servicio genera un tipo de evento GX_SIGNAL, que es un tipo o una clase de GX_EVENT concretos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14665">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14666">gx_widget_event_generate() codifica el id. del widget de 16 bits, junto con el objeto event_type pasado, en un solo valor GX_EVENT.gx_event_type de 32 bits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14666">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14667">El parámetro de valor se codifica en el campo generado gx_event.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14667">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14668">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14668">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14669">El campo generado event.gx_event_target siempre se carga con el elemento primario del widget que realiza la llamada, lo que significa que el evento generado siempre se envía primero al elemento primario del widget que lo genera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14669">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14670">Tenga en cuenta que gx_widget_event_generate solo se debe usar para enviar tipos de eventos de intervalo GX_SIGNAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14670">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14671">Para todos los demás tipos de eventos, incluidos los tipos de eventos definidos por el usuario, use la API gx_system_event_send(), que concede control total sobre cada campo del evento insertado en la cola de eventos de GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14671">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14672">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14672">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14673">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14673">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14674">**event_type**: tipo de evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14674">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14675">El **apéndice E** contiene eventos predefinidos de GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14675">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14676">La aplicación puede agregar eventos adicionales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14676">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14677">**value**: información adicional sobre eventos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14677">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14678">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14678">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Generación correcta de evento de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14682">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14682">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14683">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14683">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14684">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14684">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14685">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14685">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Generate a redraw event for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_generate(&my_widget, GX_EVENT_REDRAW, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the redraw event for widget “my_widget” has been generated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14724">Procesar evento de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14724">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14725">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14726">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14727">Esta es la función de procesamiento de eventos predeterminada para todos los widgets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14727">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14728">Cuando se escribe una función de procesamiento de eventos personalizada, la acción predeterminada para cualquier tipo de evento siempre debe ser pasar el evento al tipo de widget en el que se basa un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14728">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14729">Los widgets que se basan en el tipo más básico GX_WIDGET usan gx_widget_event_process como su función de procesamiento de eventos predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14729">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14730">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14731">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14731">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14732">**event**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14732">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14733">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14733">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Procesamiento correcto de evento de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14737">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14737">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14738">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14739">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14739">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14740">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Process event “my_event” for widget “my_widget”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event “my_event” for widget “my_widget” has been processed. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14778">Establecer función de procesamiento de eventos de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14778">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14779">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14779">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14780">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14780">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14781">Este servicio invalida la función de procesamiento de eventos del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14781">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14782">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14782">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14783">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14783">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14784">**event_processing**: puntero a la nueva función de procesamiento de eventos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14784">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14785">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14785">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Invalidación correcta del procesamiento de eventos del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14789">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14789">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14790">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14790">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14791">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14791">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_to_parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14828">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14828">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span></span>
### <a name="send-event-to-widgets-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14829">Enviar evento al elemento primario de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14829">Send event to widget’s parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14830">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14831">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14832">Este servicio envía un evento al elemento primario del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14832">This service sends an event to the widget’s parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14833">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14834">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14834">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14835">**event**: puntero al evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14835">**event** Pointer to the event</span></span>
