## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14880">Establecer color de fondo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14880">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14881">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14881">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14882">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14882">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14883">Este servicio establece los colores de fondo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14883">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14884">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14884">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14885">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14885">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14886">**normal_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno en estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14886">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14887">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14887">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14888">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14888">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14889">**selected_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno cuando el widget obtiene el foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14889">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14890">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14890">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14891">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14891">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14892">**disabled_text_color_id**: id. de recurso del color de relleno cuando no se establece el estilo GX_STYLE_ENABLED.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14892">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14893">En el **apéndice A** se incluyen los id. de recursos de color predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14893">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14894">Tenga en cuenta que la aplicación también puede agregar id. de recursos de colores personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14894">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14895">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14895">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del color de relleno del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14899">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14899">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14900">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14901">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14901">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14902">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14902">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set background of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_fill_color_set(&my_widget,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” background has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14939">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14939">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14940">Buscar widget secundario del widget primario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14940">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14941">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14941">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14942">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14942">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14943">Este servicio busca en los elementos secundarios del elemento primario especificado un widget con el valor de id. solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14943">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14944">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14944">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14945">**parent**: puntero al widget primario desde el que se inicia la búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14945">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14946">**widget_id**: id. de widget que se va a buscar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14946">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14947">**search_depth**: define el nivel de anidamiento recursivo en el que la función buscará los widgets secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14947">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14948">Si este valor es <= 0, solo se busca en los elementos secundarios inmediatos del widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14948">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14949">Si este valor es GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, se busca exhaustivamente en todos los elementos secundarios de todos los widgets secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14949">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14950">En el caso de cualquier otro valor > 0, este valor limita la profundidad de anidamiento de la búsqueda del id. de widget solicitado que esta función realizará a través de los widgets secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14950">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14951">**return_widget**: puntero al destino del widget encontrado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14951">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14952">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14952">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Localización correcta del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14954">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget no encontrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14954">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14955">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14955">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-14956">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14956">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14957">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-14958">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14958">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14959">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14959">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14997">Devolver el puntero al primer widget secundario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14997">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14998">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-14999">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-14999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15000">GUIX mantiene una lista estructurada de árbol de widgets primarios y secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15000">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15001">Este servicio devuelve un puntero al primer widget secundario del elemento primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15001">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15002">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15003">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15003">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15004">**widget_return**: puntero al puntero del widget devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15004">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15005">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Se ha devuelto el puntero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15009">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15009">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15010">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15010">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15011">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15011">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15015">gx_widget_parent_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15015">gx_widget_parent_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15016">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15016">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15017">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15017">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-next-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15019">Mover el foco al siguiente widget en el orden de navegación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15019">Move focus to next widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15020">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_next(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15021">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15021">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15022">Este servicio mueve el foco al siguiente widget del mismo nivel en la lista vinculada de widgets que aceptan el foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15022">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15023">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15023">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15024">**widget**: puntero al bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15024">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15025">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15025">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15026">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Se ha movido el foco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15026">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15027">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) No se ha movido el foco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15027">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15031">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15032">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15033">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15033">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15034">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15034">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_previous"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15036">gx_widget_focus_previous</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15036">gx_widget_focus_previous</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-previous-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15037">Mover el foco al widget anterior en el orden de navegación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15037">Move focus to previous widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15038">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15038">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_previous(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15039">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15039">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15040">Este servicio mueve el foco al widget anterior en el orden de navegación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15040">This service moves focus to the previous widget in the navigation order.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15041">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15041">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15043">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15043">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15044">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Se ha movido el foco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15044">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15045">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) No se ha movido el foco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15045">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15046">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15046">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15047">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15047">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15048">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15048">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to previuos widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_previous(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the input focus has been moved to the
previous widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15052">Obtener fuente para el id. de recurso especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15052">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15053">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15053">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15054">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15054">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15055">Este servicio recupera la fuente asociada al id. de recurso especificado de la tabla de fuentes de la pantalla en la que el widget está visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15055">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15056">Solo un widget visible debe llamar a esta función.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15056">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15057">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15058">**widget**: puntero al bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15058">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15059">**resource_id**: id. de recurso de la fuente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15059">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15060">**return_font**: puntero al destino del puntero de fuente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15060">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15061">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la fuente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15063">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15063">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo de widget no válido o el widget es invisible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15067">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15068">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15069">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15069">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15070">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15070">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15073">gx_widget_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15073">gx_widget_free</span></span>
### <a name="release-memory-associated-with-a-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15074">Liberar memoria asociada a un widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15074">Release memory associated with a widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15075">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15075">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15076">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15076">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15077">Este servicio libera la memoria asociada a un bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15077">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15078">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15079">**widget**: puntero al bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15079">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15080">**resource_id**: id. de recurso de la fuente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15080">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15081">**return_font**: puntero al destino del puntero de fuente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15081">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15082">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15082">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15083">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Liberación correcta del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15083">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15084">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) No se ha definido la función de liberación de memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15084">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15086">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15087">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15088">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15126">Mover widget al frente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15126">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15127">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15128">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15129">Este servicio mueve el widget al frente en la lista de orden Z de widgets secundarios del elemento primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15129">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15130">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15131">**widget**: puntero al widget que se va a mover.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15131">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15132">**return_moved**: puntero al destino de la indicación de que widget se ha movido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15132">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15133">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Movimiento correcto del widget a la parte frontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15136">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) El widget ya está delante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15136">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15138">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15138">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15139">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15139">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15140">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15140">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15141">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15141">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15178">gx_widget_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15178">gx_widget_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15179">Obtener alto de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15179">Get widget height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15180">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15181">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15182">Este servicio obtiene el alto del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15182">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15183">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15183">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15184">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15184">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15185">**return_height** Puntero al destino del alto del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15185">**return_height** Pointer to destination for widget height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15186">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15186">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15187">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del alto del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15187">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15189">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15189">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15190">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15190">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15191">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15191">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15192">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15192">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15193">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15193">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE widget_height;

/* Get height for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_height_get(&my_widget, &widget_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the height of the widget is contained in
“widget_height” . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15230">gx_widget_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15230">gx_widget_hide</span></span>
### <a name="hide-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15231">Ocultar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15231">Hide widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15232">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15232">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_hide(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15233">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15233">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15234">Este servicio oculta el widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15234">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15235">Este widget todavía está asociado a su elemento primario, pero no se puede dibujar en el lienzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15235">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15236">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15237">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15237">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15238">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15239">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ocultación correcta del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15239">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15240">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15240">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15241">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15241">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15242">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15242">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15243">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15243">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15244">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15244">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15245">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15245">Example</span></span>

```c

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is hidden. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15282">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15282">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15283">Devolver el puntero al último widget secundario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15283">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15284">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15284">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15285">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15285">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15286">GUIX mantiene una lista estructurada de árbol de widgets primarios y secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15286">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15287">Este servicio devuelve un puntero al último widget secundario del elemento primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15287">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15288">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15288">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15289">**parent**: puntero al widget primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15289">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15290">**widget_return**: puntero al puntero del widget devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15290">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15291">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15291">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15292">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Se ha devuelto el puntero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15292">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15295">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15295">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15296">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15296">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15297">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15297">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15348">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15348">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-pixelmap"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15349">Obtener mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15349">Get pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15350">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15350">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_pixelmap_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15351">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15351">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15352">Este servicio obtiene el mapa de píxeles asociado al id. de recurso proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15352">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15353">Este servicio solo debe llamarse para widgets visibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15353">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15354">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15355">**widget**: puntero al bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15355">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15356">**pixelmap_id**: id. de recurso del mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15356">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15357">**return_pixelmap**: puntero al puntero de destino del mapa de píxeles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15357">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15358">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15358">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del mapa de píxeles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15360">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Id. de recurso no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15360">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Lienzo de widget no válido o el widget es invisible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15364">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15364">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15365">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15365">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15366">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15366">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_PIXELMAP *my_pixelmap;

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_widget_pixelmap_get(widget, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID,
                                &my_pixelmap);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_pixelmap” contains the pixemap pointer. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15374">GUIX mantiene una lista estructurada de árbol de widgets primarios y secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15374">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15375">Este servicio devuelve un puntero al elemento del mismo nivel anterior del widget actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15375">This service returns a pointer to the previous sibling of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15376">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15376">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15377">**current**: puntero al widget actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15377">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15378">**widget_return**: puntero al puntero del widget devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15378">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15379">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15380">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Se ha devuelto el puntero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15380">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15381">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15381">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15382">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15382">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15383">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15383">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15384">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15384">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15385">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15385">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve previous sibling widget */

GX_WIDGET *get_previous(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *sibling;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_previous_sibling_get(current, &sibling);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
          return sibling;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15392">gx_widget_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15392">gx_widget_resize</span></span>
### <a name="resize-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15393">Cambiar tamaño de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15393">Resize widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15394">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15394">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_resize(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *new_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15395">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15395">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15396">Este servicio cambia el tamaño del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15396">This service resizes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15397">Si el widget está visible, se invalida automáticamente y se pone en cola para volverlo a dibujar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15397">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15398">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15398">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15399">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15399">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15400">**new_size**: nuevo tamaño del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15400">**new_size** New widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15401">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15401">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15402">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cambio de tamaño correcto del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15402">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15403">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15403">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15405">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15405">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15406">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15406">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15407">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15407">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15408">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15408">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE new_size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&new_size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Resize widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_resize(&my_widget, &new_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been resized. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15445">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15445">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15446">Desplazar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15446">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15447">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15447">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15448">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15448">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15449">Este servicio desplaza el widget y, opcionalmente, lo marca como con modificaciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15449">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15450">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15451">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15451">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15452">**x_shift**: número de píxeles que se van a desplazar en el eje X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15452">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15453">**y_shift**: número de píxeles que se van a desplazar en el eje Y.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15453">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE para indicar que se ha modificado; de lo contrario, GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15455">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del widget GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15457">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15457">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15458">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15458">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15459">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15459">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15460">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15460">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15461">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15461">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15498">gx_widget_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15498">gx_widget_show</span></span>
### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15499">Mostrar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15499">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15500">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15500">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15501">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15501">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15502">Este servicio muestra el widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15502">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15503">El widget solo estará visible si se asocia a un elemento primario y el widget primario también está visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15503">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15504">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15504">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15505">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15505">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15506">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15506">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15507">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Visualización correcta del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15507">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15508">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15508">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15509">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15509">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15510">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15510">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15511">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15511">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15512">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15512">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15513">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15513">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Show widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_show(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shown. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15551">Agregar estado de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15551">Add widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15552">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15553">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15554">Este servicio agrega cualquier combinación de marcas de estado al widget especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15554">This service adds any combination of status flags to the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15555">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15555">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15556">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15556">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15557">**status**: estado que se va a agregar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15557">**status** Status to add</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15558">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15558">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Adición correcta de estado del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15561">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15561">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15562">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15562">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15563">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15563">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15564">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15564">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add status to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_add(&my_widget, status_to_add);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was. */
```

### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15602">Obtener estado del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15602">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15603">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15604">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15605">Este servicio recupera las marcas de estado del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15605">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15606">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15606">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15607">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15607">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15608">**return_status**: puntero al estado que se devuelve.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15608">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15609">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del estado del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15613">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15614">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15614">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15615">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15615">Example</span></span>

```C
ULONT get_status;

/* Retrieve status flag from widget “my_widget”. */ status =
gx_widget_status_get(&my_widget, &get_status);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the status from widget “my_widget” is
saved to “get_status”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15652">Quitar estado de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15652">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15653">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15653">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15654">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15655">Este servicio quita las marcas de estado especificadas de la variable del estado interno de los widgets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15655">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15656">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15656">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15657">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15657">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15658">**status**: estado que se va a quitar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15658">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15659">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15659">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Eliminación correcta del estado del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status removal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15663">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15663">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15664">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15664">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15665">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15665">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_remove(&my_widget, status_to_remove);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the status flags are removed from the
widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15703">Probar estado de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15703">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15704">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15704">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15705">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15705">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15706">Este servicio prueba las marcas de estado del widget especificado y almacena el resultado en la memoria a la que apunta "return_test".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15706">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15707">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15708">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15708">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15709">**status**: estado que se va a probar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15709">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15710">**return_status**: puntero al destino del resultado de la prueba.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15710">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15711">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15711">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Prueba correcta del estado del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15715">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15715">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15727">Recuperar la cadena asociada a un widget visible y al id. de cadena (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15727">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15728">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15728">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15729">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15729">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15730">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15730">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15731">Este servicio devuelve la entrada de la tabla de cadenas para el valor de id. de cadena especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15731">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15732">Este servicio es similar a gx_display_string_get, salvo en que la pantalla activa se determina automáticamente en lugar de que la pase el autor de la llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15732">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15733">Este servicio solo se puede usar para widgets que están visibles, es decir, se conoce la pantalla asociada a este widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15733">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15734">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15735">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15735">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15736">**string_id**: valor de id. de cadena del encabezado de recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15736">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15737">**string**: dirección de la variable para devolver la cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15737">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15738">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15738">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15739">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Prueba correcta del estado del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15739">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15741">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15741">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15742">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15743">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15743">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */

      &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```
