## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15770">Agregar estilo de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15770">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15771">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15772">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15773">Este servicio agrega un estilo al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15773">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15774">Además, se realizan las siguientes acciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15774">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15775">Si el estilo agregado es GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, se agregará el estado GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15775">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15776">Si el estilo agregado es GX_STYLE_ENABLED, se agregará el estado GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15776">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15777">Si el widget está visible, se invalida automáticamente y se pone en cola para volverlo a dibujar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15777">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15778">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15778">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15779">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15779">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15780">**style**: nuevo estilo que se va a agregar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15780">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15781">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15781">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15782">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15782">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Adición correcta del estilo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15786">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15786">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15787">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15787">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15788">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15788">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15789">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15789">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15826">gx_widget_style_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15826">gx_widget_style_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15827">Obtener estilo de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15827">Get widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15828">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15828">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG *return_style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15829">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15830">Este servicio recupera la marca de estilo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15830">This service retrieves style flag from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15831">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15831">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15832">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15832">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15833">**return_style**: puntero al estilo que se devuelve.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15833">**return_style** Pointer to the style being returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15834">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15834">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15835">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Recuperación correcta del estilo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15835">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved widget style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15839">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15839">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15840">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15840">Initialization and threads</span></span>


### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15841">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15841">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve style from widget into “style”. */
status = gx_widget_style_get(&my_widget, &style);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style flag from widget is saved in “style”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15879">Quitar estilo de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15879">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15880">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15880">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15881">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15881">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15882">Este servicio quita un estilo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15882">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15883">Además, se realizan las siguientes acciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15883">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15884">Si el estilo quitado es GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, se quitará el estado GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15884">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15885">Si el estilo quitado es GX_STYLE_ENABLED, se quitará el estado GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15885">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15886">Si el widget está visible, se invalida automáticamente y se pone en cola para volverlo a dibujar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15886">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15887">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15887">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15888">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15888">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15889">**style**: estilo que se va a quitar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15889">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15890">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15890">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15891">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15891">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15892">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Eliminación correcta del estilo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15892">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15895">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15895">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15896">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15897">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15898">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15936">Establecer estilo de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15936">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15937">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15937">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15938">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15938">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15939">Este servicio establece un estilo en el widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15939">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15940">Si el estilo establecido incluye GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, se agregará el estado GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT; de lo contrario, se quitará.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15940">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15941">Si el estilo establecido incluye GX_STYLE_ENABLED, se agregará el estado GX_STATUS_ENABLED; de lo contrario, se quitará.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15941">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15942">Si el widget está visible, se invalida automáticamente y se pone en cola para volverlo a dibujar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15942">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15943">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15944">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15944">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15945">**style**: estilo que se va a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15945">**style** Style to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15946">El **apéndice D** contiene estilos generales predefinidos para todos los widgets, así como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15946">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15947">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15947">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15948">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del estilo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15948">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15949">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15949">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15950">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15950">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15951">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15951">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15952">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15952">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15953">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15953">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15954">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15954">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT to the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_set(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” style is set to GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_text_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15991">gx_widget_text_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15991">gx_widget_text_blend</span></span>
### <a name="blend-text-assigned-to-widget-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15992">Mezclar texto asignado al widget (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15992">Blend text assigned to widget (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15993">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15993">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_text_blend(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    UINT *tColor,
    UINT font_id, 
    GX_CHAR *string,
    INT x_offset, 
    INT y_offset, 
    UCHAR alpha)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15994">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15994">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15995">Este servicio ha quedado en desuso en favor de gx_widget_text_blend_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15995">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_text_blend_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-15996">Este servicio mezcla el texto especificado sobre un widget usando el pincel y la alineación del texto actuales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15996">This service blends the specified text over a widget using current brush and text alignment.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-15997">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15997">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15998">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15998">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-15999">**tColor**: color del texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-15999">**tColor** Text color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16000">**font_id**: id. de fuente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16000">**font_id** Font Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16001">**string**: cadena de dibujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16001">**string** Drawing string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16002">**x_offset**: ajuste de posición del dibujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16002">**x_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16003">**y_offset**: ajuste de posición del dibujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16003">**y_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16004">**alpha**: valor de mezcla de 0 a 255.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16004">**alpha** Blending value 0-255</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16005">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del ancho del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16007">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16007">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16009">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16009">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16010">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Longitud de cadena no válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16010">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16011">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16012">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16012">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16013">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16013">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Blend “my_string” over “my_widget” given alpha value 120. */
status = gx_widget_text_blend(&my_widget, my_text_color, my_font_id,
                              &my_string, xoffset, yoffset, 120);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_string” has been blend to “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_top_visible_child_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-visible-child-that-is-top-of-z-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16103">Devolver un puntero al elemento secundario visible en la parte superior del orden Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16103">Return pointer to visible child that is top of Z order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16104">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16105">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16106">GUIX mantiene una lista estructurada de árbol de widgets primarios y secundarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16106">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16107">Este servicio devuelve un puntero al elemento secundario visible en la parte superior del widget actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16107">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16108">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16109">**current**: puntero al widget actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16109">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16110">**widget_return**: puntero al puntero del widget devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16110">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16111">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Se ha devuelto el puntero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16115">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16116">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16116">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16117">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16175">gx_widget_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16175">gx_widget_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16176">Obtener ancho de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16176">Get widget width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16177">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16177">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16178">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16178">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16179">Este servicio obtiene el ancho del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16179">This service gets the width of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16180">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16180">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16181">**widget**: puntero al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16181">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16182">**return_width**: puntero al destino del ancho del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16182">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16183">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del ancho del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16187">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16187">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16188">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16188">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16190">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16190">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_widget_width;

/* Get width of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_width_get(&my_widget, &my_widget_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the width of widget “my_widget” is in “my_widget_width”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16227">gx_window_client_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16227">gx_window_client_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-client-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16228">Obtener alto de cliente de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16228">Get window client height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16229">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16229">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16230">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16231">Este servicio obtiene el alto del cliente de la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16231">This service gets the client height of the window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16232">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16232">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16233">**window**: puntero a la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16233">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16234">**return_height**: puntero al destino del alto del cliente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16234">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16235">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16235">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta del alto de cliente de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16237">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16237">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16238">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16238">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16239">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16239">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16240">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16240">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16241">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16241">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE my_client_height;

/* Get client height of “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_client_height_get(&my_window,
                                     &my_client_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window “my_window” client height is contained in “my_client_height”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_scroll"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span></span>
### <a name="scroll-window-clients"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16258">Desplazar clientes de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16258">Scroll window clients</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16259">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16259">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_scroll(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16260">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16260">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16261">Este servicio desplaza los clientes de ventana en la cantidad especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16261">This service scrolls the window clients by the specified amount.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16262">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16262">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16263">**window**: puntero a la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16263">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16264">**x_scroll**: cantidad que se va a desplazar en el eje X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16264">**x_scroll** Amount to scroll on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16265">**y_scroll**: cantidad que se va a desplazar en el eje Y.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16265">**y_scroll** Amount to scroll on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16266">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16266">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16267">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Desplazamiento correcto del cliente de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16267">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client scroll</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16268">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16268">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16271">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valores de desplazamiento no válidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16271">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16272">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16272">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16273">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16273">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16274">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16274">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Scroll clients of “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_client_scroll(&my_window, 10, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the clients of window “my_window” have been scrolled. */
```

```C
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16319">gx_window_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16319">gx_window_close</span></span>
### <a name="close-modal-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16320">Cerrar ventana modal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16320">Close modal window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16321">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_close(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16322">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16323">Este servicio obliga a que una ventana modal se desasocie de su elemento primario y se devuelva desde el bucle de ejecución modal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16323">This service forces a modal window to detach from its parent and return from the modal execution loop.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16324">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16324">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16325">**window**: puntero al bloque de control de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16325">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16326">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16326">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16327">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cierre correcto de la ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16327">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully closed window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16328">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16328">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16329">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16329">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16330">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16330">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16331">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16331">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16332">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16332">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16333">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16333">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Close window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_close(&my_window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been closed. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16349">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16349">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16350">Crear ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16350">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16351">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16351">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16352">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16353">Este servicio crea una ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16353">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16354">GX_WINDOW se deriva de GX_WIDGET y admite todos los servicios de API gx_widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16354">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16356">**window**: puntero al bloque de control de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16356">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16357">**name**: nombre lógico de la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16357">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16362">**size**: tamaño de la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16362">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16367">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) El widget ya se ha creado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16367">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamaño de bloque de control del widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16371">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16371">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16372">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16372">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WINDOW my_window;

/* Create window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_create(&my_window, "my window",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16388">gx_window_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16388">gx_window_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16389">Dibujar ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16389">Draw window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16390">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16390">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16391">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16391">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16392">Este servicio dibuja una ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16392">This service draws a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16393">Normalmente, se llama a este servicio internamente durante la actualización del lienzo, pero también se puede llamar desde funciones de dibujo de ventana personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16393">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom window drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16394">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16394">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16395">**window**: puntero al bloque de control de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16395">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16396">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16396">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16397">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16397">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16398">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16398">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom window draw function. */

VOID my_custom_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16416">gx_window_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16416">gx_window_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16417">Procesar evento de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16417">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16418">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16418">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16419">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16420">Este servicio procesa un evento para esta ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16420">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16421">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16421">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16422">**window**: puntero al bloque de control de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16422">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16423">**event**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16423">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16424">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16424">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16425">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Procesamiento correcto de evento de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16425">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16428">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16428">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16429">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16429">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16430">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16430">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16431">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16431">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16447">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16447">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16448">Ejecutar una ventana de forma modal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16448">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16449">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16450">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16451">Este servicio ejecuta de forma modal una ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16451">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16452">Se omitirá toda la entrada de usuario (eventos del lápiz, etc.) fuera del área de cliente de la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16452">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16453">Tenga en cuenta que esta función entra en un bucle continuo de ejecución del bloqueo y no vuelve al autor de la llamada hasta que finaliza la ejecución del modelo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16453">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16454">La ejecución modal finaliza cuando el procesamiento de eventos de cualquier evento recibido devuelve un valor de estado distinto de cero, o cuando se invoca la función de API gx_window_close.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16454">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16455">El código de retorno de procesamiento de eventos distinto de cero se devuelve al autor de la llamada a través del objeto return_ptr que se pasa a esta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16455">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16456">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16457">**window**: puntero al bloque de control de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16457">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16458">**return_ptr**: ubicación para guardar el estado de salida de la ejecución modal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16458">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16459">Puede ser GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16459">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_root_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16535">gx_window_root_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16535">gx_window_root_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16536">Procesar evento de la ventana raíz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16536">Process event for the root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16537">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16537">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_EVENT *event)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16538">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16539">Este servicio procesa los eventos de la ventana raíz especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16539">This service processes events for the specified root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16540">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16540">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16541">**root_window**: puntero al bloque de control de la ventana raíz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16541">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16542">**event**: puntero al evento que se va a procesar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16542">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16543">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Procesamiento correcto del evento de la ventana raíz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16547">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16547">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16548">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16548">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16549">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16549">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_root_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16565">gx_window_root_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16565">gx_window_root_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16566">Buscar ventana raíz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16566">Find root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16567">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16567">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_find(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root_window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16568">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16568">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16569">Este servicio busca la ventana raíz del widget especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16569">This service finds the root window for the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16570">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16570">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16571">**widget**: puntero al bloque de control de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16571">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16572">**return_root_window**: puntero al destino de la ventana raíz encontrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16572">**return_root_window** Pointer to destination for found root window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16573">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16573">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16574">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Búsqueda correcta de la ventana raíz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16574">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful root window find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16575">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) No existe la ventana raíz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16575">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) Root window not exist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16576">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16576">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16577">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16577">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16578">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16578">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16579">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16579">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16580">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16580">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Find root window associated with window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_root_find(&my_window, &root_window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “root_window” contains the root window for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16596">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16596">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16597">Obtener información de desplazamiento de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16597">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16598">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16598">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16599">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16599">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16600">Este servicio obtiene la información de desplazamiento de la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16600">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16601">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16601">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16602">**window**: puntero a la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16602">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16603">**style**: GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL o GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16603">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16604">**return_scroll_info**: puntero al destino de la información de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16604">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16605">La ventana primaria inicializa esta estructura para informar a la barra de desplazamiento del tamaño total de la ventana primaria, el área visualizable y los límites y el incremento del desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16605">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16606">La implementación predeterminada usa el área de cliente de las ventanas como el área visualizable y se desplaza por píxeles, pero la implementación de ventana personalizada puede utilizar los parámetros de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16606">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16607">En el **apéndice I** se incluye la definición de la estructura GX_SCROLL_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16607">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16608">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16608">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Obtención correcta de la información de desplazamiento de la ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16610">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16610">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16611">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16611">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16612">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Tipo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16612">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16613">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16614">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16614">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16615">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16615">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scrollbar_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16631">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16631">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-window-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16632">Buscar barra de desplazamiento de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16632">Find window scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16633">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scrollbar_find(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16634">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16635">Este servicio encuentra la barra de desplazamiento para la ventana especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16635">This service finds the scrollbar for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16636">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16637">**window**: puntero a la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16637">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16638">**type**: GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL o GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16638">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16639">**return_scrollbar**: puntero al destino de la barra de desplazamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16639">**return_scrollbar** Pointer to destination for scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16640">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16641">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Búsqueda correcta de la barra de desplazamiento de la ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16641">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scrollbar find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16642">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Barra de desplazamiento no encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16642">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16643">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16643">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16644">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16644">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16645">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Tipo no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16645">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>


## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16664">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16664">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16665">Obtener fondo de la pantalla de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16665">Get window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16666">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16666">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16694">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16694">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16695">Establecer fondo de la pantalla de ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16695">Set window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16696">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16696">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16697">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16697">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16698">Este servicio establece el papel tapiz de la ventana especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16698">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16699">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16699">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16700">**window**: puntero a la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16700">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16701">**wallpaper_id**: id. de recurso del papel tapiz que se va a usar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16701">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16702">**tile**: el papel tapiz se coloca en mosaico si es GX_TRUE; de lo contrario, el papel tapiz no se coloca en mosaico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16702">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16703">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16703">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Establecimiento correcto del papel tapiz de la ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Autor de la llamada de esta función no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="46d97-16707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget no válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16708">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16708">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46d97-16709">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16709">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="46d97-16710">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46d97-16710">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the wallpaper for window “my_window” is set. */
```
